description.hltext_display: Card girls' basketball: Trumms lead Alexandria past St. Cloud Tech
Win7中EFS加密和Bitlocker应用解析
description.content:
随着计算机和计算机网络的不断普及，计算机信息安全问题已经日益突出。目前安全产品也非常多，其实普通用户用不上太复杂的加密方式以及加密设备，他们需要的大多是自己电脑上的数据防止被他人非法复制等。这类普通用户的需求如果采用大型安全公司的解决方案成本高，也会造成不必要的浪费。而操作系统本身如果具有一定的安全工具，就可以解决大部分的安全需求。
微软的操作系统整合了很多有用好用的功能，多年来坐拥无可争议的最受欢迎使用人数最多的个人桌面操作系统。Windows7整合了之前操作系统的优势，其自身的安全性、兼容性也达到了相当高的水平，在用户当中好评不断。今天我们从Windows7的两个安全工具说起，简单谈谈Windows7在数据安全这方面有哪些过人之处。
我们引述一段来自微软技术白皮书的文字：EFS加密是基于公钥策略的。在使用EFS加密一个文件或文件夹时，系统首先会生成一个由伪随机数组成的FEK (File Encryption Key，文件加密钥匙)，然后将利用FEK和数据扩展标准X算法创建加密后的文件，并把它存储到硬盘上，同时删除未加密的原始文件。随后系统利用你的公钥加密FEK，并把加密后的FEK存储在同一个加密文件中。而在访问被加密的文件时，系统首先利用当前用户的私钥解密FEK，然后利用FEK解密出文件。在首次使用EFS时，如果用户还没有公钥/私钥对（统称为密钥），则会首先生成密钥，然后加密数据。如果你登录到了域环境中，密钥的生成依赖于域控制器，否则它就依赖于本地机器。
在Windows7下对文件或者文件夹进行EFS加密很简单，右击要加密的对象，点击属性，在常规标签下点击高级，在弹出的对话框中将加密以保护数据复选框中的勾勾上，点击应用，加密对象就会变成绿色，说明加密成功，解密只需进行相反操作。
启动加密向导
此时Windows自动生成了一个对应账户的证书。为了数据的安全我们可以导出证书，运行certmgr.msc，调出证书管理器，在证书当前用户下找到生成的证书，右键选择所有任务，打开导出向导。
证书管理器
证书导出向导
选择同时导出密钥
此证书只能以个人信息交换的方式导出
从上面一段文字看，EFS加密或依赖于域控制器或依赖于本地用户账户，我们不考虑EFS加密的强度的话，采用这种加密方式如果采用脱机攻击的方式，破解了域控制器或者本地对应的用户账户则EFS加密不攻自破。不过对于大多数用户来说，EFS加密是一种操作系统带来的免费加密方式，可以应对大部分的非法偷窥或者复制，因此是一种不错的安全工具。

description.hltext_display: ・Solix数据库归档 ― 构建“绿色IT”
description.content:
发表评论
中国软件资讯网12月22日消息，在全球变暖、数据存储需求加速、能耗成本增高以及物理数据中心超负荷的时代，构建在分级存储架构上的数据库归档变得举足轻重。Gartner预计在大多数企业数据中心里，80%的结构化数据都是非活跃的。Gartner还估计全球范围内50%的企业数据中心将会耗尽能源和冷却的能力，而且在某种程度上存在着存储系统增长失控的情况。非活跃的数据除占用了宝贵的一级和二级的存储空间之外，另一个影响就是在一个大型IT环境中，增长的数据库副本会呈现出倍增效应。这会带来额外的计算负荷、降低性能、增加能源消耗和热量负荷、降低主系统的寿命以及产生迁移到更昂贵、更大的磁盘存储系统的需求。
Solix数据库归档在一个多层分级系统中将数据移动到一个较低层（例如使用便宜的SATA磁盘），或到一个次级站点并且该站点可通过网络访问。Solix数据库归档可显著减少数据中心的压力，延长主处理器的寿命和推迟新型高性能存储的采购。那种完全不活跃但是却要遵从法律要求的数据可将其移动到磁带或离线的磁盘上。这会推迟，甚至有时会取消服务器和存储系统升级的需求，因此，不止在硬件采购方面还在网络、能源和冷却、服务器配置和管理、老旧系统处理方面均有所节省。
Solix数据库归档还对环境有一个双重积极影响。通过削减双方的能源需求，可推迟老旧系统的报废处理。多数IT部门对他们数据中心内的各种设备的能源需求并没有清晰的概念。这表明他们有一个重要的方面可减少他们的能源消耗，并且可通过优化能源消耗节省他们的运营预算。绿色“IT”开始的第一步即是分析和优化每个系统的能源需求。而在许多情况下，数据归档将在这些努力中扮演一个重要的角色。
Solix数据库归档可以做到：
2、可以进行离线归档，将数据归档成ｘｍｌ等离线数据格式
3、提高应用用户的生产效率
4、减少与大型数据集相关的IT维护成本
5、降低生产服务器中的高成本存储选项

description.hltext_display: Do You Know What Western Tack is in Horse Riding?
description.author: tedstinson
description.content: Now that you decided to take up horse riding as a new hobby, there are some terms you should become familiar with. One such term is western tack. Often referred to as cowboy tack, is commonly used more for the purpose for riding on the open range, in rodeo events, western horse shows, or on ranches and farms throughout North and South America. English tack is commonly found throughout Europe.Western saddles are equipped with a horn and leather skirts to help hold the saddle in place during hard riding. You'll also commonly find Western saddles with a deep seat which is also padded for additional comfort. Also, stirrups are placed so that the rider's feet are directly under them, allowing the rider to stand and throw a rope if needed.There are some differences between Western tack and English tack. For example, western saddles do not use padding and therefore involve using a horse blanket. English saddles don't use horn, while a western saddle has a horn. The horn's function is to hold a rope when you are out riding to lasso livestock or simply for your added convenience.While the horse blanket is sometimes thought of more of as a stable supply than a piece of riding equipment, it is still connected to western tack.� As a matter of fact, blankets are a fundamental addition to your assortment of horse care objects. Horse blankets have many more purposes than to keep the horse warm during cool nights or after a long ride. I've heard stories of riders spend the night out on the range and cuddling up snuggle up with their horse to share its blanket for warmth. While these are extreme cases, the do demonstrate the many uses and functions a horse blanket serves. On a nice and warm summer night, you could always use the horse blanket as a pillow or something to lie on. � Obviously, there is more to horse riding and western tack than just the saddle. It also involves fundamental items such as breast collars, webbing, western bridles, roping reins, training supplies, spurs, cinches, girths, pads, horse blankets, stirrups, halters, leads, and finally horseshoes.It can be a little overwhelming at first but with a little research and time, you'll be an experienced rider. There's a great deal of information available about horses, western tack, and how to care for horses out there. Begin by asking another experienced rider, a veterinarian, or the shop owners where to buy your horse riding equipment. They should have plenty of hands on experience working with horses and can point you in the right direction.

description.hltext_display: Paul S. Kramer, 90
description.content:
He was the husband of the late Gertrude H. (Goldstein) Kramer.
Born in Brockton, a son of the late Max and Annie M. (Levine) Kramer, he moved to New Bedford at the age of 13.
Mr. Kramer was a graduate of New Bedford High School Class of 1937, Dean Academy Class of 1938, and Brown University Class of 1942.
He was a twenty-one year employee of Aerovox Corporation where he worked as a production executive until 1973. After leaving Aerovox he went to work for family in Boston until 1983 when he semi-retired. He continued along his retail career as a part-time employee of Grundy Lumber and Hardware in Westport, MA until his full retirement in 1991.
Mr. Kramer was a 32nd degree Mason of the Star of the East Lodge (formerly the Wamsutta Lodge) in New Bedford. He was a former member and past president of the Dartmouth Lion's Club.
He was a member of Tifereth Israel Congregation and a former member of its board and house committee; and was a current board member of the New Bedford Jewish Convalescent Home. Mr. Kramer was also a former volunteer at St. Luke's Hospital for 9 years and a volunteer at the New Bedford Whaling Museum for 19 years.
He is survived by his son, Steven M. Kramer of Dartmouth; his sister, Phyllis Cronig of Vineyard Haven, MA; and 4 nephews and 2 nieces.
He was the brother of the late Milton, Charles and Robert Kramer.
The funeral service and Shiva will be private.
In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the New Bedford Jewish Convalescent Home, 200 Hawthorne Street, New Bedford, MA 02740.
Arrangements by SUGARMAN-SINAI MEMORIAL CHAPEL.

description.hltext_display: Police probe assault on woman at mosque
description.content:
Saida Said said she was in her car running errands when a man in a car followed her to the mosques parking lot on the west side of Columbus on Monday afternoon.
The woman told reporters the man swore at her, said she should leave the country and threatened to kill her. He then attacked her with pepper spray, she said.
Mosque officials called police, who took a report and turned it over to the prosecutors office. The FBI said Tuesday it will likely open a civil rights investigation, the results of which would be turned over to federal prosecutors.
A mosque security camera recorded the encounter, although the alleged pepper-spraying was not visible because the womans car blocked the cameras view.

description.hltext_display: Avanzan las obras del que será 'el coso más cómodo de la región'
description.content:
La plaza de toros de Don Benito contará con amplios asientos y pasillos para facilitar la estancia de los 6.000 espectadores
Disfrutar de una corrida de toros sin que el espectador de la fila de atrás le clave las rodillas en la espalda o evitar que los rezagados hagan que una decena de personas se levanten en pleno paseíllo para permitirle llegar hasta su sitio será dentro de pronto una realidad. Si las obras siguen su curso como hasta ahora, en unos tres meses los aficionados extremeños podrán disfrutar del coso más cómodo de la región. Así lo define el constructor de la obra, Juan Barco, quien explica que las gradas tienen una distancia amplia que permitirá a los espectadores transitar por los pasillos, mientras que las personas que se encuentren sentadas no serán molestadas por los de los asientos delanteros ni traseros. En la imagen que acompaña esta información puede observarse la amplitud del graderío, que ya ha empezado a instalarse. Se trata de bases prefabricadas, por lo que la construcción está siendo muy rápida y las obras siguen su curso para que, como está previsto, pueda inaugurarse la plaza de toros el próximo 19 de marzo. A la primera corrida que se celebre podrán asistir 6.000 espectadores, la capacidad total del coso. Éste contará además con un ruedo de 45 metros y todo el equipamiento necesario: toriles, oficinas, capilla, enfermería, corrales de reconocimiento y patio de cuadrillas. La plaza será accesible para personas con minusvalía. La comodidad llega hasta los aseos, pues se instalarán entre 90 y 100 inodoros. Igualmente lleva una cubierta de nueve metros, mediante unas velas de plástico que se usan con frecuencia en la instalación de carpas. Se instalarán hacia dentro de forma circular. Don Benito no cuenta con plaza de toros y tan sólo ha ofrecido festejos en portátiles. Tampoco Villanueva de la Serena, que también ha tenido que conformarse con montar y desmontar su plaza para ofrecer festejos. El número de habitantes de ambos municipios hace presagiar un éxito del coso dombenitense. «Villanueva y Don Benito forman, prácticamente, una ciudad, pues juntan 80.000 personas entre ambos municipios a los que hay que sumar las pedanías y pueblos que hay alrededor», explica Juan Barco quien asegura que él no será el empresario. Ni los empresarios ni el cartel inaugural se han dado aún a conocer, aunque el alcalde de Don Benito, Mariano Gallego comentó el pasado mes de noviembre que se preparará ese día con la colaboración de la peña taurina del municipio pacense. Contará además con 25 locales comerciales de unos cien metros cada uno. La empresa constructora adjudicataria de las obras edificará la plaza de toros que cederá al Ayuntamiento mientras que la propiedad de los locales comerciales irá a parar a manos de la empresa. La intención del consistorio es que se utilice no sólo para festejos taurinos, sino que también se puedan ofrecer otro tipo de espectáculos culturales y de ocio. Un nuevo coso que viene sin duda a traer nuevas esperanzas para la fiesta.

description.hltext_display: 今年利用外资约1000亿美元
CIA launches task force on WikiLeaks
description.content: The CIA has launched a task force to assess the impact of unauthorised publication of thousands of secret US diplomatic cables by the whistle-blower website WikiLeaks on the agency's foreign relationships and operations. Called WikiLeaks task Force or WTF, it is focused on the immediate impact of the most recently released files, The Washington Post reported."One issue is whether the agency's ability to recruit informants could be damaged by declining confidence in the US government's ability to keep secrets," it said."The (CIA) Director asked the task force to examine whether the latest release of WikiLeaks documents might affect the agency's foreign relationships or operations," CIA spokesman George Little told the daily.The panel is being led by the CIA's Counter-intelligence Centre but has more than two dozen members from departments across the agency, the report said.Meanwhile, State Department spokesman P J Crowley said America's relationship with other countries is based on mutual interests, which are unchanged by any document that has been released by WikiLeaks."We are going to do this one day at a time, one action at a time," he said, adding that Secretary of State Hillary Clinton continues to have regular contacts either in person or in phone calls with world leaders."This issue comes up, and without exception, the leaders reassure her that notwithstanding whatever ripples have been created by these revelations, that our relations with these countries will continue because they're important," he said.Called WikiLeaks task Force or WTF, it is focused on the immediate these countries will continue because they're important," he said.

description.hltext_display: Lyric, Devon bringing 'Christmas Carol' to Oklahoma City
description.author: info@tradingmarkets.com
description.content:
Lyric Theatre will offer a holiday staple for the next five years, thanks to a $200,000 contribution from Devon Energy Corp.
Devon is underwriting the cost of bringing "A Christmas Carol" to Lyric for the first time in its 47-year history, officials announced Tuesday. The play will be at Lyric each December through 2015.
"Devon prides itself not just on investing in the community, but in creating meaningful partnerships like this one," Devon Executive Chairman Larry Nichols said. "We are thrilled to be working with the Lyric to build a family tradition at Christmastime for Oklahoma City."
Lyric's production of Charles Dickens' classic novel will be adapted by artistic director Michael Baron, who currently is directing the play at Ford's Theater in Washington.
Baron said he is delighted to bring a new production to Lyric.
"Young audiences and adults alike will be motivated by the lessons of love and charity found in Dickens' story," he said. "With Devon Energy's generous support, this classic story comes to life using the very best talent Oklahoma and the American theater have to offer.
"With this production, Lyric Theatre and Devon Energy's principles of optimism and community celebration are extended throughout the holiday season and for many generations to come."
For full details on Devon Energy Corp (DVN) DVN. Devon Energy Corp (DVN) has Short Term PowerRatings at TradingMarkets. Details on Devon Energy Corp (DVN) Short Term PowerRatings is available at This Link.

description.hltext_display: Test Of Mettle Annapurna 100 On Jan 1
description.content:
But Britain´s ultra runner Lizzy Hawker can run a whopping 100 km in a day. And if it is in the plains she takes less than seven-and-a-half hours, and a little more in the mountain trails to traverse the same distance.
Two years ago, she completed the distance from the Everest Base Camp to Kathmandu in 3 days, 2 hrs and 7 mins.
Lizzy will be in Nepal by December-end to participate in the Annapurna 100 Trail Race on January 1.
Ngima Yanjee from Khumjung, Solukhumbu will compete with Lizzy and hopes to win the race.
"I don´t think I am that strong. My mind is strong. I tell myself to keep running, keep enjoying," said Ngima Yanjee.
Around 50 ultra runners have already registered their names for the first international event of Nepal Tourism Year 2011.
The Annapurna 100 features 100 km, 70 km and 50 km races, which will begin from Pokhara and pass through Hyangja, Dhampus, Pitam Deurali, Ghandruk and Birethanti to finally conclude at the starting line.
Ex-Gurkha Ramesh Bhattachan and Roger Henke, the director of Summit Hotel in Lalitpur, will coordinate the event that will be sponsored by Summit Hotel, Standard Chartered Bank and Sherpa Adventure Gear. Meanwhile, Richard Bull has been managing the official website of the event.
"Nepal is a perfect country for trail races and the sport has a great scope here," claimed Roger.
The runners will be charged 100 euros each to participate in the event and will have to manage travel and accommodation on their own.
However, only Nepali ultra runners can run for the prize money. Winner of men´s 100 km will get Rs 50,000 while winners of 70 km and 50 km races will receive Rs 35,000 and Rs 25,000, respectively. The top five ultra runners will also receive cash prizes.
Meanwhile, winner of women´s 100 km will get Rs 20,000 while winners of 70 km and 50 km will receive Rs 15,000 and Rs 10,000, respectively. "The prize money is only to attract Nepali runners and only Nepalis will get cash prizes," said Roger.
Ram Kumar Chhetri is the defending champion of the trail race. He had completed 71 km in 7 hours, 30 minutes to bag the trophy. Fifty athletes, including 10 foreigners, had participated in the race and Army Club had claimed all the top five spots.
"Nepal has world-class trail runners like Dawa Dachhiri Sherpa, Phu Dorjee Sherpa, Sudip Rai and Ngima Yanjee, who are doing well even at the international level. We want to promote trails in Nepal as well as the athletes," said Roger. "We are trying to encourage women participation this time," he added.
According to the official website, annapurna100.com, Sir Ian Botham, a world-renowned cricketer, had first participated in this 100 km race on October 31, 1995. Twelve local runners proved that a run from Pokhara to Pun Hill and back was possible in less than 12 hours. The winner took 11 hours 55 minutes and 55 seconds. The route would normally take an average trekker five days.
"After 1995, it was organized in 2000 and 2009. In March 2010, it was changed to Annapurna 71 km and now it is back to 100 km again," said Roger. "If we continue for the next few years, it will be a big event in east Asia," he added.

description.hltext_display: Lei limita cenas sexuais em BD japonesa
description.content:
A partir de Julho de 2011, em Tóquio, será proibida a venda ou aluguer de manga (banda desenhada japonesa) e anime com cenas sexuais extremas a menores de idade. A lei, considerada um limite à liberdade de expressão pela indústria manga, foi aprovada pela Assembleia Metropolitana da capital japonesa.
A lei pretende que os menores de 18 anos não tenham acesso a manga e anime com descrições explícitas de violação, incesto, e outros crimes sexuais.
Segundo a agência AFP, a norma foi proposta por Shintaro Ishihara, um político conservador que há muito tempo faz campanha contra as imagens "doentias" da indústria manga, que descrevem atos sexuais de "maneira injustificadamente glorificada ou exagerada".
Vários partidos políticos influentes concordam com as restrições, incluindo o Partido Democrático e o conservativo Partido Liberal Democrata. Ishihara não ficou surpreendido quando a lei foi aprovada pela maioria dos membros da assembleia. "É a consciência dos japoneses", disse o político à comunicação social. "Não iria de maneira nenhuma mostrar coisas deste género aos seus próprios filhos".
A banda desenhada manga é muito procurada no Japão tanto por crianças como por adultos. As novas restrições, indispensáveis para promover a "educação sã dos jovens", deverão ser impostas pelos próprios editores e distribuidores da indústria manga em Tóquio, que conta com mais de 13 milhões de habitantes.
Como forma de protesto contra o que consideram uma censura à liberdade de expressão e à criatividade dos artistas, um grupo de dez editoras de manga líderes no mercado prometeu boicotar coletivamente o maior evento da indústria, a Feira Internacional de Anime de Tóquio, a ser apresentada em Março por Ishihara.

description.hltext_display: Fish tacos: Shrimp and sole embedded in a puffy batter at El Paraiso in Lakewood
description.author: Sue Kidd
description.content:
The fish tacos at El Paraiso Fish Tacos in Lakewood come with a choice of battered shrimp or Dover sole.
Fish tacos come in all flavors and configurations – and they're ubiquitous on menus. I’ve spotted them at brewpubs, sit-down chain restaurants and even corner delis: Grilled, blackened, sautéed, fried or baked; with lettuce, cabbage and even fancy micro greens; cilantro-lime infused sour cream, roasted pepper salsa and even a pomegranate sauce.
But I don’t think I’ve ever seen fish tacos as cheap or as tasty as the shrimp and sole tacos at El Paraiso Fish Tacos in Lakewood.
I got a tip from a TNT Diner reader about this curious little Mexican restaurant (read: hole in the wall) that opened a few months ago in the same shopping center as the Lakewood Cinema theaters. The fish tacos here don’t have an Americana or healthy eating twist or some high falutin’ pomegranate sour cream sauce– they’re good ol’ battered and fried fish tacos served on house-made tortillas. And they’re about as perfect as I’ve found for that style of fish taco. The tacos are a bargain $1.99 each in either shrimp or Dover sole and I noticed a theme right away: fresh. In the shrimp taco, two discs of puffy dough encased plump shrimp cooked just enough to retain some of the juicy snap that I love about fresh shrimp. The battered sole was feathery soft, fresh tasting and also perfectly fried. The batter was doughy, fresh and creamy, not brittle or greasy (my big pet peeve for fried fish). The tacos came on a fabulous foundation: freshly griddled house-made flour tortillas (which earned El Paraiso serious bonus points, right there). A generous swipe of sour cream, chopped cabbage, a few flecks of cilantro leaves, chopped tomatoes and onions finished the tacos. The only thing they required was a scant squeeze from a lime wedge, which was available on the salsa bar near the door, along with roasted, pickled whole jalapenos (delicious), three kinds of salsa (passable, but nothing memorable) a few other pickled vegetables and a creamy green jalapeno puree that tasted purely of peppers (be sure to get a cup).
For a restaurant with fish tacos in the name, I’d expect more than two varieties, but that’s all the menu lists. I saw ceviche and asked the requisite questions: Is it raw fish cooked in a lime bath? Or cooked fish squirted with some lime juice as an afterthought? It was the latter, so I skipped. If it’s not real ceviche, I won’t waste my time or yours.
Chiles Rellenos ($7.99) looked promising. We were pleasantly surprised by the healthy thump of spice from the pepper (It caused my dining partner to declare at the end of the meal, “My head is kinda sweaty now.”). Gooey mozzarella oozed out of the pepper as we cut through the eggy batter. The pepper held just the slightest bit of crunch, which gave the dish body that I liked. It was topped with a mild tomato sauce. Note to kitchen: I could have done without the toothpicks that were holding the pepper together. Beans on the side were thin, but tasty, and rice was well seasoned, but not too salty. Corn tortillas came on the side.
The rest of the menu mostly is taqueria eats: tacos (99 cents-$1.49), burritos ($5.99), enchiladas ($7.99), tortas (5.99). A few house specialties sounded a bit unusual. A whole fried tilapia fish, Pescado Dorado ($12.95), and an empanadas plate ($6.99) sounded worthy of a return trip. Beef, pork or cheese and pepper tamales ($1.49 each) and menudo ($7.99) are offered on the weekends.
Service was order at the counter, friendly and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is downscale taqueria. The dining room is filled with a handful of ‘70s style brown laminate tables with matching fake leather chairs that can best be described as ‘70s casino chic. El Paraiso may not be fancy, but it’s got character. On the television was something quite curious, which turned out to be something like a Mexican soap opera version of “Ugly Betty,” only with mariachi music. We couldn’t take our eyes off it.
El Paraiso Fish Tacos & Mexican Food Where: 2510 84th St. S., Lakewood (next to the Lakewood Cinemas) Info: 253-582-9349 Hours: 9 a.m.-9 p.m. daily Categories: , First Bite, Restaurant openings

description.hltext_display: "最严调控年"楼市图景：楼市运行积极� � 凸现
Heidi Montag bật mí di chứng sau ’dao kéo’
description.content:
Một năm sau cơn điên loạn vì phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ, Heidi Montag tiết lộ vô số những vết sẹo trên những phần cơ thể giả của cô.
Tháng 11.2009 là thời điểm Heidi Montag điên cuồng với phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ, đến nỗi trong vòng một ngày, cô quyết định làm tới 10 cuộc "xẻo thịt". Một năm sau, lần đầu tiên Heidi tiết lộ cuộc chiến với dao kéo và những vết sẹo trên cơ thể cô sau vô số lần làm đẹp. “Nhiều phần trên cơ thể tôi trông còn tệ hơn lúc chưa phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ” – Heidi tâm sự với Life & Style.
Theo cựu ngôi sao The Hills, cuộc đại tu nhan sắc của cô đã để lại vô số sẹo xấu, gồ ghề và tấy đỏ trên cơ thể. Để chứng minh, Heidi sẵn sàng khoe vết sẹo dài 5 cm dưới cằm, hai vết sẹo trên trán do phẫu thuật căng da trán, dưới tai cô là một đường ziczac vết khâu, đôi chân có nhiều chỗ sưng lên, và bốn vết sẹo ở phía dưới lưng, dưới mông do hút mỡ, một vết lằn đỏ ở lỗ mũi phải, bộ ngực bên to bên bé, một vết sẹo dài trên ngực và những vết sẹo sâu quanh núm vú sau lần nâng ngực thứ hai.
Theo Heidi, vết sẹo dưới cằm của cô sau phẫu thuật gọt cằm là vết sẹo dễ nhận thấy nhất, nhưng di chứng phẫu thuật xấu nhất là ở phần ngực, và vết sẹo khủng khiếp nhất là ở dưới mông.
Những vết sẹo này như một lời nhắc nhở Heidi về sai lầm lớn của cô. “Người bị tai nạn giao thông cũng không nhiều sẹo như tôi. Tôi không muốn trở thành một cô gái với thân hình toàn đồ giả thế này. Phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ đã phá hoại sự nghiệp và cuộc sống riêng của tôi. Tôi chỉ mong mình có thể điều chỉnh cỗ máy thời gian quay ngược lại để tôi có thể sửa chữa những lỗi ngớ ngẩn của mình” – Heidi chua xót nói.
Tháng trước, cô nàng nghiện phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ này cho biết: “Tôi không muốn có bộ ngực bự nhất thế giới. Thành thật mà nói tôi muốn giảm size ngực, nhưng lại không muốn chạm vào dao kéo nữa. Tôi đang mắc kẹt với bộ ngực size G này”.

description.hltext_display: W&M alum will lead Roush Racing
description.content:
CONCORD, N.C. — Roush Fenway Racing has announced that Steve Newmark, a graduate of the College of William & Mary, will succeed Geoff Smith, who is retiring at the end of December, as president of the multi-car NASCAR organization.
According to inracingnews.com, Newmark, who previously was a shareholder at the law firm of Robinson, Bradshaw and Hinson, joined the organization as senior vice president of business operations in April. Smith has served as president of Roush Fenway Racing for the last 13 years.
“It is truly a privilege to be afforded the opportunity to lead one of the most successful organizations in professional sports,” Newmark said in a press release. “At the same time, the position carries a great deal of responsibility to the drivers, employees and fans to continue the tradition of excellence established by Jack Roush and Geoff Smith. Fortunately, I believe we have one of the deepest organizations in professional sports, and are well prepared to remain a leader in NASCAR. Despite the recent challenges in the motorsports industry, I really like the tools that we have to work with and believe strongly in our assets, both on a competition and sales and marketing level. Particularly with how we finished the 2010 season, I know everyone in this organization, including myself, is excited to get started on 2011.”
A graduate of the College of William and Mary, and University of Virginia School of Law, Newmark had worked as outside counsel to Roush Fenway since the early 2000s and was involved in the creation of the joint venture between Roush Racing and Fenway Sports Group in 2007 and the sale of its merchandising division in 2006.
Newmark has significant experience in the motorsports industry and has represented a broad spectrum of teams, drivers and sponsors at various levels of NASCAR since 1998. In addition, he has been involved in a number of high profile transactions in collegiate sports, including representation of the NCAA in its recent television deal with CBS and Turner for the NCAA basketball tournament.
“We are excited about Steve coming on board as our president,” said Roush Fenway Racing co-owner Jack Roush. “Steve has a solid background working in all areas of sports and brings new ideas and insight into our organization. Importantly, he has been part of the Roush Fenway family for many years, beginning as outside counsel and then as head of our business operations this year.
“Geoff Smith did an outstanding job of running the business affairs of our company for the past 20 years and we could not have done this without him. Geoff’s leadership has set the bar high and we believe that Steve is the right person to ensure that we remain a leader in the marketplace and in the garage. Since his arrival, I’ve been extremely pleased with his business acumen, work ethic and his desire to engage in all aspects of our business. We are certainly excited to move forward with Steve at the helm,” Roush said.

description.hltext_display: El Ibex 35 sube un 0,31% en la apertura y consolida los 10.200 puntos
description.content:
MADRID, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
El parqué madrileño ha abierto la sesión con una subida del 0,31%, que ha situado al Ibex 35 (Madrid: IBEX.MC - noticias) en el nivel de los 10.235,5 puntos, en una jornada con pocos valores en negativo en los primeros minutos de cotización.
En concreto, Banesto cedía un 0,64%, seguido de Acciona (Munich: 865629 - noticias) (-0,47%), Iberia (Madrid: IBLA.MC - noticias) y Bankinter (-0,09%) y Gas Natural (Berlín: 38G.BE - noticias) , Técnicas Reunidas y ACS (Xetra: A0CBA2 - noticias) (-0,04%). Por el contrario, el mayor ascenso era par BME (Estutgart: A0H1NA - noticias) (+1,4%), por delante de Sacyr Vallehermoso (Madrid: SYV.MC - noticias) (+1,2%), Abengoa (ABGOF.PK - noticias) (+1,09%) y Abertis (+1,08%).
En el sector financiero, BBVA (Madrid: BBVA.MC - noticias) subía un 0,45%, Banco Santander (Amsterdam: SANT.AS - noticias) , un 0,23%, Banco Popular, un 0,12% y Banco Sabadell, un 0,09%. Repsol YPF (Madrid: REP.MC - noticias) , Iberdrola (IBE-U.TI - noticias) y Telefónica (Madrid: TEF.MC - noticias) , por su parte, subían un 0,74%, un 0,34% y un 0,23%, respectivamente.
En Europa, los principales indicadores mostraban signo dispar, ya que París cedía un 0,10%, mientras Francfort avanzaba un 0,03%. En el mercado de divisas, el euro mantiene posiciones frente al dólar y al inicio de la sesión bursátil el cambio entre las dos monedas quedaba fijado en 1,3144 unidades.

description.hltext_display: Rodobo International, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2010 R...
description.content:
Fourth Quarter revenues surged 172.6% year-over-year to a record $25.3 million
Fourth Quarter net income climbed 112.4% year-over-year to $3.6 million
HARBIN, China, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-Asia/ -- Rodobo International, Inc. (the "Company" or "Rodobo") (OTC Bulletin Board: RDBO), a fast growing dairy company in China, reported financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended September 30, 2010.
Fourth Quarter 2010 Highlights:
Revenue was $25.3 million, up 172.6% from $9.3 million in 4Q09, outperformed 4Q10 guidance range of $20 - $24 million
Gross profit was $9.4 million, up 87.5% from $5.0 million in 4Q09
Net income was $3.6 million, up 112.4% from $1.7 million in 4Q09, outperformed 4Q10 guidance range of $3.0 - $3.2 million
Earnings per diluted share was $0.13, up from $0.10 in 4Q09
Full Year 2010 Highlights:
Revenue was $69.8 million, up 101.2% from $34.7 million in 2009
Gross profit was $28.0 million, up 59.0% from $ 17.6 million in 2009
Net income was $12.4 million, up 82.5% from $6.8 million in 2009
Earnings per diluted share was up to $0.53 from $0.42 in 2009
First Quarter 2011 Guidance:
Management feels confident to give its guidance for the first quarter of 2011 for revenue to be in the range of $24 - $26 million and net income to be in the range of $3.2 - $3.5 million.
"Rodobo closed its fiscal year 2010 with strong fourth quarter results and it is our fourth consecutive top line growth quarter. Our strong revenue and net income growths demonstrated the strong market demand for Rodobo's high quality, fresh and nutritious milk powder products, the effectiveness of our strategy of expanding our production capacity, and our ability in marketing execution" stated Mr. Yanbin Wang, the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Rodobo. "Overall, 2010 was an extraordinary and successful year for Rodobo. The acquisition of the Beixue Group is a key groundwork of our growth strategy. As we move into 2011, we will continue to consolidate our acquisition, realign our product lines and improve our capacity utilization as we continue to expand our distribution network and further penetrate into our existing market in both formulated dairy and raw milk powder products."
Fourth Quarter 2010 Financial Results
Net sales for the fourth quarter of 2010 were $25.3 million, an increase of approximately $16.0 million or 172.6%, compared to net sales for fourth quarter of 2009. This increase was primarily derived from the contribution from the acquisition of Hulunbeier Hailaer Beixue, one of the three companies comprising the Beixue Group that were acquired by the Company on February 5, 2010. We also increased the selling price of whole milk powder products produced by Hulunbeier Hailaer Beixue after the acquisition. The revenue growth was also attributed to the sales of our "Peer" infant formula product series launched in July 2009. The "Peer" series is a high-end product line with higher selling price. During the fourth quarter, we continued our efforts to develop distribution networks and expand the market areas in the 9 provinces in which we currently sell products.
During the fourth quarter of 2010, sales generated from baby/infant formula accounted for 40.7% of total sales, sales generated from middle-aged and elderly formula accounted for 13.5% of our total sales, and sales generated from whole milk powder formula accounted for 45.8% of total sales.
Our gross profit for the fourth quarter of 2010 was $9.4 million, an increase of approximately $4.4 million or 87.5%, compared to the gross profit for the fourth quarter of 2009. The overall gross profit margin for the fourth quarter of 2010 decreased to 37.0% from 53.8% for the fourth quarter of 2009.
Our overall gross profit margin was diluted due to the acquisition of lower-margin business. The newly acquired, Hulunbeier Hailaer Beixue, has a gross margin of 7.4% for the fourth quarter of 2010. Excluding the margin dilution impact of the acquisition, gross profit margin actually improved to 64.0% for the fourth quarter 2010 from 53.8% for the fourth quarter of 2009, which was primarily driven by the high-margin new baby/infant formula "Peer", which has a gross margin of 70.8% and accounted for approximately 52.6% of total formulated milk powder product sales (excluding sales from Hulunbeier Hailaer Beixue) in the fourth quarter of 2010.
Operating expenses for the fourth quarter of 2010 were $6.3 million, an increase of approximately $2.9 million, or 85.6%, compared to the fourth quarter of 2009. Operating expenses as a percentage of net sales decreased to 24.8% in the fourth quarter of 2010 from 36.4% in the fourth quarter of 2009. The decrease of the operating expenses as a percentage of net sales was primarily due to a decrease in operating expenses, especially fewer distribution expenses expended by Hulunbei Hailaer Beixue as its whole milk powder products are sold directly to end users' processing plants.
Distribution expenses for the fourth quarter of 2010 were $5.8 million, an increase of approximately $2.7 million or 90.9%, compared to $3.1 million for the fourth quarter of 2009. The increase was mainly due to sales growth and market expansion. The increase was also attributed by $0.4 million amortization of customer list that we acquired in connection with the acquisitions of the Beixue Group made on February 5, 2010.
General and administrative expenses for the fourth quarter of 2010 were $0.4 million, an increase of $0.1 million from $0.3 million for the fourth quarter of 2009.
Net income for the fourth quarter of 2010 was $3.6 million, an increase of $1.9 million or 112.4%, compared to $1.7 million for the fourth quarter of 2009. Earnings per diluted share were $0.13 for the fourth quarter of 2010, compared with $0.10 per diluted share for the fourth quarter of 2009.
Full Year 2010 Financial Results
Net sales for the full year 2010 were $69.8 million, an increase of approximately $35.1 million or 101.2%, from $34.7 million in 2009. Gross profit increased was $28.0 million, an increase of 59.0% from $17.6 million in the comparable period in 2009. Gross margin was 40.1% in 2010 compared to 50.7% in the comparable period in 2009. Income from operation was $10.0 million, an increase of 56.8% from $6.4 million in the same period a year ago. Net income for 2010 was $12.4 million or $0.53 per fully diluted share, up 82.5% from $6.8 million, or $0.42 per fully diluted share, in the comparable period in 2009.
Financial Condition
As of September 30, 2010, Rodobo had $5.2 million in cash and cash equivalents, $5.5 million in current liabilities and no long-term debt. Shareholders' equity was $61.0 million as of September 30, 2010, up from $21.3 million as of September 30, 2009. Net cash from operating activities during 2010 was $12.8 million, compared with $3.6 million in 2009.
Conference Call Information
Management will conduct a conference call at 8:00 A.M. Eastern Time, on Tuesday, December 21, 2010. To participate in the live conference call, please dial the following number five or ten minutes prior to the scheduled conference call time: (866) 393-8606. International callers should dial +1-(706) 643-9902. When prompted by the operator, mention Conference ID number 33141799. If you are unable to participate in the call at this time, a replay will be available on Tuesday, December 21, 2010 at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time, through Tuesday, January 4, 2011. To access the replay dial (800) 642-1687 or (706) 645-9291, and enter the passcode 33141799. Additionally, a live webcast will be available at http://intercallus.stream57.com/Rodobo_122110
About Rodobo International, Inc.
Rodobo International, Inc. is a producer and distributor of powdered milk formula products in the People's Republic of China ("PRC" or "China"). The Company's target consumers include infants, children, the middle-aged and the elderly in China. The Company's products for infants and children are currently sold under the brand names of "Rodobo" and "Peer", and its products for middle-aged and elderly consumers are currently sold under the brand name of "Healif".

description.hltext_display: Funespana stock tops risers on Continuous Market at Tuesday close
description.content: - The shares in Spanish funeral services company Funespana (MCE:FUN) surged by 12.14% to EUR 7.30 on the Continuous Market at close on Tuesday, thus topping the risers' list. The significant increase was attributed to the merger agreement reached between Funespana and home sector player Gesmap, wholly owned by Spain's insurer Mapfre (MCE:MAP). On Monday in a filing with the national stock market regulator CNMV, the entities explained that under the agreement Funespana would absorb Gesmap. Afterwards it will launch a capital hike placing some 3.511 million shares. Thus, Mapfre will control 45.12% in Funespana, so it will be obliged to initiate a takeover bid for the latter. (EUR 1.0 = USD 1.315)

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
Christopher Furlong/WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: The Best Natural Sources of Vitamin and Minerals for Your Horses
description.author: tedstinson
description.content: Modern horse owners and trainers provide their horses with vitamins and minerals as part of their daily diet. They are a very important necessity. Vitamins, while essential, are needed in lesser quantities than other nutrients, however. Each type of vitamin has a specific job in the horse's body. So you'll want to be sure it gets the required amounts every day. Proper nutrition means providing your horse with the correct balance of vitamins and minerals depending on its age, weight, and use. You are never supposed to make a guess at what the right amounts are.In most instances, a horse can received the vitamins it needs in its food. Others are usually produced internally. However, if a horse's diet isn't as healthy as it should be it will be missing many of these vitamins and minerals. If this is the case, you may have to begin providing vitamin supplements to your horse. Here some of the more popular equine supplements and sources of Vitamins and Minerals:You can find Vitamin A in carrots as well as leafy green vegetables.Vitamin B is an important vitamin found in grains but you can still provide equine supplements containing Vitamin B even if your horse is getting it through the grain in its diet. Vitamin B12 can be a little difficult to find in supplement form. It can be found in herbal form, so ask your veterinarian about which herbs to use.Bioflavinoids are often supplied with Buckwheat to help promote strong blood vessels.Many home owners use fresh greens to provide Vitamin C to their horses. If your horse can't get to a pasture with plenty of green vegetation, some horse owners will use various flavors of tea bags as a way to supplement all the Vitamin C and Iron missing from its diet.Your horse will need some choline in its daily diet so make sure it gets to eat bitter vegetables and Dandelion leaves. You can again use supplements or simply let some dandelions grow around the yard. Your horse can just eat them when it feels like.Vitamin E is often found in fresh wheat germ, a commercial source of both E's and B's. A little fresh wheat germ for those horses not on grains is all that is required. Anything more expensive or more processed is nonsense.

description.hltext_display: Ashland City seeks flood recovery funds
description.content:
Ashland City is making application for up to $500,000 in flood recovery funds from the Tennessee Department of Economic and Community Development. The City Council approved a resolution last week allowing the city to pursue a Tennessee Disaster & Recovery Grant. The program is being overseen by the states ECD office.
Mayor Gary Norwood said funds are available to counties and cities affected by Mays flood.
If approved, the $500,000 will be used to purchase a generator for the wastewater treatment plant, which was damaged in the flood, as well as other items that FEMA won't pay for as part of its mitigation program, the mayor said.
In other business, the council approved a $44,000 bid for the purchase of a bucket truck. The citys previous truck was damaged in Mays flood. The truck being purchased is a 2006 model and has 70,000 miles. The bid is contingent upon the trucks inspection.
The council approved a resolution supporting the Cheatham County hazard mitigation plan. The county and all four cities must adopt the plan.
Agreements with Andrea Lane and Margaret Holman were approved that allows them to teach exercise and computer classes, respectively, at the Senior Center at Ashland City.
Council members questioned if computer classes should continue being offered at the center because of the small amount of people taking them. The council agreed to take a look at that during the 2011-2012 budget process.
In addition, the council approved the annual Greater Nashville Regional Council contract for the senior center. The $26,000 from the GNRC goes toward health education and building maintenance.
City attorney Jennifer Noe announced that Judge Robert E. Burch ruled in late November that the lease for the citys boat slip at the Harpeth Shoals Marina was approved through 2013. She also said electricity is back up at the marina and work is being done on the fuel dock.
Police chief Marc Coulon announced that the city is looking into electronic ticketing. He said the state will go that route at some point in the future.
With e-ticketing, Coulon said an electronic system will print out one paper copy for the violator, while authorities will receive the data electronically.

description.hltext_display: 将建500米高楼
description.content:
CBD核心地块中，Z15地块位于整个区域中间地带北端，未来将建成北京第一高楼（效果图）。
图为Z15地块夜景鸟瞰效果图。图据北京日报
中服地块招标终于尘埃落定。北京市土地整理储备中心昨日公布，CBD核心区Z15地块花落中信集团，Z14地块由正大集团、玖龙纸业等11家企业组成的联合体获得。Z15地块是此次出让的CBD地块中规划建筑面积最大的一幅，达35万平方米。据招标文件要求，该地块上将建成未来“北京第一高楼”，建筑高度达到500米(视最终公布的招标方案)。
Z15楼面价18000元/平米
在CBD核心地块中，Z15地块位于整个区域中间地带北端，北侧是光华路，南侧是规划绿地。据招标文件要求，该地块上将建成500米高的未来“北京第一高楼”，而目前北京最高建筑国贸三期的高度为330米。
中服地块招标分为两个阶段。第一阶段投标中，Z15地块吸引了包括中信集团、大连万达、SOHO中国在内的26家企业投标，成为投标企业最多的三地块之一。中信集团、大连万达在第一阶段投标中分列前两名。12月7日的第二阶段投标中，中信集团、大连万达和海航集团三家企业投标，报价分别为63亿元、45亿元和59.5亿元。大连万达由于报价未达到招标底价而自动出局。最终，经过综合评标，中信集团在和海航的对决中胜出。
虽然63亿元的总价刷新了北京土地出让的新纪录，但业内普遍认为，Z15楼面价18000元/平米并不高。据了解，CBD核心区住宅普遍为4万-5万元/平米，部分在售楼盘价格超8万元/平米。
据中信方面透露，Z15地块将被规划为中信集团总部大楼。

description.hltext_display: 農業縣哭窮 綠縣長籲修財劃、公債法
description.content: 五都將在25號正式改制升� �，不過沒有升� �的農業縣卻擔憂財政的問題將雪上� 霜。民進黨籍的宜蘭、嘉義、雲林和屏東縣長今天北上立法院陳情。每一位縣長都強調年關將近，縣府恐怕連員工的薪水、年終獎金和積� 的工程款都付不出來，要求中央應該儘速修訂公債法和財政收支劃分法，解決財源分配的問題。嘉義縣長張花� 強調，不能� 為五都升� �，就讓農業縣的民眾成了四等甚至五等公民。(李人岳� �導)五都改制升� �進入倒數計時，不過沒有升� �的縣市卻擔憂財政困境雪上� 霜，民進黨籍的宜蘭、嘉義、雲林和屏東縣長22日北上立法院陳情。屏東縣長曹啟鴻抨擊，五都升� �，等於是「把台灣亂掉了」。宜蘭縣長林聰賢則指出，從精省至今，宜蘭縣的債務已經累積到292億元之多。林聰賢說，眼看年關將近，宜蘭縣的財務恐怕還短少大約30億元，連員工的薪水、年終獎金和工程款都恐怕付不出來。嘉義縣長張花� 感嘆「升� �成功就是院轄市，升� �不成就什麼都不是」，她強調，嘉義縣政府每年的花費大約207億元，年年的短差達到了30億。� 營縣市長要求，中央應該儘速修訂公債法和財政收支劃分法，解決財源分配的問題。立院黨團則進一步主張，反對中央集權又集錢的做法，要求降低中央對財源分配的主導權，財政部也應該公佈，閣揆所掌握的4%統籌款究竟是如何運用，而且應該納入統籌分配款中一併分配。

description.hltext_display: I think you might be on to something there, Vonage. The ...
description.content:
The Eastern Parkway will soon have a new name, but its opening may be delayed because of the bitter cold seen in the area.
The Anniston City Council will be selecting a new name for the Eastern Parkway and the Industrial Access Road at McClellan that will allow commuters to avoid heavy Quintard traffic when coming into McClellan once they open. The Council needs to select the name before the latest leg of the road opens, and today’s council meeting may be its last chance since the council may cancel its second meeting in December.
So far, the city has a few names turned into the city by e-mail and a few the councilmen have come up with themselves. Mayor Gene Robinson said the list of about ten suggestions will have to be whittled down before the meeting.
“I’ll probably take a poll right in between the meetings,” Robinson said. “Maybe we can narrow them down to a few names and then we’ll discuss them and vote. I think we pretty well have to do it this time.”
Councilman Ben Little said he was open to just about any name, but he’d like to stay away from naming it after a person.
“I think a simple name,” Little said. “The main thing is getting the road open, getting some traffic.”
The road had been scheduled to open by the end of the year. However, the cold has held up construction.
“Mainly it’s the temperatures,” said Tony Harris, spokesman for ALDOT. “Below a certain temperature it’s not suitable for asphalt paving.”
There is a small amount of work left to do, and once the weather conditions improve, ALDOT can get in and finish up, he said.
The work at McClellan that will connect the Parkway with the Industrial Access Road, though is nearly finished, Calhoun County engineer Brian Rosenbalm said.
“The work we had was not dependent upon the temperature as much as what ALDOT was doing,” Rosenbalm said. “Really the only thing that we’re lacking now is the guard rail.”
The work at McClellan has been underway for quite some time and the Anniston Public Works Department has funded $93,724 of the work preparing roads for the traffic expected once the Parkway opens, said City Manager Don Hoyt. The department will ask the City Council to reimburse it out of the bond money that was allocated for the aquatic center and infrastructure work at McClellan.
The Parkway, however, was expected to be done ahead of schedule and the work needed to be completed before it opened.
“At the time that needed to be done, the bond wasn’t complete,” Hoyt said. “Now it’s complete.”
So, the department did much of the work internally, contracting out just $25,000 of the work.
“The money that he spent on this project took a big chunk out of Public Works’ budget,” Hoyt said. “If they don’t put it back in with the bond money, that’s almost $100,000 out of Public Works’ budget that was budgeted for other things.”
That means scheduled work in other parts of Anniston would go undone.
Contact staff writer Laura Camper at 256-235-3545.

description.hltext_display: Abia gov�s wife drums support for husband
description.content:
WIFE of Abia state governor, Chief (Mrs.) Mercy Odochi Orji has urged various campaign organisations working for the re-election of her husband to form a strong alliance and work in unity for the actualisation of the project.
Mrs. Orji said that her office would continue to play complimentary governance roles to promote the good programmes and policies of the her husband�s government aimed at improving the living standard of the citizenry .
Speaking at an interactive session with one of the governor�s campaign support organisation, �The Great Ladies of Osinulo�, Chief (Mrs.) Orji noted that her office does not dictate the running of the government and sharing of the political positions but in carries out humanitarian and charitable works that touches the lives of indigent particularly women and widows, children, and the less privileged positively as well as in moblising the youths,
She urged the groups to align themselves with other pro-Ochendo campaign associations and with the women�s wing of Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) leadership in the state to form a strong synergy in line with the party�s guidelines in the campaign for the re-election of the governor in view of the good works he has been doing for the state.
The wife of the governor charged the association to work hard at various local governments to actualize the re-election of the governor during the 2011 election and further warned them against undue soliciting of fund from political aspirants and politicians in the state.
Speaking earlier, secretary of the Ochendo Campaign Organization, Dr. (Mrs.) Rose Ekeleme said that the organization as a formidable force would ensure the re-election of the governor come 2011 and enjoin them to ensure active mobilization and participation during the voter registration exercise to enable them exercise their franchise during the election.

Mrs. Orji said that her office would continue to play complimentary governance roles to promote the good programmes and policies of the her husband�s government aimed at improving the living standard of the citizenry .

She urged the groups to align themselves with other pro-Ochendo campaign associations and with the women�s wing of Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) leadership in the state to form a strong synergy in line with the party�s guidelines in the campaign for the re-election of the governor in view of the good works he has been doing for the state.
The wife of the governor charged the association to work hard at various local governments to actualize the re-election of the governor during the 2011 election and further warned them against undue soliciting of fund from political aspirants and politicians in the state.

Also speaking, director of Women Affairs of the campaign organisation, Dame Amarachi Dede said that the large turn out of women from various local governments shows that women in the state are totally behind the re-election bid of the governor.

description.hltext_display: Williamsburg man convicted on federal firearm charge
description.content:
NEWPORT NEWS – Mark Xavier Wallace, also known as Mark Xavier Grinage II, was convicted Friday by a federal jury of being a felon in possession of a firearm.
Wallace, 29, of Williamsburg, faces a maximum sentence of 10 years when he sentenced March 22.
According to court records and evidence at trial, police responded to the parking lot of the Blurr Bistro and Lounge in Newport News last June after hearing gunfire. As they entered the parking lot, they saw Wallace holding a firearm. Wallace raised his weapon toward the officers, leading one officer to fire at him. Wallace immediately dropped to the ground and threw his weapon toward the curb, where it was recovered.
Forensic analysis determined that the firearm, a 9mm Glock 19 handgun, had fired the rounds for which nine shell casings were found in another section of the parking lot. Wallace was taken into custody.

description.hltext_display: Comentario de Mercado (22/12/2010)
description.content: Para hoy esperamos...Principales citas macroeconómicasEn Estados Unidos destacamos el PIB 3T10 final, que se espera muestre un crecimiento del +2,8% i.a mejorando el dato preliminar (+2,5% i.a), que ya se revisó al alza desde el inicial +2%. Asimismo se publicarán los componentes consumo personal, índice de precios del PIB y el deflactor del consumo privado. En el sector inmobiliario ventas de viviendas de segunda mano con esperada mejora en términos mensuales en noviembre (+7,2%e vs -2,2% previo) e índice de precios de viviendas. En Europa, dato final del PIB 3T10 en Reino Unido y actas de la reunión del Banco de InglaterraMercadosPara hoy esperamos apertura sin grandes variaciones en las bolsas europeas, a la espera del dato final de PIB 3T10 en Estados Unidos, donde podríamos ver una nueva revisión al alza hasta el +2,8% intertrimestral anualizado, señal de que la economía americana mantiene un buen tono y en breve se situará en niveles previos a la crisis (aunque con un nivel de empleo bastante inferior). Asimismo, confirmaremos que el sector inmobiliario en aquel país continúa deprimido.En el plano de riesgo soberano asociado al elevado endeudamiento público, buenas noticias en cuanto a ejecución presupuestaria en España, donde ayer conocimos datos del déficit del Estado entre enero y noviembre, período en el que ha ascendido al 3,68% del PIB, tras caer un 46% en los primeros nueve meses del año. Esta positiva evolución permite anticipar el cumplimiento del objetivo 2010 (6,7%), y se suma a los esperanzadores datos de ejecución presupuestaria de las CCAA (hasta 3T10, acumulan un déficit del 1,24% del PIB, en línea para cumplir con el objetivo anual del 2,4%, aún cuando existen importantes divergencias entre comunidades).La crisis de deuda soberana europea podría tener asimismo un nuevo apoyo para alcanzar una solución: China parece dispuesta a ayudar a la Eurozona a resolver este problema, si bien por el momento los diferenciales continúan bastante tensionados, en un entorno de continuos avisos por parte de las agencias de calificación crediticia de posibles revisiones a la baja de ratings (Portugal, España, Grecia...). Aún con todo, Moody´s afirmó ayer que el riesgo de default era reducido (sólo Grecia se sitúa por debajo de grado de inversión).En lo que respecta a niveles técnicos: Ibex 9.800-10.400 puntos (rango más amplio: 9.200-11.000 puntos), Eurostoxx 2.630-2.900 puntos y S&P500 1.170 - 1.250 puntos (rango más amplio: 1.120 - 1.300 puntos).Principales citas empresarialesEn España, repartirán dividendo: Viscofán, BME (Estutgart: A0H1NA - noticias) y CHL (CHLLTD.BO - noticias) .

description.hltext_display: Aburto dice que "quieren cargar" a la Diputación la huelga en Metro
description.content:
Bilbao. Juan Mari Aburto, diputado de Acción Social y portavoz de la Diputación Foral de Bizkaia, aseguró ayer que el conflicto del metro se podía haber solucionado mucho antes "sin llegar a generar una situación de incertidumbre". "En 15 años es la primera vez que se ha llegado a una situación así en un servicio valorado por la ciudadanía de manera extraordinaria y, además, en unas fechas donde también es un servicio indispensable", aseguró. En relación a esta cuestión, Aburto mostró su satisfacción y se alegró por el acuerdo alcanzado, aunque denunció la intención de "poner al pie de los caballos" a la Diputación de Bizkaia. "Ya está bien de mentir a la ciudadanía y de generar conflictos innecesarios", destacó el portavoz foral.
En opinión del diputado, "nadie quiere el conflicto por el conflicto", aunque, prosiguió, "siempre hay quien está preocupado por vender y trasladar esa idea a la ciudadanía". En este sentido, el responsable foral dijo que los políticos "estamos para dar soluciones y no para generar una y otra vez conflictos. Haciendo las cosas bien, sentándose en una mesa como se ha hecho, se podía haber resuelto el problema antes". No obstante, señaló que, en el consejo general del Consorcio de Transporte de Bizkaia (CTB) -celebrado el pasado lunes- se trató un punto fuera del orden del día en el que, en referencia al conflicto en Metro Bilbao, se apuntaba que "la ampliación de horario en estas fechas -refiriéndose a Nochebuena- implica un mejor servicio para el ciudadano" y añadía que "se trata de dar cumplimiento a una proposición no de norma de la Diputación Foral de Bizkaia y una proposición no de ley del Parlamento vasco", leyó textualmente lo recogido en el marco del consejo del CTB. "¿No les suena algo raro?", preguntó en la rueda de prensa el diputado. "Qué curioso que alguien tenga la mala fe constante de pensar y de poner al pie de los caballos a la Diputación Foral de Bizkaia", porque, según aclaró "la Diputación no hace proposiciones no de norma. Las hacen las Juntas Generales, el Parlamento de Bizkaia". "Esto no es un error. Está lleno de intención y se pretende, en todo caso, cargar con el conflicto a la Diputación". En relación a la proposición no de norma a la que hacía referencia, Aburto aclaró que "la norma recogía que el suburbano abriese en Nochebuena, previo acuerdo con los sindicatos". "Eso es lo que decía la proposición no de norma del Parlamento vizcaino", insistió el diputado. "Agitador" Por su parte, el grupo del PSE-EE en Juntas Generales acusó al diputado general, José Luis Bilbao, de haber actuado como un "agitador" de la huelga en el metro al responsabilizar a los gestores socialistas del suburbano de provocar el conflicto que llevaba a la celebración de los paros.
En un comunicado, el PSE-EE consideró que Bilbao estará "decepcionado" por el acuerdo logrado entre la dirección del metro y la mayoría del comité de empresa para desconvocar los paros parciales. Los socialistas creen que el diputado general "estaba deseando" que se realizara la huelga para "tener un nuevo argumento para golpear a los responsables" de Metro Bilbao y del CTB. El diputado foral cree que se podía haber llegado a un acuerdo mucho antes

description.hltext_display: 北京CBD地块以63亿出让刷新纪录
description.content:
北京市土地整理储备中心21日发布公告显示，中国中信集团公司以63亿元竞得朝阳区东三环北京商务中心区(CBD )核心区Z15地块国有建设用地使用权，刷新了今年以来北京土地出让的总价纪录。
招标公告显示，本次招标出让的Z15地块位于朝阳区光华路CBD核心区，具体四至范围是：东至金和东路；南至规划绿地；西至金和路；北至光华路。建筑使用性质为商业金融用地，建筑控制规模达35万平方米。（王涛）

description.hltext_display: Obi commiserates with fire victims, pledges support
description.content:
GOVERNOR Peter Obi of Anambra State at the weekend visited Uli to commiserate with victims of the tanker fire which destroyed several houses and goods worth millions o naira.
Speaking during the visit, a pensive Governor Obi said that such a disaster was the last thing he wished for the state. He added that he was usually pained when any part of the State suffered in any way, especially when there was already hardship in the state as in other part of the country. The Governor remarked that Government was working round the clock to ameliorate the situation.
Obi, who had earlier sent a commissioner to assess the damage and directed the State Emergency Management Agency to pay attention to the incident, said he felt compelled to visit in person to show how dispirited he was.
He said that those affected would be compensated, noting that he would appeal to the Power Holding Company of Nigeria (PHCN) to replace the burnt wire and restore electricity to the affected houses.

Obi, who had earlier sent a commissioner to assess the damage and directed the State Emergency Management Agency to pay attention to the incident, said he felt compelled to visit in person to show how dispirited he was.
He said that those affected would be compensated, noting that he would appeal to the Power Holding Company of Nigeria (PHCN) to replace the burnt wire and restore electricity to the affected houses.
The Member representing Ihiala 1 Constituency, in the state assembly, Hon. Simeon Ohajianya said that he was humbled by the way issues affecting any part of the state touched the governor. In his words: �When I informed him about the disaster, he was touched. For once, one could see a governor who is passionate about the welfare of his people. If you do not love this state, after dealing with the governor, you will be inspired to love the state.�

description.hltext_display: Hill's strategy pays off for Overbrook, in win over Edison
description.author: TED SILARY
description.content:
And then? "I'll blow right by 'em," he said. "I can always do that. On anybody." Hill is a 5-8, 143-pound senior point guard for Overbrook High. But he played last winter for A. Philip Randolph and was still enrolled there for roughly the first month of this school year.
The more Samir badgered his mom, Tamika, the more she resisted. "She was the one that put me in Randolph in the first place," he said. "I live right down the street from 'Brook [at 56th and Lansdowne] and she was worried about what might happen if I was around too many of my friends." The ever-slick Samir devised a plan. "I started waking up late," he said, smiling. "I was really tired there for a while." Finally, with further nudging from Samir's brother, Kyle, Mom caved in. "Know what she's saying now?'You shoulda been goin' to 'Brook,' " he said. "I'm glad she finally made the decision. It's working out much better. I'm having no problems at school and the basketball is much better. It's nice being so close, too." Overbrook's glory days are long gone, of course, but the Panthers/Hilltoppers do compete in the Public League division (A) with the large-enrollment schools. And yesterday with 11 points, five rebounds, one assist and four steals, Hill helped them cruise to victory.
The final score vs. visiting Thomas Edison was 42-35. That's misleading, however. The count after three quarters was 34-17 and the Owls' late mini-rush came mostly against deep subs.
For Randolph, located along Henry Avenue at the foot of East Falls, Hill, a lefty, last year averaged just under 14 points. "That's the lower level of the Pub, though," he said. "It's kind of like corny points. No one really notices. It's hard to get college attention. I had to count on AAU ball for that. "I just thought it would help me to come here. Plus, I know a lot of these guys. I was friends with them before I joined the basketball team." Hill's skills were not exactly viewed by the masses. The administration did not allow regular spectators for this home opener because of some recent in-school issues, according to coach Freddie Stokes and athletic director Ken Sturm. The "crowd" numbered maybe 30, and most of those guys were JV players awaiting the start of their own practice.
No figures can be provided on how many witnesses fell asleep. This was not a classic, hoopheads. The teams combined to shoot 26-for-94 from the floor (Edison was 12-for-46) and there were long stretches where the only scoring took place at the line.
The Owls inadvertantly hurt their own cause. After Curtis Greer (21 points) drained two early treys, 'Brook switched from zone to man-to-man. Edison scored 11 points over the next 21 1/2 minutes. "We have a lot of guys who are new to varsity," Hill said. "They're not really sure of their assignments [in a zone]. Coach Stokes felt we had to go man. We gave them trouble." Like many Pub teams, Edison's lineup includes one big guy and guard after guard after guard. Due to incessant foul trouble, 6-2 junior Michael Fuller (I guess that qualifies as big) had to settle for one point and two rebounds. Overbrook's primary frontcourt guys, Brandon Fulton and Alonzo Carmelo, totaled nine points/14 rebounds and 11/six, respectively.
Football player Dante Glover, a sub, had an impact right before halftime. First he bullied for a three-point play. Then he made a steal and steamed downcourt. Though he missed the layup, Raymond Mills converted the follow and 'Brook headed for the locker room with a 20-12 pad.
Playing hoops for Randolph isn't easy, especially for someone not from that neighborhood. The school plays all games away. It practices in a rec center right behind Murrell Dobbins Tech, with which it partners for football. "They have no gyms, anywhere, at Randolph," Hill said. "All they have is a weight room." He laughed. "Hey, I'm trying to get taller before I think about getting stronger."

description.hltext_display: 成品油價格上調凸顯政府兩難
description.content:
成品油價� �從22日起開始上調，此次上調表明成品油定價機制改革并沒� 為控制通脹引起的物價上漲而停止，這也反� 出政府在抑制通脹和理� �資源品定價機制問題上的兩難。據新聞晚� �12月22日� �導，22日零時起，柴油、汽油價� �每噸分別提高300元和310元。調整幅度低於此前市� �� �期，時間上顯得有些出其不意。此次上調傳遞出這樣的信息，一是表明成品油定價機制改革并沒� 為控制通脹引起的物價上漲而停止，但原定於年內出臺的方案有可能推遲到明年一季度；二是很大程度上可以緩解持續幾個月以來部分地方的“柴油荒”，減輕了石油巨� �的壓力。但同時也反� 出政府在抑制通脹和理� �資源品定價機制問題上的兩難。據發改委的解釋，這次成品油價� �仍然是� �據現行價� �機制進行調整的，10月26日國內成品油價� �調整以來，國際市� �油價持續震蕩上揚。特別是進入12月以后，受主要經濟體經濟回升以及寒冷天氣帶動取暖需求增長等� � 影響，國際市� �油價大幅走高。截至目前國際市� �原油連續22個工作日平均價� �已超過4%，按現行成品油價� �機制，應適當上調國內成品油價� �。實際上到11月底就達到了上漲的條件。但11月底以來市� �多次� �期上調都曾落空，主要原� 是11月份CPI5.1%創年內新高，如果上調勢必會進一步推高CPI，基於這樣的考慮才會一次次推遲；為什么會選擇這個時候上調，國家發改委在等待各地蔬菜價� �回落，在通脹的壓力有所減弱之后， 11月份以來的物價調控手段或許已經收到了一定效果，� �計12月份的CPI可能會出現一定程度的緩解才擇機上調。至於成品油價� �上調是否會影響未來CPI，對此專家的觀點是影響不大，環比大概0.07個百分點。而且在CPI構成中，成品油所� 比重本身就不大。至於人們普遍關心的成品油是否會進一步上調，此次上調效應是否會向下游傳導，從而引發消費品價� �的上揚，這不僅需要進一步觀察，更關鍵的是取決於資源品定價機制的改進。但包括成品油在內的資源品價� �定價機制的改革明顯受制於下半年以來的物價上漲， 10月份以后，政府甚至不惜動用行政手段來控制物價上漲，尤其是消費品價� �上漲，� 此資源品定價機制似乎被市� �所忽視。可以理解的是，在物價上漲壓力較大的情況下，國家仍然� �持按現行價� �機制提高國內成品油價� �是經過慎重考慮的，是從國家經濟全局和長� 發展角度作出的選擇，目的是� �持資源性產品價� �形成機制改革的方向，調動企業生產和進口積極性，保障國內市� �供應，同時也不至於引發物價上漲的失控。而資源品定價機制改革的� �心是除調價周期縮短外，在定價操作方式上也有較大改變，“自動調價”應是改革方向，所謂的自動調價，就是成品油零售限價將由發改委� �據既定的規則決定，達到調價的標準自動上調，不用再上� �國務院批準。這將在很大程度上提升國內零售價跟國內外市� �行情接軌的速度。對百姓而言，只要盯住市� �價� �的波動信息就可以了，這樣即使各類資源品的價� �臨時變動也不至於驚慌失措。總的來說，這次上調的幅度肯定還沒到“� �”，關鍵� � 還是“通盤考慮國內通貨膨脹的結果”。但政府的良苦用心顯而易見，� 為10月、11月CPI上漲的速度實在太快了，政府要對通脹進行急剎車，在此背景下，調得晚一些，在幅度上小一些，也是可以理解。但從經濟學的角度來看，調價應該做到盡量與國際原油價� �接軌，上漲幅度應該相對應，這樣才能反� 成品油的真正價值。(王敏 編輯)
免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。
世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
Christopher Furlong/WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: Movies | Lisa Kennedy "Bromance" bred Firth's portrayal
description.author: Lisa Kennedy
description.content:
/scriptColin Firth, left, and Geoffrey Rush in "The King's Speech." (Laurie Sparham, The Weinstein Co. ) if(requestedWidth 0)}
In "The King's Speech," the Duke of York walks up a flight of stairs at a stadium. Portrayed by Colin Firth, Bertie, as he's known to his family, looks like a condemned man approaching the gallows, not a member of the royal family addressing British subjects live and via radio.
If not his executioner, the microphone is very much his nemesis. And one might mistake the initial choppiness in Bertie's address for feedback.
It is not. It is a stammer.
In this wise and entertaining drama, Firth is the duke who would become King George VI and Geoffrey Rush is Lionel Logue, the rather unorthodox Australian speech therapist whom the duke and Bertie's wife, Elizabeth (Helena Bonham Carter), consult. The film opens on Christmas Day.
At the Telluride Film Festival in September, Firth described the film and his time spent with Rush and director Tom Hooper as something of a "bromance." It was a lovely jest, with a fine bit of truth to it. The relationship between the two very different characters and the on-screen energy between the actors is a marvel. It is both a tribute to a very unexpected friendship and a generous master class in tandem performance.
His experience, said Firth on the phone recently, was very different from the often lonesome work he did in last year's "A Single Man." For his turn as grieving college professor George Falconer in the elegiac drama set in 1962, he was nominated for an Oscar.
"It is much easier when you have another person in front of you, especially when they have an energy, an almost capricious unpredictability of a Geoffrey Rush. He made it terribly, terribly easy," Firth said.
"So much of the time in 'A Single Man,' I was alone. When Julianne (Moore) showed up it suddenly was incredibly easy to do. With Geoffrey, I felt I got so much for nothing."
Next month, Firth is sure to be the recipient of his second best-actor Oscar nomination in as many years. A good measure of things to come, the Screen Actors Guild announced its nominees Thursday morning and "The King's Speech" triumvirate Firth, Rush and Bonham Carter got nods. Yes, for more than two decades the actor has been winning in comedies (from "Bridget Jones's Diary" to "Love Actually" to "Mamma Mia!") and commanding in dramas (from "Another Country" to "Valmont" to "Girl With a Pearl Earring"). And no writer is allowed by Firth's fans to proceed without mention of Mr. Darcy in the BBC production of "Pride and Prejudice" (though the actor himself doesn't share their attachment).
Still, there was a new mastery in "A Single Man." And the 50-year-old actor has followed that with his full-bodied portrait of a wounded and prideful royal.
From the moment he arrived on set, "my family had to say goodbye to me," Firth said, talking about director Hooper's "uncompromising" brilliance. "When it was time to go home and everyone had packed up, Geoffrey and I would be sitting in my trailer, still talking about tomorrow. A lot of that was making each other laugh, which I think spills onto the screen. But Tom set the tone for that."
A gifted actor
Firth has a gift for depicting anguish, no matter what stirs it. In "A Single Man," George answers a phone call with a sweet quip, believing it's his partner calling from a trip. It isn't. Jim has died in a car accident. The caller hangs up, having made it clear George is not invited to the burial. The world, beginning with Firth's visage, slowly implodes.
In "The King's Speech," the actor captures with wincing face, faltering voice, but also every fiber of his body, the defeat of a man who, born into great responsibilities, must lead at a particularly grave and challenging moment.
The winds of World War II are gathering. Bertie's voice must carry his nation. Yet he can't even tell a bedtime story to his daughters.
Good actors are agents for empathy. And the conversation turns to the burdens and ethics of representing another's suffering.
"The hardest role for me to shake off ever was 'Tumbledown,' " Firth said, recalling one of his earlier roles. In the 1988 BBC drama about the battle of Mount Tumbledown in the Falklands, he portrayed Robert Lawrence, a member of the Scots Guard who was shot in the head by a sniper and lived.
"Because I played somebody real, not only real but someone my own age, it was very immediate," he said. At the time, the actor went to live with Lawrence, to immerse himself in the wounded man's life.
"His experiences were extremely harrowing and sharing them was not easy. Robert saw terrible things. And he did terrible things. He had to live with them. He dreamt about them." Firth paused. "It sounds a bit wanky when actors talk about what they went through to do a role. But it is enough to fire one's imagination. I found that stuck with me for a very long time."
The link between Lawrence and King George VI is a vital one. "You are telling a story of someone who has really suffered, and in the case of stammering, people do suffer, especially a lot of children. If you're one of the few people who gets to represent it on-screen, it's not something you can take lightly. You don't want to misrepresent. You don't want to undersell it. It's terribly important to me that it's not inauthentic."
Film critic Lisa Kennedy: 303-954-1567 or lkennedy@denverpost.com. Also on blogs.denverpostcom/ madmoviegoer

description.hltext_display: 八大红脸
description.content:
在即将过去的2010年，一张张熟悉的面孔折射出了中国经济领域和资本市场发生的积极进展和重大变化。我们将他们统称为“财经红脸”。
2010年，面对复杂多变的国内外经济形势以及自然界的严峻挑战，中国经济发展和调整牢牢把握了主动权，加快转变发展方式，加强和改善宏观调控，发挥市场机制作用，有效巩固和扩大了应对国际金融危机冲击的成果。
伴随国民经济逐步进入又好又快发展的轨道，中国股市稳定运行，改革创新措施稳步推出，资本市场层次、机制得到了进一步完善。
在这些“财经红脸”中，我们可以读出这些代表人物在经济转型时期的从容和淡定，可以读出推进改革创新的决心和意志，可以读到源自中国特色的自豪和勇气，可以读到登高远望、放眼世界的开放情怀。
今日，本报推出《2010年中国八大财经红脸》专题，与广大读者一起回味这些面孔背后的故事，也一起期待更具活力和更让人兴奋的2011年。
1、袁仁国（贵州茅台酒股份有限公司董事长）
入选理由：沪深两市第二高价股、沪市第一高价股贵州茅台从2001年开始，已实现连续9年向投资者发放现金红利，每股达到5.0693元。袁仁国近日撰文提出，五年一个刻度，跃上新台阶；五年一个跨越，实现翻一番。我们将励精图治，让原定的目标提速，尽可能前进得更快一些。
产品高零售价、高股价、高分红，贵州茅台是典型的“三高”股票。袁仁国认为，作为国酒，茅台品牌是一种独特的文化结晶。
面对外界对茅台明年元旦起涨价20%的各种质疑声，在安徽合肥茅台2010年度全国经销商联谊会上，袁仁国首次回应称，涨价主要是三个理由，一是兼顾各种利益，二是供不应求，三是要削减经销商利润。
从2005年到2010年，茅台出厂价上涨了一倍，但零售价几乎翻了三番，以茅台53度飞天为例，此次提价前其出厂价为499元，但终端零售价却一直维持1100多元的高价运营，600多元的价差让经销商赚取了高额的利润。
同时，为控制零售价格大幅上涨，茅台出台了历史上最严格的限价政策，加大限价力度，严惩经销商违规哄抬价格的行为，并同时发布限价令，即茅台终端零售价格不得高于企业制定的销售限价，最新的限价为959元。一旦发现经销商超过959元的价格，将罚款或取消专卖权等。
与市场上的茅台高零售价向对应的是，贵州茅台的股价以接近200元的价格排名沪市第一、沪深两市第二。复权后，贵州茅台的价格超过了800元。
高零售价、高股价带来的是高分红。据统计，贵州茅台从2001年开始，已实现连续9年向投资者发放现金红利，每股达到5.0693元。在零售价一路高涨、供不应求的情况下，茅台2010年仍销势良好。茅台集团人士称，2010年是茅台发展史上关键的一年，实现产销两旺的良好态势，产量达到2.6万多吨，销售收入有望突破150亿元。这让投资者对贵州茅台今年的分红方案充满了期待。
作为贵州茅台的董事长，袁仁国对公司的发展速度仍不满意。他近日撰文提出，五年一个刻度，跃上新台阶；五年一个跨越，实现翻一番。我们将励精图治，让原定的目标提速，尽可能前进得更快一些。
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 下一页

description.hltext_display: Teilnehmerfeld komplett
description.content:
Das Teilnehmerfeld für den diesjährigen Spengler Cup in Davos ist komplett.
Nach SKA St. Petersburg, Spartak Moskau, Genf-Servette, Team Canada und Gastgeber Davos hat auch Sparta Prag seine Teilnahme am Traditionsturnier in der Altjahreswoche zugesagt. Nach dem neuen Modus spielen die Teams in zwei Dreiergruppen.Sparta Prag ist achtfacher Meister und eines der erfolgreichsten Teams Tschechiens. Einer der schillerndsten Spieler ist Captain David Vyborny, der zwischen 2000 und 2008 sieben Saisons in der NHL bei den Columbus Blue Jackets gespielt hatte.Das Team aus dem Land des Weltmeisters hatte den Spengler Cup in den Jahren 1962 und 1963 gewonnen und stand 2004 im Final. "Dass wir ein weiteres hochkarätiges Team für unser Turnier gewinnen konnten, freut uns sehr und verspricht erstklassiges Eishockey", so OK-Präsident Fredi Pargätzi.

description.hltext_display: New In-demand Market Research Reports by CRI Published by MarketPublishers.com
description.content:
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand are available in its catalogue. . The report makes a prediction on development tendency of the tire industry in the Asia-Pacific region in 2011 to 2015. The research analyses consumption and production of the tire industry in the Asia-Pacific region and provides prediction on development of the tire industry... . The report analyses major European tire enterprises and their operations, provides information on production and consumption on Europe tire industry. The study gives prediction on development tendency of European tire industry … . description.hltext_display: PPG to pay $3.7 mln in export control fines� 21 Dec 2010
description.content:
SHANGHAI - A Chinese subsidiary of U.S.-based PPG Industries Inc. has pled guilty to violating U.S. export controls by exporting high-tech coatings to a nuclear reactor in Pakistan, the U.S. Commerce Department said.
PPG and its wholly owned subsidiary PPG Paints Trading (Shanghai) Co. will pay a combined $3.75 million in fines and forfeit the $32,319 earned by the deal, said a statement seen Wednesday on the website of the department's Bureau of Industry and Security.
It said the fine is one of the biggest ever paid for an export violation. The coatings were sent from the United States to the Pakistan's Chashma 2 Nuclear Power Plant via a Chinese distributor.
Chashma 2 is a nuclear power plant under construction near Kundian, in Pakistan's Punjab province.
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania-based PPG issued a statement saying it acted quickly to investigate and cooperate with the authorities after learning of the violation and has a "long and sustained commitment to compliance with the law."
PPG Paints Trading also will serve five years of "corporate probation" under a plea agreement in the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia in Washington, D.C.
The fine includes $2 million to be paid by PPG Paints Trading and civil penalties of $1.75 million to be paid by PPG Industries and the subsidiary.
The Bureau of Industry and Security will also audit export transactions of PPG and its "relevant business units" in 2011 and 2012, it said.
"This case demonstrates our resolve to vigorously enforce U.S. export law," U.S. Attorney Ronald C. Machen said in the statement. "It should also serve as a warning to corporations that would violate U.S. export laws. It is not only unlawful, it is also bad business."
The violations, between about June 2006 and March 2007, involved exporting the coatings to the Pakistani nuclear facility without having first obtained a required export license.
Pakistan's Atomic Energy Commission and its facilities were added to a list of prohibited export end users following Pakistan's first successful detonation of a nuclear device in 1998.
According to the Commerce Department, PPG Paints Trading sought and failed to get an export license and later agreed to sell the coatings via another, unnamed distributor in China, which was to deliver the products to Pakistan.

event_or_fact.property: This case demonstrates our resolve to vigorously enforce U.S. export law; It should also serve as a warning to corporations that would violate U.S. export laws. It is not only unlawful, it isalso bad business.
