description.hltext_display: Coventry City: Boothroyd to decide on loan players soon
description.content:
City boss may recall on loan players
Coventry City manager Aidy Boothroyd has to decide soon whether to recall his on loan players or to agree to extend their loan deals.
Coventry have three players out on loan, Shaun Jeffers is at Cheltenham, Michael McIndoe is at MK Dons and Jermaine Grandison is at Tranmere Rovers. All three players are scheduled to return to Coventry at the end of the year, so Boothroyd has a week to make a decision.
Boothroyd said, "I`ve been keeping an eye on Michael, he`s had a hamstring injury and he`s been recovering but he played last Saturday so he`s back in the fold and I think come January time with the likes of Michael, Jermaine and Shaun, decisions are going to have to be made on whether they go back out on loan."
" For me, I think the squad we`ve got in numbers is just right at the moment and I don`t want to disrupt that by bringing players back who need to play or bringing people back in who are just going to upset the numbers."
Coventry City had only one payer on loan at The Ricoh and that was Danny Ward from Bolton, but he had to return to his home club back in October to have a hernia operation.
Boothroyd revealed though that Ward no longer figured in his plans. His loan deal with the Sky Blues is set to expire on January 1st 2011, but he has taken s long to get over the operation he will not now return to Coventry City.
Boothroyd said, "Danny`s is the longest hernia in history. The honest answer is I don`t really know (the latest). I sort of took my focus away from Danny when he got injured. He`s had a few complications, his loan is up January 1st so I`m not guessing I`m going to see him too soon as it would take him four weeks to get fit."

description.hltext_display: Breaking News I: adidas, Nike
description.author: financial.de
description.content:
adidas: Der Konzern rechnet einem Bericht der „Börsen-Zeitung" zufolge unter Berufung auf den CEO, Herbert Hainer, damit, dass der Konzern in den nächsten Jahren mit gegebener Kostenstruktur so wachsen kann, dass hohe Skaleneffekte erzielt werden können. Der Umsatz könnte damit um bis zu 1 Mrd. Euro gesteigert werden. Hainer stellt zudem Effizienzgewinne im Marketing-Budget in Aussicht. Mit dem im November vorgestellten Unternehmensplan Route 2015 zielt der Konzern auf ein durchschnittliches Umsatzwachstum von rund 8% sowie ein Ergebnisplus von 15% pro Jahr ab.
Nike: Der Sportartikelhersteller steigerte in Q2 2010/11 (30.11.) den Umsatz um 10% auf 4,84 (4,41; Marktkonsens: 4,8) Mrd. USD. Die Bruttomarge kletterte auf 45,3% (44,5%). Das Nettoergebnis erhöhte sich um 22% auf 457 (375) Mio. USD bzw. 0,94 (0,76; Marktkonsens: 0,88) USD je Aktie. In H1 2010/11 stieg der Umsatz um 9% auf 10,02 (9,20) Mrd. USD. Die Bruttomarge kletterte auf 46,2% (45,4%), das Nettoergebnis um 14% auf 1,02 (0,89) Mrd. USD bzw. 2,08 (1,80) USD je Aktie. Der Ordereingang für den Zeitraum Dezember bis April erhöhte sich um 11% auf 7,7 Mrd. USD (Marktkonsens: +11,6%). Nachbörslich sank die Aktie um 5,9%.

description.hltext_display: US Poised To Approve Nuclear Arms Pact With Russia
description.content:
Images: WASHINGTON -- The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

description.hltext_display: 2010面孔:名企互殴 富豪散财 新贵套现
description.content:
新世纪第一个十年即将过完，财经界风云正盛。他规划身后，倡导“裸捐”；他遮掩过去，美化学历；他财富登顶，大展宏图；他筹谋“篡权”，玩转资本……他们在2010年得到掌声、骂声，终有一天会获得公正评判。
和谐贡献
陈光标
设计台词：绝不做守财奴！
“为富不仁”四个字多少年来被刻在富人们的额头。然而，江苏黄埔再生资源利用有限公司董事长陈光标的“裸捐”承诺让不少仇富之人傻眼。
2010年9月，巴菲特和比尔·盖茨召集中国50位顶级富豪，在北京共同探讨慈善问题。陈光标在收到“巴比慈善晚宴”邀请之后，宣布将在死后捐出全部财产，成为中国“裸捐”第一人。
事实上，在给予陈光标的赞许声中，也掺杂着不少的质疑声。他屡屡高调的慈善行为被部分批评人士直指为“作秀”。对此，陈光标不以为然。陈光标称，他要告诉世界，中国富人绝不做财富的守财奴，在离开这个世界的时候，把全部财富归还世界，让更多遭遇不幸和贫困的兄弟姐妹共享，自己清清白白地离开这个世界。
也许对于“裸捐”的争议还将继续，但陈光标用自己特立独行的言行，让我们反思慈善的意义。无论如何，一个富人，用自己的慈善举动帮助他人，并带动更多富人加入的行为，是值得赞赏和推崇的，“和谐贡献奖”授予这位慈善家，是当之无愧的。
“无妄之灾”
唐骏
设计台词：造假非我本意，道歉更不能。
被国内知名“学术打假人”方舟子盯上了，新华都集团总裁兼CEO唐骏倒霉了。唐骏一直被视为中国企业界和励志界的“神话”，被冠以“打工皇帝”之名，但“学历门”之后，神话破灭。
事件爆发是在今年的7月，方舟子在微博中称唐骏“日本名古屋大学电子工程学博士”和“美国加州理工大学计算机科学博士”学位为假。方舟子发现，唐骏曾经提到的在美国创业、发明专利等部分经历也不真实。随后唐骏出示的西太平洋大学博士证书则遭到更大嘲笑，方舟子称这张文凭不仅“野鸡”，而且非法。
该事件甚至引发了“西太效应”，“西太”校友纷纷被牵扯出来，诚信备受考验。
日前，因“学历门”而蛰伏5个月之久的唐骏回到媒体视线。12月10日，唐骏在微博上对“学历门”进行回应，大致意思是：我只是疏忽而非造假，不道歉。
“学历门”过后，唐骏坍塌的公共形象还需时间修补，不过生活、工作要继续。“贬唐”者认为，诚信是成功的基础。“挺唐”者辩称，英雄何必问出处。
1 2 3 4 5 下一页

description.hltext_display: Entscheidende Tore der HCD-Rückkehrer
description.content:
Der HCD erfüllte die Pflicht gegen Ambri erst mit reichlicher Verzögerung.
35 Minuten lang mühte sich der HCD gegen den hartnäckigen Tabellenletzten erfolglos ab, ehe Gregory Sciaroni den Widerstand brach. Das 1:1 verkrafteten die Tessiner nicht. Unmittelbar nach der zweiten Pause liess sich Peter Guggisberg beim zweiten Comeback in dieser Saison von keinem Südschweizer aufhalten. Im erst zweiten Einsatz seit seiner schweren Knieverletzung gelangte der ligaweit umworbenste Stürmer zur Torpremiere.Die HCD-Jubel-Minuten zeichneten sich zunächst nicht ab. Ambri war perfekt gestartet. Nach neun Sekunden überwand Adrian Brunner den HCD-Keeper Leonardo Genoni ein erstes (und letztes) Mal. Seit Einführung des Playoff-Modus vor 25 Jahren leuchtete die Torlampe nur viermal früher. Davos - Ambri-Piotta 3:1 (0:1, 1:0, 2:0). - Vaillant-Arena. - 3199 Zuschauer. - SR Mandioni, Kehrli/Kohler. - Tore: 1. (0:09) Brunner (Stirnimann) 0:1. 36. Sciaroni (Ausschluss Landry) 1:1. 41. Guggisberg (Reto von Arx, Sejna) 2:1. 59. Sejna (Guggisberg) 3:1. - Strafen: 5mal 2 Minuten gegen Davos, 3mal 2 Minuten gegen Ambri-Piotta. - PostFinance-Topskorer: Reto von Arx; Eric Landry.Davos: Genoni; Stoop, Forster; Ramholt, Grossmann; Cook, Back; Guggisberg, Reto von Arx, Steinmann; Sykora, Marha, Sejna; Sciaroni, Rizzi, Dino Wieser; Marc Wieser, Joggi, Tallarini.Ambri-Piotta: Croce (57. bis 59. Bäumle); Casserini, Kutlak; Uinter Guerra, Denissow; Randegger, Stirnimann; Marghitola; Duca, Kariya, Brunner; Walker, Landry, Meier; Incir, Bianchi, Demuth; Botta, Zanetti, Isabella.Bemerkungen: HCD ohne Taticek (gesperrt), Bednar (verletzt), Jan von Arx (krank), Samuel Guerra, Untersander, Giovannini (alle U20-WM), Ambri ohne Murovic, Raffainer, Kobach, Gautschi, Bundi, Westrum, Schulthess (alle verletzt), Lehoux (krank), Hofmann, Pestoni (beide U20-WM). 53. Timeout HCD. 59. (58:45) Timeout Ambri, danach ohne Goalie.

description.hltext_display: ADB International Group, Inc.'s (ADBI) 50% Subsidiary, Subsea Oil Technologies, Inc., Initiates Worl
description.content:
ADB International Group, Inc. (PINKSHEETS: ADBI), through its 50% investment in Subsea Oil Technologies, Inc., (Subsea), has initiated worldwide marketing of its patent-pending deepwater oil rig blowout containment solutions to major global offshore oil producers and related support organizations. Subsea is offering licensing, partnership and other commercial opportunities related to its U.S. Intellectual Property (IP) portfolio, which currently includes seven (7) pending U.S. Patent Applications associated with solutions for containing oil spills similar to the 2010 BP/Deepwater Horizon oil spill.
The titles of the Patent Applications in Subsea's IP portfolio include:
1- "Method and Apparatus for Controlling Valves of a Subsea Oil Spill Containment Assembly."
2- "Method and Apparatus for Controlling Mud Flaps of an Oil Spill Containment Assembly."
3- "Method and Apparatus for Containing a Defective Blowout Preventer (BOP) Stack Using BOPstopper Assemblies Having Remotely Controlled Valves and Heating Elements."
4- "Method and Apparatus for Fastening a Blowout Preventer (BOP) Stack Containment Assembly to an Ocean Floor."
5- "Method and Apparatus for Controlling a Valve Used to Contain Oil and/or Gas Spewing from a Defective Blowout Preventer (BOP) Stack Located on an Ocean Floor."
6- "Contained Top Kill Method and Apparatus for Entombing a Defective Blowout Preventer (BOP) Stack to Stop an Oil and/or Gas Spill."
7- "Method and Apparatus for Containing an Undersea Oil and/or Gas Spill Caused by a Defective Blowout Preventer (BOP)."
"Since the 2010 BP/Deepwater Horizon oil spill first occurred in the Gulf of Mexico, Subsea has been developing an extensive IP portfolio of patent applications directed towards the containment of deepwater oil rig blowouts, which is a major concern for offshore oil producers, governmental agencies and support companies," stated Steven Plumb, President of Subsea. He added that, "We are focusing on the dissemination of information to potential clients, partners, universities and rule-making agencies to ensure market penetration and awareness of our safety, operational and disaster recovery solutions related to potential deepwater oil rig blowouts, which can create irreversible ecological, economical and social disasters. Subsea anticipates that it will further expand its IP portfolio in 2011 and beyond."
Additional details regarding Subsea's IP portfolio, some of the technical features disclosed by the Patent Applications and information about the Inventor of this technology may be accessed through the "Subsidiaries" webpage of ADBI's website at http://www.adbintl.com or through http://www.subseaoiltech.com.
ADB International Group, Inc. (ADBI) is a holding company that invests in strategic global corporate acquisitions in important market sectors that demonstrate significant growth potential. ADBI intends to expand into Green Energy Industries, Emerging Technologies, Financial and Business Services and other growing and awakening markets. ADBI plans to provide managerial and financial support to allow each project and subsidiary to concentrate on its specific industry and unique business plan. Partnering with strong management, investing in growth, achieving operational improvements and applying the Company's global resources are all part of ADBI's formula for building value for our investors and shareholders.
Safe Harbor Statement: Under the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995 this news release contains forward looking statements within the meaning of section 27A of the Securities Act, as amended, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act, as amended. Forward looking statements often include words such as expect, hope, anticipate, believes, etc. Forward looking statements involve both known and unknown risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results and performance to differ materially from those expressed in this press release.

The annual tree lighting takes place at 5:30 p.m. Friday in Market Square.
Monday, December 20, 2010 10:30 PM EST
WILLIAMSBURG – A special reading and traditional carols highlight this year’s annual Christmas Eve tree lighting ceremony on Market Square in Colonial Williamsburg’s Historic Area on Friday, Dec. 24 at 5:30 p.m.
The community is invited to gather at the Courthouse on Duke of Gloucester Street for a special program to include a reading of The Night Before Christmas and the singing of carols.
Members of the Kiwanis Club of Williamsburg will participate. City of Williamsburg Mayor Clyde Haulman officially turns the switch to light the 35-foot evergreen tree.
Colonial Williamsburg and the Kiwanis Club of Williamsburg have cosponsored the lighting of a Christmas tree on Market Square since 1959.
No tickets or reservations required.

description.hltext_display: Schweizer Banken wollen Steuerstreit mit Deutschland schnell abschließen
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) – Die Schweizer Banken wollen die Diskussion um unversteuerte Vermögen von Deutschen in der Schweiz schnell hinter sich bringen. "Die Schweiz möchte ehrlich und endgültig mit der Vergangenheit abschließen”, sagte der Präsident der Schweizerischen Bankiervereinigung, Patrick Odier, der "Börsen-Zeitung” (Mittwoch). Deshalb würden Kapitalerträge aus in der Schweiz verwalteten Vermögen künftig gemäß dem deutschen System versteuert. Die endgültigen Verhandlungen zwischen Deutschland und der Schweiz dazu sollten "idealerweise” Anfang 2011 beginnen, sagte Odier.
Die Schweizer Geldhäuser wollen sich Odier zufolge auf die Verwaltung versteuerter Vermögen spezialisieren. Befürchtungen, dass dadurch Gelder ausfallen könnten, habe man nicht. Die Kunden hätten auch "wegen der Kompetenz oder der Stabilität” ein großes Interesse an der Vermögensverwaltung in der Schweiz.
Das Vorgehen müsse jedoch mit Deutschland noch im Detail besprochen werden, ebenso die Behandlung von Altgeldern. Es liege aber auch in der Verantwortung der Banken, die Interessen der Kunden zu wahren: "Wir haben in den Verhandlungen klar gemacht: Unsere Kundschaft können wir nicht verraten”, sagte Odier. Die Schweizer Banken rieten ihren Kunden aber schon jetzt, ihr Geld regulär zu melden./alg/stw/wiz

description.hltext_display: Alfombra antideslizante en Zubi Zuri
description.content: Bilbao. El Ayuntamiento de Bilbao está cubriendo con una alfombra antideslizante el suelo del puente Zubi Zuri, pasarela peatonal diseñada por el arquitecto Santiago Calatrava, para poner fin a los patinazos que sufren los viandantes en invierno, cuando llueve o hiela. Los operarios han colocado unos quince metros de moqueta desde que comenzaron el pasado lunes, un tercio de la longitud de la parte central de la pasarela. El trabajo se interrumpió por la lluvia y prosiguió la pasada noche. Foto: J. M. Martínez

description.hltext_display: Ashland City police department posts crime data online
description.content:
In an effort to help reduce crime and further strengthen local community oriented policing efforts, the Ashland City Police Department recently went live at CrimeMapping.com. CrimeMapping.com is a nationwide public mapping service that allows residents to analyze interactive maps of recent crime activity.
Visitors to the site can generate reports, search by location and filter for different time periods as well as crime types.
Keeping the public well informed has been proven effective as a crime fighting strategy, and the ACPD is proactively sharing information within the city limits of Ashland City, according to police chief Marc Coulon.
Crime alerts are one of the most popular features at CrimeMapping.com. Residents can register online to receive free updates via e-mail whenever new crime activity occurs in their area. Users choose the distance as well as crimes they wish to stay informed about.
A single user can register multiple times in order to learn about activity occurring near their residence, place of business or even their childs school of attendance.
The information posted is always current as data is uploaded to the system every 24 hours. The incident records information used is thoroughly tested and represents some of the highest levels of integrity and accuracy available for any public crime-mapping site.
The population of approximately 4,500 residents in the Ashland City area has been empowered with valuable and timely information through the efforts of ACPD.
CrimeMapping.com helps promote transparency and trust through expanding the channels of communication between the police and the public they serve.
Coulon said the city received a grant to participate in the new service.

event_or_fact.property: the city received a grant to participate in the new service

description.hltext_display: Vikings not putting Favre on IR
description.content:
In the wake of two embarrassingly lopsided losses, interim coach Leslie Frazier isn't giving up on Brett Favre and the Minnesota Vikings.
Frazier said he would not put Favre on season-ending injured reserve with a concussion and wouldn't rule out a return to the field before the season is over. "He's proven time and time again that he's capable of coming back and playing," Frazier said yesterday.
Favre made a surprise start against Chicago on Monday night after being ruled out on Saturday with a sprained right throwing shoulder. He threw for 63 yards with one touchdown and an interception before getting knocked out of the game in the second quarter on a sack by Bears defensive end Corey Wootton.
Frazier said it was unlikely the 41-year-old quarterback could recover from the concussion in time to play Sunday at Philadelphia, but wouldn't rule out a return for the season finale at Detroit on Jan. 2.
Favre has said several times this will be his last season, and Frazier said the veteran doesn't want to go out watching from the bench. "He doesn't want to let his teammates down," Frazier said. "He really wanted to play in front of the home fans last night for maybe the last time. That was important to him. I think more than anything he likes to compete and the fact that we've got two ballgames left, he's a guy who loves his teammates and loves to play. I think that's what motivates him more than anything." If Favre cannot play, rookie Joe Webb will be the starter with recently signed veteran Patrick Ramsey as the backup. The Vikings were also considering signing Rhett Bomar off the Giants practice squad as insurance.

description.hltext_display: Tar farväl med "Drottningoffret"
description.author: TT Spektra
description.content:
De kallar sig för ett kvinnligt A-team. Regissören, manusförfattarna och huvudrollsinnehavarna i "Drottningoffret" är alla kvinnor - en ovanlighet i en mansdominerad bransch. Men i en tv-serie som skildrar kvinnors förhållande till makt hade något annat varit otänkbart.
-Den här produktionen är kvinnodominerad. Det drar upp statistiken i branschen så att den inte blir så pinsam, konstaterar regissören Kathrine Windfeld.
Genombrott
Det är sex år sedan tv-tittarna för första gången fick stifta bekantskap med den unga, idealistiska miljöministern Charlotte Ekeblad och hennes kollegor och politiska fiender. "Kronprinsessan" innebar ett genombrott för den danska regissören Kathrine Windfeld, liksom skådespelaren Alexandra Rapaport. I "Drottningoffret", som börjar sändas den 27 december, är det dags att knyta ihop trådarna och ta farväl av Charlotte Ekeblad och de andra karaktärerna.
-Jag kommer inte att sakna min Charlotte-roll. Den har jag gjort nu - men jag kommer att sakna sammanhanget och mina kollegor. Det här har varit ren lyx att jobba med, säger Alexandra Rapaport.
Ordet "lyxproduktion" nämns ofta under mötet med Alexandra Rapaport, skådespelarkollegan Suzanne Reuter och regissören Kathrine Windfeld. SVT har satsat ordentligt på filmatiseringen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts tre romaner och inte prutat på kvaliteten.
Alzheimersjuk
I "Drottningoffret" är det Elizabeth Meyer, socialdemokraternas partiordförande, som står i centrum. Suzanne Reuters rollfigur får mitt under brinnande valrörelse veta att hon lider av Alzheimers sjukdom. Hon bestämmer sig dock för att dölja sin sjukdom och genomföra valrörelsen.
För de allra flesta är Suzanne Reuter mest känd för sina komiska roller. I "Drottningoffret" ger hon visserligen prov på sin komiska tajming, men får också spela ut hela sitt dramatiska register i en ångestladdad skildring av begynnande demens.
-Jag har träffat folk som har fått diagnosen alzheimer, det är alltid intressant att göra sådan research. Men mestadels har jag använt mig av texten och jag vet inte, lurats och härmats, säger Suzanne Reuter.
Reuters mamma
Tv-serien innebar också att Suzanne Reuter för första gången fick spela mot sin egen mamma, 84-åriga skådespelerskan Bojan Westin som gör rollen som Elisabeth Meyers moster. En upplevelse, inte minst för tv-tittarna, hävdar Kathrine Windfeld.
-När de står i bild tillsammans uppstår en magi som är obetalbar. Deras relation har ju varat i nästan 60 år - thank you! säger hon.
Även om det är svårt att skiljas från Hanne Vibeke Holst-trilogin gläder sig teamet åt det beröm som tv-filmatiseringen fått under årens lopp. Lovorden har kommit ända från Rosenbad.
-När Göran Persson fick frågan vilken som var den bästa film han sett under året svarade han "Kronprinsessan". Det var väldigt roligt, säger Kathrine Windfeld. description.hltext_display: 仅5.8%反对
description.content:
来源： 新华网 【字号 大小】【留言】【打印】【关闭】
资料图片：网上流传的北京著名堵车地点——西二环复兴门桥早高峰期间车流量大，行驶缓慢（12月15日摄）。北京市治理交通拥堵综合措施公开征求意见以来，围绕“公务车零增长”“停车费和拥堵费收取”“限车限行”等话题，网民展开了热烈讨论，其中既有理性表达，也有不少疑问。这种罕见的关注度，凸显出全社会对于首都交通治理的焦虑、困惑和期待。新华社发（张宇 摄）
新华网北京１２月２１日电（记者李志勇）北京治堵措施征求意见日前结束，其中９４．２％的意见都是建设性意见，表示反对的占５．８％，主要集中在抑制机动车快速增长、单双号限行、公车管理、征收拥堵费等方面。
记者２１日从北京市交通委了解到，在一周的时间内，共收到网上提出的意见建议共２９２９件，信函和传真４２５件，总体持赞成支持。９４．２％的网上留言、来信和传真提出了建设性意见，涵盖交通规划、设计、建设、运营、管理、服务和交通文明等多个方面。表示反对的占５．８％，主要集中在抑制机动车快速增长、单双号限行、公车管理、征收拥堵费等方面。
主要的意见和建议包括完善城市规划，疏解中心城功能和人口；加快道路交通基础设施建设，提高承载能力；加大优先发展公共交通力度，鼓励公交出行；改善自行车、步行交通系统和驻车换乘条件；加强机动车管理，引导合理使用；加强科学管理，提高交通运输服务水平等方面。
资料图片：北京市治理交通拥堵综合措施征求民意 新华社发
北京治堵网上征求意见结束 拥堵费等四方面受关注
北京治堵困局:公共交通之痛 别让拥堵转向拥挤
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 下一页

description.hltext_display: Aktien Frankfurt Eröffnung: Kaum verändert – ohne Impulse – Stimmung gut
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) – Ohne neue Impulse ist der deutsche Aktienmarkt am Mittwoch kaum verändert gestartet. Der Dax stieg in den ersten Minuten um 0,03 Prozent auf 7.079,90 Punkte. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei 7.087,84 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht und seine Bestmarke vom Wochenstart um rund 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Der MDax rückte um 0,08 Prozent auf 10.081,25 Punkte vor, nachdem der Index mittelgroßer Werte am Vortag erstmals seit gut zweieinhalb Jahren über die Mauer von 10.000 Punkten geklettert war. Der Auswahlindex für Technologiewerte TecDax gab 0,17 Prozent auf 841,90 Punkte ab.
Die Nachrichtenlage bleibe dünn und auch die Vorgabe der Börsen in Übersee gebe keine klare Richtung vor, begründeten Börsianer den kaum veränderten Start. Der Future auf den US-Leitindex Dow Jones gewann 0,08 Prozent seit dem Xetra-Schluss am Vortag. Auch die Agenda verspricht kaum neue Impulse für den Aktienmarkt. Laut Börsianern dürfte aber das "Window-Dressing” im Zuge der Weihnachtsrally weiter das Geschehen bestimmen, wobei mit weiter abnehmenden Umsätzen zu rechnen sei. Am Nachmittag könnten neue Daten vom US-Immobilienmarkt kleinere Impulse geben, darüber hinaus steht die finale Schätzung des US-BIP für das dritte Quartal auf der Agenda./fat/la

description.hltext_display: Making good history
description.content:
When President Obama signs a bill repealing the military’s “don’t ask, don’t tell” rule, it will be an event as significant for gay rights as President Harry Truman’s order integrating the U.S. military was for black Americans. Obama’s signature will mark historic progress for a nation that has for too long denigrated gay Americans. Our hope is that it is the death knell for one of the last frontiers of bigotry.
The U.S. Senate on Saturday did its part, striking down the ban that forced gay men and lesbians to deny who they are, even as they risked their lives for the rest of us. The House acted earlier.
“Don’t ask, don’t tell” never made sense. It was intended by President Clinton to soften the military’s outright ban. Instead, it acknowledged the obvious — that gays and lesbians were already serving, ably and courageously.
Ensconcing them in barracks and shipboard closets simply made the statement that being who they were was a flaw but that harboring prejudice against them was not. We should be past that as a nation. But then the military often has been a leader in such progress.
We make a prediction here that we don’t believe to be bold: There will be no long-standing deterioration of military morale or readiness after repeal. A survey of the military earlier revealed that.
But the military must ensure this by having as little tolerance for the prejudices of homophobes as it now has for the bigotry of racists. It is, simply, the American thing to do.

description.hltext_display: Los Angeles police seek man who may be in Virginia
description.content:
Missing 3 years, left California suddenly in 2007
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 8:48 AM EST
RICHMOND -- State Police are appealing for help on behalf of the Los Angeles Police Department to locate a man missing since 2007.
Adrian Flores, 30, was last seen in Los Angeles on Dec. 22, 2007. LAPD investigators recently developed information that Flores may be living and working in Virginia under an assumed name. Police have no information on where in Virginia Flores might be.
He is a Hispanic male standing 5 feet 5 inches tall and weighing approximately 190 pounds. He has a “tribal band” tattooed around his right bicep. When Flores left California he did so suddenly without taking any belongings or advising his employer that he was quitting his job.
Anyone who might recognize Flores or have any information on him is encouraged to contact the LAPD’s Missing Persons Unit at (213) 996-1800.

description.hltext_display: Professional Projectors of the eyevis ESP series with new LED technology
description.content:
BERLIN, Germany (AVING) -- Compared with traditional UHP lamp system, the eyevis LED system provides optimal spectral distribution of light. Thanks to the clear, non-overlapping representation of the primary colors red, green, and blue, the ESP LED Projectors allow brilliant color representation of the complete color range.
Through the optimised LED light source, a remarkably wider colour range can be achieved compared with traditional lamp systems. This allows a realistic colour representation that could not yet be reached with lamp-based systems.
A newly developed control of the LEDs enables independent adjustment of the individual primary colours. This results in infinitely variable dimming of the projector. Hence illuminate and colour temperature can be accurately adjusted to match any conditions. This process does not affect the signal data, and the colour depth remains unaltered.
The life-time of the LED illumination lasts more than 60,000 hrs (MTBF). Used in 24/7 operation this equals a period of almost six years. Operated ten hours on working days only, the expected life-time would be about 18 to 20 years. This long life-time of the LEDs allows cost-effective and eco-friendly operation since no bulbs containing harmful materials have to be replaced.
With LED technology no colour wheels or UV filters are needed in the optical light path. This reduces maintenance works to a minimum.

description.content:
Mời quý vị và các bạn chiêm ngưỡng người mẫu bikini nổi tiếng của SI Brooklyn Decker với vẻ đẹp vô cùng xinh đẹp và quyến rũ trong bộ sưu tập áo tắm 2010.
NAT
Gửi bài viết In bài viết Cỡ chữ
Bạn cần cài đặt Flash Player để xem Video!!!
Vận động viên quả là có kỹ thuật nhào lộn hết sức siêu đẳng!
Mời quý vị và các bạn ngắm nhìn vẻ đẹp mê hồn của người mẫu áo tắm Zoe Duchesne.
Nghệ sỹ dù có thuần thục tiết mục biểu diễn của mình rồi, nhưng đôi khi cũng gặp phải những tai nạn dở khóc dở cười.
Một người phụ nữ dẫn đứa bé khoảng 7 - 8 tuổi vào giả vờ mua hàng. Hai lần chú nhóc tiến tới bàn có để chiếc Iphone nhưng lại quay ra do chưa có cơ hội ra tay...
Phần trình diễn ca khúc tiếng Anh Take me to the river, Uyên Linh đã thực sự khiến sân khấu Vietnam Idol bùng nổ. Hát sung đến nỗi rơi cả giày, "mẹ Cám" sẵn sàng đi chân đất để nhảy múa.
Chơi khá ấn tượng ở hiệp 1 nhưng ĐTVN bất ngờ thất thủ 0-2 trước Malaysia trên sân Bukit Jalil ở lượt đi bán kết AFF Cup 2010. Hai bàn thắng của Malaysia được ghi đều do công của Safee.
Mời quý vị và các bạn xem trailer của bộ phim Cuộc phiêu lưu của Gulliver do tài tử Jack Black thủ vai chính sẽ được trình chiếu trong mùa Giáng sinh này.

description.hltext_display: Johnny likt borsten: Wat heb ik toch een leuke baan
description.content:
HILVERSUM - moest tijdens zijn programma Beat de Mol de chocoladesaus van drie blote vrouwen aflikken.
"Wat heb ik toch een leuk baan," glunderde Johnny. Hij deed de opdracht met zichtbaar genoegen en gaf alle dames ook nog een zoentje na.De vraag is of Bridget Maasland, de vriendin van Johnny het allemaal wel zo leuk vindt. Ze vertelde onlangs nog dat Johnny het imago had van een vrouwenverslinder en het niet zo nauw nam met monogamie. Maar zij dacht dat Johnny nu� zijn portie wel gehad zou hebben. Op televisie zag het er heel anders uit. Hij lust er nog wel pap van, chocola in dit geval.Johnny nam het tijdens deze battle op tegen Kelly Pfaff die onlangs is uitgeroepen tot stijlvolste persoonlijkheid. Behalve stijlvol is Kelly ook humoristisch en snel. Zij won deze aflevering. (AHA)

description.hltext_display: Theater | John Moore Good to be blue at Denver Center
description.author: John MooreDenver
description.content:
Economic uncertainty tends to turn nervous producers even more conservative than Glenn Beck. But thankfully, Denver Center president Randy Weeks has never been one to program by fear.
It would have been easy for Weeks to pass on a visit from "Dixie's Tupperware Party," a raunchy evening hosted by a man playing an outrageous, sex-starved Southern tart who's left her children behind in an Alabama trailer park.
Yep, those are real Tupperware parties taking place each night at the very same Galleria Theatre that once hosted the saccharine-sweet musical "The Taffetas." And these aren't your mamma's Tupperware parties.
The Denver Center has never shied from tackling political controversy. But sexual controversy can be a whole other ballgame with audiences and newspaper readers.
A recent interview for this paper, in which the actor playing "Dixie" spoke as his on-stage alter ego, left many Denver Post readers guffawing and others positively apoplectic.
Do a political comedy like "Dirty Story" that includes a sadomasochistic young woman (representing Israel!) having car-battery jumper cables attached to her breasts, and not a peep. But have a man talk as a woman who wants to take you out back by the Dumpster and do some things, and the phone rings like it's the "War of the Worlds."
"Dixie" is the Denver Center's first nod to the down-and-dirty in at least a decade. And that's a good thing. Because, ironic as it sounds, a city can't be considered culturally sophisticated unless it can make room for a show even Weeks admits "is a little bit on the blue side." And blue-collar. Something for everyone.
"I have always said it is not my job to be a filter, or to be the arbiter of what's in good or bad taste for an entire city," said Weeks, who didn't put "Dixie" on any subscription package. So it's optional. And it's selling so well that Sunday evening performances have been added.
It's that kind of forward thinking that has Weeks unafraid to bring in content that's controversial in more high-minded ways: Next month's Tony-winning "Next to Normal" is a difficult musical about a mother's two-decade struggle with bipolar disorder. February sees the return of "Spring Awakening," a musical about the tragic consequences of sexual ignorance that's galvanized younger audiences like no other since "Rent."
"Dixie" is no "Next to Normal." And doesn't try to be.
Weeks says no one who has seen the show has complained to him about it. "People are getting the wink-wink," he said, "and they are having a blast."
"Dixie" runs through Jan. 2 (303-893-4100).
Annaleigh Ashford returns for concert Annaleigh Ashford, who starred on Broadway as Glinda in "Wicked, comes home Dec. 27 to perform a benefit concert at the Columbine United Church in Littleton. It's a benefit for Littleton's Town Hall Arts Center. Read the whole story here Briefly... The Colorado Shakespeare Festival will host producers of Shakespearean theater from more than 100 companies around the world Jan. 5-8 for the 21st annual Shakespeare Theatre Association of America conference in Boulder. Sessions are closed to the public, but CSF actors will stage a public performance of "Timon of Athens" at 8 p.m. Jan. 6 in the mainstage theater (303-492-0554 or coloradoshakes.org). . . .
"Irving Berlin's White Christmas," which plays through Dec. 26, is now the highest-selling show in Town Hall Arts Center history. As of Dec. 10, the remainder of the run was completely sold out. "I'm told there are people going to Craigslist trying to buy tickets," said Town Hall's Ed Chambers. "That's certainly a first for us." . . .
Tony winner Karen Olivo, who starred in the pre-Broadway production of "Brooklyn the Musical" at the Denver Civic, will conduct a master class for the Vail Valley Theatre Company on Jan. 8, covering vocal performance and dance (970-485-9902). . . .
On Monday, the Lake Dillon Theatre Company hosted a benefit performance of "[title of show]," with all proceeds going to the Summit School District's bullying prevention programs. The goal was to raise $1,500.

description.hltext_display: 限行拥� �费含糊
description.content:
治堵具体政策有望明天公布
明天，北京治堵具体政策有望公布。当天10点至11点，北京将召开“北京交通改善措施”新闻发布会。届时，市政府及市交通委等有关单位负责人将出席发布会介绍情况并回答记者提问。
前晚，治堵新政(征求意见稿)意见征求情况结果公布，有关部门称，网上对《意见》总体赞成支持，表示反对的仅占5.8%。对于官方公布的统计数据，网友指“太笼统”，多项政策不明确。人民网投票结果则显示，55%的网友认为《意见》“不全面，治堵还有很多工作要做”。
据了解，因治堵政策中最受关注的“控车”具体措施未公布，社会上流传多种“限购”版本，但相关部门并未做出正面回应。
-调查结果
官方数据显示“总体赞成”
为期一周的民意征集结束后，官方统计数据显示，网上共收到意见建议2929件，信函和传真425件。有关部门表示，网上对《意见》总体赞成支持，认为从多方面提出了疏堵综合措施，既注重治标，更制定了治本措施。
94.2%的网上留言、来信和传真提出建设性意见，涵盖交通规划、设计、建设、运营、管理、服务和交通文明等多个方面。对《意见》表示反对的占5.8%，主要集中在抑制机动车快速增长、单双号限行、公车管理、征收拥堵费等方面。
对于停车费调整方案，共收到意见建议1022件，表示赞同和提出具体意见建议的占63%，表示反对的占37%。意见主要集中在停车收费标准、医院等部分区域停车价格、停车资源、停车执法等方面。
对于官方公布的统计数据，网友指其“太笼统”，“听不到反对的声音”，担忧公众的意见和建议最终在方案中究竟能有多少体现。
对此，市政府有关部门表示，对公众的意见和建议将认真研究，积极采纳，进一步完善相关政策措施。
人民网55%网友反“拥堵费”
在官方征集意见的同时，人民网也同期就拥堵费、单双号限行等措施进行调查。截至今天零时，1512位网友参加投票，55%的网友认为《意见》“不全面，治堵还有很多工作要做”，13%的网友认为《意见》“非常全面，对治堵很有信心”。
在《意见》具体措施中，“改善自行车、步行交通系统和驻车换乘条件，倡导绿色环保出行”、“加快北京中心城轨道交通建设”、“‘十二五’期间，行政机关公务车零增长”等三大措施最获网友认可，支持率分别高达91%、87%、88%。
但关于“北京市内择机收取交通拥堵费”，55%的网友持反对意见，仅39%的网友表示赞同。
官方调查和人民网调查数据之间存在较大差距，一些网友对数据准确性提出质疑。专家表示，市民对北京拥堵状况深有体会，必然会支持官方采取相关措施治堵，因此对总体治堵方案持赞成态度可以理解，而具体到单项措施时，由于各自立场不同，差异化就会凸显。
1 2 3 4 下一页

description.hltext_display: Juventus: Pepe asume la oportunidad perdida en Verona
description.content:
Una de las estadísticas que deja ver que la Juventus ha perdido la fiabilidad y contundencia defensiva de antaño, una cualidad que siempre fue ligada al club turinés, se aprecia en los goles recibidos en el tramo final de los partidos. Esta campaña suma varios que le han impedido sumar victorias importantes y la última llegó en Verona ante un Chievo que limó un punto y dejó ‘tocado’ a la Vecchia como admite Simone Pepe.
"A la luz de los hechos, fue una oportunidad perdida, sobre todo porque la Juventus en la primera mitad hizo un buen partido. En la segunda mitad y con la expulsión de Gianni, nos vimos más obligados. El gol recibido nos dejó un mal sabor de boca”, admitió a Tuttosport.
"Son puntos gravemente perdidos aunque es pronto para hablar de si son claves para el Scudetto. Esperamos la recuperación en cuanto regresemos en enero”, dijo, apuntando que “la Juventus es un gran equipo que ahora mismo lucha con varios clubes que están peleando en la zona alta de la tabla”.
Además, explicó que “lo que está ocurriendo en el Inter nunca es una ventaja” y que espera un 2011 “donde todo el equipo encuentre un buen nivel”.

description.hltext_display: Have yourself a Merry Christmas
description.content:
What better time of the year to celebrate the birth of China's burgeoning economy than Christmas?
Who would have imagined that just 15 or 20 years ago, China was a country of a billion people whose principal commerce was exporting low-priced trinkets and Communist ideology. It still is, of course, but international trading has elevated it to a sort of celebrity status. Previously, America was the bastion of capitalism and the lead engine of innovation and industrial production. Now, not so much.
If one doubts this, all one has to do is journey over to the nearest dollar store, hardware or big box repository and check the attached tags on any item. I would guess that at least half of them say "Made in China," and most of the remaining half are produced in some other third-world country. Finding anything manufactured in the United States practically requires a search warrant.
Even more ironic is the fact that a large percentage of Christmas decorations (you know, "Christ" as in "Christian") are also of Chinese origin. So now we've reached the point where Christmas lights and assorted ornaments, not to mention most of the toys, sporting goods, clothing and anything else related to Dec. 25th gift giving, is produced in abundance by Communist Chinese labor. It's kind of like Chairman Mao meets Jesus and offers to sell him an inexpensive polyresin crucifixion cross made in Hengyang. Why have an original when a cheap imitation will do? Somehow, the two don't seem to go together.
Are we dealing with the devil, or have we ignorantly hocked our future prosperity for temporary corporate financial gains? Probably both.
With China on the cusp of overtaking us both economically and militarily, one would think there should be some cause for alarm in Washington. Instead, we seem determined to dig the hole deeper, pawn additional resources and potentially bankrupt future generations. As the dollar continues to become worth less and less and with our national debt skyrocketing out of control, it's getting to the point where even the cost of Chinese trinkets is almost becoming too pricey.
Sure, we can flip burgers, grow the government payroll and deliver other nations' goods the next day, but to bring a domestic producing copper mine on line takes nearly a decade. Maybe longer. Forget about building new electrical generating stations, nuclear or conventional. Compliance with boatloads of governmental regulations has virtually halted this industry. A leaky oil pipe in the Gulf of Mexico was reason enough to practically stop all future offshore drilling and exploration operations. The same rings true for many of America's larger businesses. It's simply become too difficult and too costly to risk a major investment in the United States. If the environmental restrictions don't hamper the project, chances are taxes will. We've just about regulated and taxed ourselves into poverty.
Of course, business being business and in a global economy, there is always someone willing to step in and fill the void. As a result, a large portion of our industrial base has moved out of country, many to China, where it is not hampered with such onerous restraints. We've shot ourselves in the foot, pure and simple, and now we can hardly afford the bandages to stop the bleeding. If, in fact, we still make the bandages.
Normally, Christmas is a festive affair and a special reason to offer thanks for all the beneficial events that have occurred in our lives during the year. Presently, such reflections probably ring more true in China — at least from the Chinese merchant's point of view. Unlike rusting American factories, boarded Main Street businesses and millions of unemployed workers, China's industrial captains can cheerfully rally around the cash registers, tally the inflow of billions of American dollars, then clasp hands and joyously sing that newly adopted Chinese spiritual, "What a friend we have in Jesus." And, I might add, "in Santa Claus, too."
As a suggestion, perhaps China should give serious consideration to replacing its tiger, dragon, dog, snake and remaining calendar characters with one simple but universally recognized symbol — the dollar sign. After all, a $ makes a heck of a lot more financial sense than trying to figure the bottom-line statistics from the nonsensical profit and loss tabulations of a chicken or a rat.

description.hltext_display: IWF schließt Verkauf von gut 400 Tonnen Gold ab
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
WASHINGTON (dpa-AFX) – Der Internationale Währungsfonds (IWF) hat den angekündigten Verkauf von gut 400 Tonnen Gold abgeschlossen. Die Verkäufe seien zu Marktpreisen vollzogen worden, teilte der IWF am Dienstagabend in Washington mit. Im September 2009 hatte der Fonds den Verkauf von insgesamt 403,3 Tonnen aus seinen Gold-Beständen angekündigt. Dies entspricht rund einem Achtel seiner Bestände. Mit dem Programm soll die Kreditvergabekapazität für arme Länder erweitert werden.
Zunächst hatte der IWF das Gold direkt an Notenbanken verkauft. Indien, Mauritius und Sri Lanka hatten dem IWF gut 200 Tonnen abgekauft. Die restlichen Verkäufe sollten zeitlich gestreckt über die Märkte erfolgen. Der Goldpreis ist binnen eines Jahres um gut 28 Prozent auf zuletzt rund 1.389,55 Dollar je Feinunze (rund 31,1 Gramm) gestiegen. Der Rekord von 1.430,95 Dollar vom 7. Dezember bleibt somit in Reichweite./jha/bgf

description.hltext_display: SCHMIDT Technology offers sensors for the monitoring of low-turbulence displacement flow
description.content:
BERLIN, Germany (AVING) -- In the clean room, the concentration of airborne particles must be as low as possible so that the semi-conductors produced there are not damaged or the pharmaceutical products contaminated. This is done through a high rate of air change. In clean rooms of the category A in which the product lies open and comes into direct contact with air, the aim is therefore to ensure a continuous low-turbulence displacement flow. For the monitoring of these low-turbulence displacement flows, flow sensors are used that with their speed precisely read the low flow speeds that occur in the clean room and in addition also comply with the requirements there with regard to their material and their design.
The term 'Good Manufacturing Practice' (GMP) defines quality guidelines that ensure the quality of the production processes and environment in the manufacturing of pharmaceuticals. One company that has committed itself to GMP-compliant methods is the company Neuberger from Rothenburg ob der Tauber. In addition to hardware and software for the control of air conditioning in buildings, Neuberger supplies monitoring systems that have been specifically designed for the pharmaceutical industry. Their task is to monitor, visualize and archive all the necessary core values of the clean room such as room temperature, room humidity, room pressure, particle concentrations and air flow.
One special feature here is the monitoring of the fan filter units (FFUs) installed in the ceiling of the clean room which supply carefully filtered air on a permanent basis and under constant control. It is thus ensured that polluting particles cannot reach the product or that contaminated air from outside cannot penetrate into the clean room. This low-turbulence displacement flow is captured by flow sensors that Neuberger uses in addition to monitor the filters or to regulate the speed of the FFUs.
Monitoring filters or regulating FFUs
In its function for filter monitoring, the sensor checks whether the flow speed is correct at the fixed ventilator speed or whether it has already slowed down due to increasing contamination of the filter. In the second application variant, the flow measured by the sensor is used directly to regulate the speed of the FFUs.
The GMPs stipulate a closely specified, permissible work area for the flow speed of; 0.45 m/s with a permissible deviation of ±20 %, corresponding to 0.09 m/s. 'The flow sensors used of the type SS 20.415 from SCHMIDT Technology have a measurement precision of just 0.05 m/s. SCHMIDT Technology guarantees this not only with a factory certificate but also issues a calibration certificate pursuant in the company's own precision wind channel at the customer's request.
GMP-compliant and nevertheless unique
The SS 20.415 has been specifically designed for use in clean rooms pursuant to GMP. This means firstly that the sensor only has smooth surfaces without undercuts and can thus be easily cleaned or disinfected. Secondly, only suitable materials such as stainless steel were used for the installation parts required in the clean room and these materials are resistant to common cleaning agents and disinfectants such as alcohol, peracetic acid and hydrogen peroxide.
A special feature is the recognition of contamination. If, contrary to expectations, the sensor element should become contaminated or be moistened by some of the cleaning liquid, the sensor can then no longer measure correctly and issues an error signal. The error is signalized by the SS 20.415 by issuing a value of 2 mA. Otherwise, it communicates the measurement values as a fault-insensitive 4 ... 20 mA signal with high linearity accuracy.
Another advantage of the SS 20.415 is its compact design. It is facilitated by the integration of the electronics in the sensor tube which, with its diameter of just 9 mm, does not create any turbulences in the flow. The two constructional variants are also an advantage. A version curved in a 90° angle can be installed directly under the ceiling of the clean room; the straight version is suitable for installation on a wall.

description.hltext_display: Do not let fun turn to tragedy
description.content:
The death of a young ATV rider in Haughton last weekend is a tragic reminder that safety can never take a holiday, even during the Christmas season.
At a time when school is out of session and Christmas presents may include all manner of vehicles, from bicycles to four-wheelers, parents and young riders need to be alert to dangers whether on or off road. Even experienced riders can take a tumble.
The obvious start is to include a helmet as part of the gift. But helmet laws only apply to motorcycles, motor-driven cycles and motorized bicycles on public property, according to Erin Habich, assistant public information officer of the Bossier Parish Sheriff’s Office. The weekend accident involving the 8 year old boy was on private property.
“Though there are no laws on the books concerning helmets or children and ATVs, we encourage all parents and guardians to adhere to the safety instructions that come with the vehicle,’’ said Habich in an e-mail. “Most often, the safety information with the product will state that the ATV is only to be used by someone 16 or older and that a helmet is required for operation.”
The gaps in safety laws merit some legislative review, says Donna Cavanaugh, executive director of ThinkFirst, a safety advocacy organization. Louisiana had recorded 212 total deaths related to ATVs between 1982 and 2008, with 41 of those from 2006-08, according to ATVsafety.gov.
The only laws on the books concerning ATVs state that they can be driven on the shoulder of public roadways (except interstates) only for farm-related activities. And the rider must be able to provide proof of that activity and have liability insurance, according to Habich.
“ATV’s can be heavy and they can travel at high speeds,’’ says Cavanaugh. She notes that ATV’s require interactive riding skills and the ability of drivers to shift their weight freely in all directions, depending on the situation and terrain, according to ATVsafety.gov. “Interactive riding is critical to maintaining safe control of the ATV,’’ said Cavanaugh. “This is something that is taught when you take formal training on how to ride an ATV.’’ Dealers and ATVsafety.gov can guide consumers to instruction opportunities.
“The hard fact is that accidents happen and in order to keep your family the safest, you need to follow all of the guidelines that come with a product,’’ said Habich. Even though ATVs are “sometimes marketed as toys for any age, they are not toys. They are motor vehicles that can be dangerous if not used properly.”

description.hltext_display: Un trabajador resulta herido tras caer por el hueco de un ascensor a unos 15 metros en un hotel de Palma

description.hltext_display: 为何高物价下仍调油价?
description.content:
近日，国家发展改革委发出通知，决定自12月22日零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油（全国平均）每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。就此，记者采访了国家发展改革委有关负责同志。
问：这次成品油价格调整的背景是什么？
答：这次成品油价格仍然是根据现行价格机制进行调整的。10月26日国内成品油价格调整以来，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬。特别是进入12月以后，受主要经济体经济回升以及寒冷天气带动取暖油需求增长等因素影响，国际市场油价大幅走高。12月20日，美国西德克萨斯原油（WTI）和英国北海布伦特原油期货价格分别涨至每桶88.81美元和92.74美元，达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。截止目前国际市场原油连续22个工作日移动平均价格已超过4%，按现行成品油价格机制，应适当上调国内成品油价格。
但是，综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。
问：在当前国内价格总水平上涨压力较大的情况下，国家坚持按成品油价格机制理顺成品油价格主要基于什么考虑？
答：7月份以来，受国内外多种因素影响，国内价格总水平上涨较快。对此，党中央、国务院高度重视，要求各地区、各部门积极采取措施，稳定消费价格总水平，保障群众基本生活。在这种情况下，国家仍然坚持按现行价格机制提高国内成品油价格是经过慎重考虑的，是从国民经济全局和长远发展角度作出的选择，目的是坚持资源性产品价格形成机制改革的方向，调动企业生产和进口积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote
description.content:
ATHENS (Reuters) - Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralyzed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout.
The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done.
"Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens.
Greece's main public and private sector labor unions have called a 3-hour strike from 1000 to 1300 GMT (5 to 8 a.m. ET) in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city center, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve Labor action by truck drivers and other transport workers.
"Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks.
"I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase.
Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.

event_or_fact.property: Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming
Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest
I am giving the government a last chance

description.hltext_display: Vegas' difficult rise to success
description.content:
After just two years playing as a professional, Jhonattan Vegas is going where no Venezuelan golfer has gone before. SBS Lachlan Guselli looks at Jhonattan Vegas struggle for acceptance as the golfer prepares to become Venezuelas first player on the prestigious US PGA Tour.After just two years playing as a professional, this 26-year-old is going where no Venezuelan golfer has gone before. "Well, it's actually one goal I had for my whole life and to achieve it is something terrific," Vegas told SBS. For Vegas it wasn't always this easy.
Growing up in the oil fields of the Orinoco Basin his father was the local course groundskeeper teaching his son from the age of two, the game that he loved. "I was always playing golf. Since he was a baby he saw me playing golf and practicing, and he was always with me in the field," his father Carlos Vegas said.
What should be a celebration in Venezuela will fall on deaf ears from the government in Caracas.
President Hugo Chavez, has taken to golf in a way that leaves Vegas and his father fearing for the future of the game.
Chavez has labelled it a 'Bourgeoise sport' The notions seems at odds with his own socialist heroes - Cuban revolutionary leader Che Guevara grew up playing golf in Argentina and was captured on film having a hit on one of Cubas last courses in Havana with President Fidel Castro.
Chavez has threatened to expropriate private courses across Venezuela to make way for public housing complexes whilst he has already closed many public courses including the one that Carlos Vega once maintained.
A mere 17 courses now remain in Vegas' home nation severely limiting the reach of the sport, but Vegas could be the beacon of hope, not just for would be golfers, but also for the poor.

event_or_fact.property: Well, it's actually one goal I had for my whole life and to achieve it is something terrific
I was always playing golf.; Since he was a baby he saw me playing golf and practicing, and he was always with me in the field

description.hltext_display: ZSC verliert in Kloten – SC Bern gewinnt das Derby gegen Fribourg
description.content:
Der SC Bern besiegt die Fribourger klar mit 5:1. Die Kloten Flyers entscheiden das Zürcher Derby gegen den ZSC mit 2:1 knapp für sich. Auch im vierten Saisonduell zwischen den Kloten Flyers
In der 48. Minute schloss Matthias Bieber, der bereits zum 14. Mal in dieser Spielzeit reüssierte, eine herrliche Kombination mit dem siegbringenden 2:1 ab. Die ersten beiden Tore waren im ersten Drittel gefallen. In der 16. Minute verlor die Defensive der Lions die Orientierung, sodass Klotens kanadischer Verteidiger Micki DuPont den Puck aus nächster Nähe einschieben konnte. Drei Minuten später gelang Mark Bastl in doppelter Überzahl der Ausgleich - er reagierte nach einem Abpraller von Flyers-Goalie Ronnie Rüeger am schnellsten.
Dem 1:1 war eine hektische Phase vorausgegangen; von der 15. bis zur 20. Minute kassierten beide Teams je sechs Zweiminuten-Strafen. Zudem wurde ZSC-Stürmer Thomas Ziegler für zehn Minuten auf die Strafbank verbannt. Danach beruhigten sich die Gemüter im Duell der beiden befreundeten Trainer Anders Eldebrink und Bengt-Ake Gustafsson wieder. Die Klotener spielten gestern Abend in speziellen hellblauen Trikots, die zu Gunsten des Kinderspitals Zürich versteigert werden.
Bern seit Wochen nicht zu stoppen
Der Titelträger verlängerte mit dem problemlosen 5:1 gegen Fribourg seine beeindruckende Siegserie auf neun Partien. Rückkehrer Rüthemann entschied das Duell der vielen Checks mit einem Slapshot zum 3:1 in der 39. Minute.
Vor 17'131 Anhängern spielte zunächst Simon Gamache die Rolle des Alleinunterhalters. Ausgerechnet jener Akteur, dem viele Experten einen Transfer zu Gottéron prophezeien, konfrontierte die Gäste früh mit unlösbaren Problemen. Vigier ebnete er mit einem energischen Vorstoss den Weg zum ersten Vorteil. Das 2:0 schoss der Kanadier selber; der Stürmer behauptete sich trotz harter Gegenwehr der Freiburger im Slot und lenkte den Schuss McLeans unhaltbar ab.
Der missratene Auftakt und der Zusammenbruch im letzten Drittel passtes zur notorischen Auswärtsschwäche der Romands. Ausserhalb der eigenen Halle hinterliessen sie in den letzten sieben Runden keinerlei Spuren mehr. Selbst ein knappes Resultat lag nicht drin - Plüss und Gerber verschärften die Lage Gottérons im letzten Drittel mit ihrer Doublette innerhalb von fünf Minuten gar zusätzlich.
Lakers gewinnen das Kellerduell
Lugano verlor das direkte Kellerduell zuhause gegen die Rapperswil-Jona Lakers 2:3 und fiel hinter die St. Galler auf Platz 11 zurück. Das Berner Derby zwischen Biel und den SCL Tigers ging trotz einer 2:0-Führung der Seeländer 4:2 zugunsten Langnaus aus. (pbe, si)

description.hltext_display: Tribe bumped by UConn women
description.content:
CHAPEL HILL -- The University of North Carolina's men's basketball game against William & Mary on Tuesday will be televised nationally on ESPNU. The game was set for ESPN2, as was originally scheduled.
ESPN2 will broadcasting the University of Connecticut's women's basketball game against Florida State, as the Huskies attempt to win their 89th consecutive game. A victory would break the NCAA record of 88 consecutive wins set by the UCLA men.
The UNC-William and Mary game will still tip off at 7 p.m. at the Dean E. Smith Center.

description.hltext_display: No holiday cheer for Sixers in bruising loss to Bulls
description.author: BOB COONEY
description.content:
Chicago tore apart a Sixers team that had won eight of 1going in, scoring at will and waltzing to a 121-76 win, its eighth in nine games. "That was pretty much an aberration," said Collins after his team fell to 11-17. "I knew the first 3 minutes of the game. We had no juice. They ran the same play six or seven straight times. I think they scored on eight of their first 10 possessions. For whatever reason, we just weren't there." Neither were two of Chicago's main players, which makes the loss that much worse. Forward/center Joakim Noah - and his 14 points and 11.7 rebounds - is sidelined after having surgery to repair a torn ligament in his right thumb, and forward Taj Gibson sat out after suffering a concussion in a game this past Saturday.
They weren't missed. Luol Deng and Carlos Boozer provided an inside-out game that the Sixers couldn't stop. Deng was nearly perfect on his midrange game, making 10 of 14 shots en route to 22 points. Boozer, recently back after missing the first 15 games with an injured hand, ruled the lane, going for 16 points and 1rebounds, while new starter Kurt Thomas did a wonderful fill-in job, posting 12 points and eight rebounds.
The Sixers were no match for Chicago's inside game, getting outscored in the paint by 52-26. Center Spencer Hawes was held scoreless in 18 minutes and Elton Brand had just six points in his 28.
Add to the Bulls' arsenal point guard Derrick Rose, who has that rare blend of speed and quickness, and it was an unfair matchup. He got to the places he wanted to on the court, whenever he wanted, and finished with 22 points, 12 assists and five rebounds in just 29 minutes.
The Bulls (17-9) made 10 of their first 14 shots in building a 27-13 lead late in the first quarter. That lead grew to as many as 20 when former Sixer Kyle Korver (10 points) drained a three-pointer with 33.7 seconds left in the half for a 61-4lead. It got far worse in the second half. The Sixers made just four field goals in the third quarter and didn't score a point for a span of 5 minutes, 29 seconds. The Bulls upped the lead to 51, 118-57, on a driving layup by seldom used, and fan favorite, Brian Scalabrine. "An old fashioned butt-kicking," is how Brand described the loss. "They did whatever they wanted to. We didn't see this coming. They really took it to us." The Sixers have been successful of late mainly because of their defense. Last night, they had as much defense as Ebenezer Scrooge had holiday cheer. The Bulls made 64.5 percent of their shots (49-for-76), dealt 32 assists and got a 19-for-27 shooting effort from their bench.
The coach called it an aberration. Andre Iguodala, who led the team with 17 points, didn't see it so much that way. "We've just been getting by," Iguodala said. "We've been getting some good wins at home but I don't think we've been playing good basketball. Other teams haven't been playing so well against us. When we start winning, teams kind of wake up, they don't sleep on you anymore. They executed much better than we did. "We've been playing good enough to win against the teams we've been playing and then when we play against the top-notch teams, we get exposed a little bit." Or a lot, as was the case last night. And it doesn't get easier as they'll face the Celtics tonight in Boston, a team that has won 13 straight. "It's good for us to be able to get right back out there, to try to put this behind us," said Thaddeus Young, who was the other Sixer in double figures with 12. "Just because we've been winning, it isn't going to be easy to forget this one. We lost by 45 points. That's not easy to forget." But that is just what the coach wants his team to do. "I just told them we've worked too hard and I hope that's not what we want to become," Collins said. "I'll give them one night. Sometimes you see it around the holidays a lot. Boozer was great, Derrick Rose and Luol. Their bench at one point was 16 of 19 from the floor. This is really about where they want to go from here. This is not indicative of the way we've been playing. I expect our guys to bounce back." Six shots
Sixers guards Jrue Holiday, Jodie Meeks, Evan Turner and Lou Williams combined to make nine of 35 shots from the floor . . . Craig Brackins and Jason Kapono were deactivated.
For more Sixers coverage, read
the Daily News' Sixers blog, Sixerville, at
http://go.philly.com/sixerville.
Follow him on Twitte

description.hltext_display: China says Vatican criticism 'imprudent and ungrounded'
description.content:
China on Wednesday rejected as "imprudent" and "dangerous" the Vatican's criticism of a high-level meeting of its official Catholic Church, which is not recognised by the pope, state media said.
tThe statement from the country's State Administration for Religious Affairs came after the Vatican accused China of "unacceptable and hostile acts" that provoked "a grave loss of trust", following the assembly of Chinese bishops.
"The Vatican's behaviour is very imprudent and ungrounded," Xinhua news agency quoted a spokesman for the administration as saying.
"The Vatican's position is well-known. It works to promote political ideas under the pretext of religious belief, which is very dangerous and will seriously harm the healthy development of Chinese Catholicism in China."
The Chinese bishops elected a new chairman -- Bishop Fang Xingyao -- of the Chinese Patriotic Catholic Association, which controls the state-backed church, as well as a new leader of the council of Chinese bishops.
The Holy See had also criticised the ordination last month of a priest in the northern Chinese city of Chengde, which it had not approved.
Last week, the Vatican said in a statement that both incidents had "unilaterally damaged the dialogue and climate of trust that had been established" between the Holy See and China.
The Vatican said the meeting had been "imposed on numerous bishops, priests, religious and lay faithful," describing China's "persistent desire to control the most intimate area of citizens' lives" as "a sign of fear and weakness."
While the Holy See reaffirmed its "own wish to dialogue honestly," it said the meeting was a sign of the state church's "intransigent intolerance" and condemned the "grave violation of the human rights" of those forced to attend.
The Chinese Patriotic Chinese Association does not acknowledge the authority of Pope Benedict XVI and is fiercely opposed to clergy in China who are loyal to the Vatican.
"China's Catholics have the right to elect their own bishops. The Vatican does not understand China's situation," the association's vice-president Liu Bainian told AFP at the conclusion of the bishops' meeting earlier this month.
The Vatican and China have not had formal diplomatic ties since 1951, when the Holy See angered Mao Zedong's Communist government by recognising the Nationalist Chinese regime as the legitimate government of China.
The Nationalists fled to Taiwan after losing a civil war with the Communists in 1949. As such, the Vatican is one of the few states that recognises the island, which Beijing considers part of its own territory.
Official tallies put the number of Catholics in China at 5.7 million, including members of both the unofficial and official churches.
Human rights groups say that those who remain loyal to the Vatican often suffer persecution, with detentions of bishops common.

event_or_fact.property: China's Catholics have the right to elect their own bishops.; The Vatican does not understand China's situation

description.hltext_display: 宝钢原董事长谢企华或将出任国新公司董事长
description.content:
“只闻楼梯响，不见人下楼”的“中投二号”终于尘埃落定。记者21日从国资委了解到，被业界称为“中投二号”的第三家国有资产经营管理公司——中国国新控股有限责任公司定于今日挂牌。此举意味着央企重组即将进入一个新的加速周期。
据悉，宝钢集团原董事长谢企华将出任国新公司的董事长，现任国有重点大型企业监事会主席刘东生将担任总经理。
这个被国资委副主任邵宁称之为“国资委的一个可以信赖与依靠的推手”的国有资本运作平台正式诞生，并且进入运营，将使得央企重组进一步加速。
从定位来看，国资委前主任李荣融曾多次表示，“国新公司主要职责是加快央企整合和调整国资产业布局，将纳入一些规模较小、微利、效益差、应退出市场的央企。”
国资委研究中心企业改革与发展研究部部长王志刚认为，国家将在军工、煤炭、电网电力、民航、航运、电信、石油石化等七大行业保持国有经济的绝对控制力，所以七大行业以外的行业被并入国新公司的概率更大。“主要是一些科研院所、贸易类央企和其他一些效益差、规模小的央企。”王志刚说。
数据显示，到目前为止，国资委监管的央企户数仍有123家，离此前确定的到2010年年底减至80至100户的目标还有一段距离。
多家券商报告认为，可以关注央企重组概念，如五矿发展、中航精机、银河科技、长航凤凰、长航油运、北矿磁材、乐凯胶片等。
值得注意的是，国新公司之前已经公开亮相，但并不是因为重组弱小央企，而是现身五矿系的整合当中。
国新公司持股五矿股份，业内认为是为了助推五矿整体上市，也是国资委探索通过国资经营公司持股的开始。国资委副主任邵宁上个月曾表示，国有企业改革的最终目标就是把大型国企打造成一个干干净净的上市公司。“以后要逐步把包袱消化掉，之后再把集团公司去掉，只保留中间做主营业务的上市公司，完全按照资本市场的要求进行运营。”邵宁说。（记者 张牡霞）

description.hltext_display: 一茂名彩民30元中2822万
description.content:
中新社茂名12月22日电 (葛燕梅 杨炯)广东茂名福利彩票发行中心22日证实，21日晚，中国联销双色球电脑福利彩票2010149期开奖，茂名市区一名彩民投注30元人民币，命中2822万元大奖，创当地彩票史上奖金最高纪录。
据检索，中奖彩票出自茂名市区人民北路电力招待所对面的44161008号福利彩票投注站，中奖彩民仅以一张投注额为30元的5倍单式票命中，就轻松获得2822万元的大奖。
茂名福彩中出2822万元历史大奖的消息不但震撼了铁杆福彩迷，更让想粘财气的广大市民“心痒痒”。当街头巷尾的福彩迷们都还在兴致勃勃地谈论这位幸运的“千万富翁”时候，彩民林先生对记者感叹地说：“原来用爱心、善心支持福彩，想一夜暴富也不是梦。”
据介绍， 21日茂名福彩可谓双喜临门。先是在20时44分，茂名福彩“中福在线”高凉中路销售厅刚刚喜中全国累积奖25万元大奖。后在21时30分双色球开奖，该市又一幸运彩民中得双色球2822万元大奖。
茂名福利彩票发行中心负责人叶秀盛称，茂名自1988年发行福利彩票以来，奖金千万元以上的已有5次，21日晚“出炉”的2822万元大奖再次刷新历史纪录。(完)

description.hltext_display: Chan Hearron: Intelligent design properly combines philosophy with science
description.content:
This letter is in response to Michael T. Roberts' Friday column, "Keep teachings of evolution, creationism separate in class."
It is unfortunate that Darwinists have been successful in convincing the public that the only bad science is that which disagrees with Darwinism (and that intelligent design really isn't science at all they say — it's just religion masquerading as science).
As I read, Mr. Roberts article this past Friday, something struck me as odd. Mr. Roberts said, "Belief systems fall into the realm of religion and philosophy. Science seeks to find truths about nature "» " Then later on in the article he says, "I have no problem with discussing intelligent design or creationism. However, being belief systems, these allied topics belong in religion or philosophy classes — not in science classes."
What Mr. Roberts fails to see is that his whole article is "philosophical" in nature and not scientific. Mr. Roberts tries to separate science from philosophy, but he can never do that because science is a slave to philosophy.
Mr. Roberts is one, among many, who basically accuse those of wanting to promote ID that they are practicing "bad science." In fact, the exact opposite is true. It's the Darwinists who are practicing the bad science, because their science is built on a false philosophy. In effect it's their secular religion of naturalism that leads them to ignore the empirically detectable scientific evidence for design. Here are three reasons why good science requires good philosophy:
1. Science cannot be done without philosophy. Philosophical assumptions are utilized in the search for causes, and, therefore, cannot be the result of them. For example, scientists assume that reason and the scientific method allow us to accurately understand the world around us. That cannot be proven by science itself. You can't prove the tools of science — the laws of logic, the Law of Causality or the reliability of observation — by running some kind of experiment. You have to assume those things are true in order to do the experiment! When Mr. Roberts says, "Intelligent design/creationism is not science and does not belong in science classes "» " I would like to ask him what scientific experiment he did to determine that this statement is true.

event_or_fact.property: "Intelligent design/creationism is not science and does not belong in science classes " " I would like to ask him what scientific experiment he did to determine that this statement is true
Belief systems fall into the realm of religion and philosophy.
I have no problem with discussing intelligent design or creationism.

description.hltext_display: On 'Mission: Impossible', Anil Kapoor lives like '24' at 51!
description.content: It doesn't get bigger and better for Anil Kapoor. Blessed with age defying genes, his career has gone seriously global at a time when he is turning 51. The Bollywood actor plans to spend his birthday Friday with friends even as he lives life out of a suitcase. "I am looking forward to my birthday Dec 24. I will celebrate it with my friends," Anil told IANS in an interview. Buddies might take over the big boy's big day but when it comes to the New Year, the actor reveals he will "have a holiday with family in Goa". He will cull out time from his jam-packed shooting schedule of the super-spy series "Mission: Impossible"'s fourth instalment in Vancouver. He grew up in a tenement in Chembur, Mumbai where he shared a single room with seven others. He has starred in many hit movies like "Mr.India", "Beta", "Viraasat", "Ram Lakhan", "Tezaab", "Parinda" and "No Entry".With over 100 films to his credit since 1979, the actor has defied twilight with ageless looks leaving most of his contemporaries green. "I'm just fortunate and lucky that I've got the genes that make me look younger than I am. I'm just happy. What can I say...I'm blessed," he blushes.Is that the reason why he really hasn't gone for a major makeover in any film?"It depends on the character. If it demands, then I'll do it but I don't want to change my look just for the sake of doing it," said Anil, who's pulled out his moustache only thrice in his three-decade career.The actor-turned-producer took the West by storm with his role as a dubious quiz-show host in Danny Boyle's multiple Oscar award-winning underdog drama "Slumdog Millionaire" in 2009.While that paved the way for his stint opposite Kiefer Sutherland in US TV show "24", the latter got him an opportunity to rub shoulders with superstar Tom Cruise in "Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol". But the actor is not giving up on his roots for that. Despite the jet lag, he shoots for both Bollywood and Hollywood simultaneously. "Sometimes it becomes tough because of travelling and switching languages...One month you are doing something in Hindi and then you fly down and start speaking English. Sometimes changing gears becomes difficult in terms of language, style, atmosphere, people, but it's great fun," he says.He also can't stop bringing his goofy side out. "I love entertaining people. I love making them laugh. If sometimes it disappoints the intellectuals, then I'll do something for them too," said the actor, whose last outing was the laugh riot "No Problem".Been there, done that. Now how about trying his hand at direction? "No. I don't think so," he winks his trademark smile.Asked the obvious question on how he perceives his career, the actor scratches his French beard, gives a thought and says: "I'm just moving with the flow and enjoying the whole process. I'm not thinking too much. I am just doing one thing at a time and giving my best. "There is so much in myself as an actor and as a producer, and I want to give as much as I can. I enjoy this whole process of creativity...international-national, whenever, whatever exciting and interesting will draw my attention, I'll do it."And everything that I've learnt there (in the West), whatever best I've come across, I'll bring that back (to Bollywood)," he added. Freezing his place in B-Town, the actor is riding high on sequels to "Race", "No Entry" and "Mr. India", and other ventures like "Tezz" and "Power". Coming to international projects, he is in talks with Ben Stiller, Fox Television and Sophia Loren's son."I am looking forward to my birthday Dec 24. I will celebrate it with my friends," Anil told IANS in an interview. description.hltext_display: ATV-related death points up the need for safety when it comes to children and vehicles, on or off the road
description.content:
The death of a young ATV rider in Haughton last weekend is a tragic reminder that safety can never take a holiday, even during the Christmas season.
At a time when school is out of session and Christmas presents may include all manner of vehicles, from bicycles to four-wheelers, parents and young riders need to be alert to dangers whether on or off road. Even experienced riders can take a tumble.
The obvious start is to include a helmet as part of the gift. But helmet laws only apply to motorcycles, motor-driven cycles and motorized bicycles on public property, according to Erin Habich, assistant public information officer of the Bossier Parish Sheriff's Office. The weekend accident involving the 8 year old boy was on private property.
"Though there are no laws on the books concerning helmets or children and ATVs, we encourage all parents and guardians to adhere to the safety instructions that come with the vehicle," said Habich in an e-mail. "Most often, the safety information with the product will state that the ATV is only to be used by someone 16 or older and that a helmet is required for operation."
The gaps in safety laws merit some legislative review, says Donna Cavanaugh, executive director of ThinkFirst, a safety advocacy organization. Louisiana had recorded 212 total deaths related to ATVs between 1982 and 2008, with 41 of those from 2006-08, according to ATVsafety.gov.
The only laws on the books concerning ATVs state that they can be driven on the shoulder of public roadways (except interstates) only for farm-related activities. And the rider must be able to provide proof of that activity and have liability insurance, according to Habich.
"ATV's can be heavy and they can travel at high speeds," says Cavanaugh. She notes that ATV's require interactive riding skills and the ability of drivers to shift their weight freely in all directions, depending on the situation and terrain, according to ATVsafety.gov. "Interactive riding is critical to maintaining safe control of the ATV," said Cavanaugh. "This is something that is taught when you take formal training on how to ride an ATV." Dealers and ATVsafety.gov can guide consumers to instruction opportunities.
"The hard fact is that accidents happen and in order to keep your family the safest, you need to follow all of the guidelines that come with a product," said Habich. Even though ATVs are "sometimes marketed as toys for any age, they are not toys. They are motor vehicles that can be dangerous if not used properly."
