description.hltext_display: 四大谜底待解
description.content:
筹备多年的“中投二号”——中国国新控股有限责任公司今日将揭开面纱。尽管此前媒体对国新公司的报道较多，但在国资委“多做少说”的低调作风下，关于国新公司方方面面，依然存在不甚清晰的地方。这其中就包括国新公司的定位、纳入企业名单、高管、注册资金等四大核心问题。
定 位：
重组平台或资产运营平台？
尽管国新公司上半年就已经获得国务院正式批复，但直至今日才宣布成立，主要原因在于国资委内部对于国新公司的定位一直有不同的声音。
国新公司是国资委旗下第3家国有资产经营公司，另两家是中国诚通和国开投。诚通主要从事现代物流、综合贸易；国开投主要做基础领域的投资。它们成立后虽然分别担当了一部分处置不良资产的责任，但并非纯粹以经营股权、产权为主的资产运营公司。
而国新公司是一个介于国资委和央企之间专门从事资本运作和资产处置的平台，具体从事国有资产产权经营和资本运作，但没有任何行政管理职能，一般不直接从事生产经营活动。国资委通过成立国新公司将使国资管理模式走向“国资委——资产管理公司——央企”的三层架构。
但“三层架构”的模式并非没有质疑之声。据媒体报道，有部分国资委系统内部人士认为，国资委设立国资经营公司进行资本运作为时尚早，现在就想一步到位“过于理想化”。国新公司最紧要的是承担起央企退出和处置不良资产的职责。此前，国资委前主任李荣融也多次表示，“国新公司主要职责是加快央企整合和调整国资产业布局，将纳入一些规模较小、效益差、应退出市场的央企。”
值得注意的，根据12月18日五矿发展发布的公告，国新公司已悄然持有该公司大股东五矿股份2.5%的股份。这一动作与上述国新公司“加快央企整合和调整布局”的定位似有出入。
纳入企业：
是“三类央企”还是“落后生”？
无论定位如何，将有多家央企被“打包”纳入国新公司已经成为国资委各方共识。因为只有将部分央企装入国新公司，才能实现国资委预定的到今年底央企户数减少至80至100家的目标。
问题是，哪些央企将被纳入其中呢？记者了解到，尽管很多央企经营业绩不理想，但他们并不愿意进入国新公司。为何？有央企高管称，国新公司是资产管理类公司，未来经营的方向是经营股权搞资本运作，如果被装入可能还会面临第二次被重组，这意味着被装入的央企会从原有一级公司逐步成为国新公司的“儿子”公司甚至是“孙子”公司。公司级别、高管级别的降低难以被这些央企所接受。
但今年年中召开的央企负责人会议已经明确：“要以组建国新资产管理公司为契机，加快中央企业重组和调整步伐，今年要把中央企业调整到100家以内。”就此而言，一批央企将不得不被纳入国新公司。
此前有国资专家建议，应将三类央企率先划入：一类是科研院所，一类是经营亏损的企业，一类是纯竞争性企业。也有人表示，业绩考核排名靠后的20多家央企将率先被纳入国新公司。但最终哪些央企将被划入国新公司，到目前为止尚无定论。

description.hltext_display: 印度成功试射2枚短程导弹
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据外电报道，印度国防部官员说，印度军方12月22日成功试射了2枚可携带核弹头的短程导弹。
报道称，作为“例行训练”的内容，印度军方当天在该国东部奥里萨邦钱迪普尔(Chandipur-on-sea)综合试验场成功试射两枚国产的“大地”-2(Prithvi II)地对地短程导弹。
这一导弹的射程在350公里左右，既可携带核弹头，也可以携带常规弹头。
报道指出，今年9月24日，印度在同一试验场进行了“大地”-2型战术弹道导弹的试射，但试射因“技术问题”宣告失败。
不过，由于此次试射成功，印度媒体援引国防研究与发展组织官员的话说，“‘大地’-2型导弹在此前的多次试射中证明了其精准性和功能的健全”。

description.hltext_display: Trio convicted in counterfeit check ring
description.content:
NEWPORT NEWS – Three members of a counterfeit check ring conspiracy were sentenced last week for running a two-year fraud scheme throughout the Tidewater area that caused more than $50,000 in losses. Banks and businesses, including some in James City County, were among the victims.
Shanda L. Gilyard, 40, of Portsmouth, was sentenced to 192 months in prison, followed by five years of supervised release. Cynthia Simmons, 66, and Ollie A. Waters, 56, also of Portsmouth, were sentenced, respectively, to 56 months in prison, followed by three years of supervised release and 10 months in prison, followed by five years of supervised release. Each defendant was also ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $55,182.39. Both Gilyard’s and Simmons’ sentences were made to run consecutive to other state terms of imprisonment on unrelated charges.
In June a federal grand jury returned a superseding indictment charging all three defendants with a conspiracy to commit bank fraud, substantive counts of bank fraud, possession of counterfeit securities and aggravated identity theft.
According to the evidence introduced at trial, bnetween 2007 and 2010, Gilyard, Waters and Simmons engaged in a scheme to create and pass counterfeit company checks at various banks throughout the Tidewater area. The scheme extended for more than two years and involved banks and companies in James City County, Norfolk, Hampton, Suffolk, Portsmouth and other cities in Tidewater.
Gilyard and Simmons recruited dozens of individuals to provide copies of legitimate checks that were then used by Gilyard to create counterfeit checks on a computer. Gilyard also recruited individuals, including Waters, to present and cash these counterfeit checks at various financial institutions and other businesses
Those affected include TowneBank, Walmart, Food Lion and V-Com, causing losses in excess of $50,000. Gilyard also recruited individuals to open bank accounts at TowneBank that were used to cash counterfeit checks. Gilyard promised and provided payment to these individuals and others for their participation in cashing counterfeit checks. Gilyard was also charged with aggravated identity theft as she used other individuals identities to cash counterfeit checks.
Waters pled guilty to the conspiracy to commit bank fraud in August. Simmons pled guilty to one count of production of counterfeit securities of an organization in September. Gilyard proceeded to trial and was convicted of all 15 counts of the superseding indictment on Sept. 15.

event_or_fact.property: and provided payment to these individuals and others for their participation in cashing counterfeit checks
conspiracy to commit bank fraud in August

description.hltext_display: Commission roundup: County may have to foot property tax bill for A.O. Smith land
description.content:
Cheatham County mayor David McCullough said the land deal with A.O. Smith should close on Tuesday or Wednesday, but the county might have to pay $131,274 in property taxes on the land. McCullough learned Monday that the county may be responsible for the property taxes, but officials are moving forward on the contract as they determine if the county must pay that bill.
The mayor told commissioners when a property that has been assessed as Greenbelt as is the property being purchased from A.O. Smith is transferred the new owner may be liable to pay what is referred to as rollback taxes on the property.
It was a surprise to both A.O. Smith and the county, McCullough said.
The mayor said county attorney Bill Herbert will study whether the county is responsible for paying the property taxes, but he wanted commissioners to be aware there might an additional cost.
The county and Ashland City are buying about 220 acres on the Tennessee Waltz Parkway from A.O. Smith as part of an incentive package the company sought after Mays flood. The citys portion is about 35 acres.
The mayor added that if the commission is required to pay the taxes, then the body would have to approve the funding mechanism. In addition, he said Ashland City would pay about 16 percent of that amount.
McCullough also reported that the first phase of the engineering study came back with good results.
Sheriff speaks out
Sheriff John Holder addressed the commission over a recent article that appeared in the I-24 Exchange. At issue was a comment made by commissioner John Haines, who stated that the sheriff did not previously support school resource officers.
Haines made the comments during an education committee meeting in November.
Holder said Haines statement was not truthful and he supported school resource officers. He said in the past he had tried to apply for grants, but was told that the crime rate in the county was not high enough to justify the officers.
In addition, the sheriff said he supports the county and works tirelessly to make it a better place. (2 of 2)After Holder sat down, Haines addressed the sheriff, saying it was his recollection that Holder did not support SROs in the past. Haines added that he is concerned about the safety of students, thus the need for officers.
The two exchanged words, but McCullough then pounded the gavel to bring the meeting back to order.
Other business
The commission agreed to transfer courthouse security to the sheriffs department.
When the county created courthouse security in 2008, the commission agreed that General Sessions Judge Phillip Maxey would oversee the department. However, a recent state attorney general opinion states that the sheriff is responsible for providing court officers. Maxey will still supervise those workers.
The commission approved the appointments of several residents and commissioners to various boards.
First district commissioner Doris Sanders was appointed to the Public Records Commission and Mark Kelton Jarrell and David L. Bibee were appointed to the Cheatham Development Association.
Second district commissioner Rob Myers and Perry Keenan were appointed to the Planning Commission. Myers replaces commissioner Brenda Montgomery.
Bill Herbert Sr., Jeannie Wood and James Gupton were appointed to the 911 Board. Herbert, Wood and Gupton replace Marc Coulon, Faye Haines and Rickey Burton. Scott Willcutt was re-appointed to the board.
Fourth district commissioner Donnie Jordan and Tonnie Trotter were appointed to the Zoning Appeals Board.
The commission approved revisions to two sections of the countys purchasing policy. The last time major revisions were made to the policy was in 2003.The commission approved a memorial for the family of the late Randy Anderson, who worked in the sheriffs department for a number of years. Anderson died in October.

description.hltext_display: Incentives to make the best out of 2011 budgets
description.content:
Bobbie Greer is a community columnist for The Facts. Contact her at 979-265-7411, or e-mail bobbie.greer@thefacts.com. By BOBBIE GREER The Facts | 0 comments
My granddaughter has arrived. Maleigha Crane made her debut early Friday morning. To the delight of my daughter, she arrived after final exams. For me, she arrived right before I was ready to scream.
A half-hour into the actual delivery, I became agitated as my daughter vigorously tried to push Maleigha into the world. It was taking too long; I wondered how many painful pushes she must endure.

description.hltext_display: Aantal octrooien Siemens naar 58.000
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? ANP
DEN HAAG (AFN) - Onderzoekers en ontwikkelaars van het Duitse technologieconcern Siemens hebben in het afgelopen boekjaar 8800 uitvindingen gedaan. Dat zijn er veertig per dag, ofwel 15 procent meer dan in het voorgaande jaar. Het totaal aantal octrooien nam toe van 56.000 vorig jaar tot 57.900 dit jaar, meldde Siemens woensdag.
Volgens het bedrijf is het innovatievermogen van Siemens daarmee opnieuw aangetoond. Topman Peter Löscher van Siemens AG onderscheidde onlangs in München nog twaalf succesvolle onderzoekers en ontwikkelaars als 'Uitvinder van het jaar’, onder wie de Nederlander Frans Ladru. Samen zijn ze goed voor ongeveer 1300 verleende octrooien. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.hltext_display: SCB mit Playoff-Effizienz
description.author: Emil Bischofberger
description.content:
Der SC Bern glänzte in einem unterhaltsamen Zähringerderby mit seiner Chancenauswertung und siegte gegen Fribourg 5:1. 17 131 Zuschauer hatten sich Anfang November nicht getäuscht, als sie beim Heimspiel gegen Fribourg für eine erstmals ausverkaufte Postfinance-Arena gesorgt hatten. 17 131 kamen gestern zurück in der Hoffnung, abermals ein Spiel nahe am Playoff-Rhythmus geboten zu erhalten. Sie sollten ihren Besuch nicht bereuen. Zumindest streckenweise zeigten die Teams eine intensive Partie. Dabei glänzten die Berner offensiv mit Playoff-würdiger Effizienz, defensiv zerlegten sie das Freiburger Kombinationsspiel mit aufsässiger Störarbeit. Die Gäste konnten dem primär Playoff-Härte und -Intensität entgegensetzen, ansonsten liegt im Fribourg-Spiel derzeit einiges im Argen, 9 Niederlagen in 12 Partien zeugen davon.
Offensiv waren es mehrere SCB-Protagonisten, die gestern zu gefallen wussten. Da war Simon Gamache, der mit seiner Leistung an diesem Abend wohl die Verantwortlichen beider Teams für ein künftiges Engagement überzeugen konnte. Beim 1:0 (5.) zog er mit seinem Dribbling drei Freiburger auf sich, ehe er den Puck geschickt zu Vigier zurücklegte, das 2:0 gelang ihm mittels Ablenker (11./Schuss McLean).
Für die Tore 3 und 4 waren Rüthemann und Plüss besorgt, beide trafen mit satten Hocheckschüssen über Huets Fanghand. Das letzte Tor des Abends war Beat Gerber vorbehalten, dem sein erster Saisontreffer gelang.
Dazwischen hatte Melin zum 2:1 getroffen. Es war der einzige Moment an diesem Abend, in dem die Freiburger kurz Aufwind hatten. Für eine Weile agierten die Berner nach dem Anschlusstreffer fahrig, konnten den Rhythmus nicht mehr bestimmen. Nur brachten sich die Freiburger wenig später selber darum, ganz ins Spiel zurückzukehren.
Mowers’ Aussetzer entschied
Die Vorentscheidung fiel im Anschluss an einen Aussetzer von Gottérons schnellem Flügel Mark Mowers nach 39 Minuten. Dieser war durchgebrochen und nach einem Zweikampf mit Berns Roche gefallen. Der Schiedsrichter pfiff. «Strafe Roche» nahmen die Gäste an, «Schwalbe Mowers» entschied jedoch Referee Reiber. Das brachte Mowers völlig aus dem Konzept – auch wenn Reiber damit richtig lag. Mowers zeigte einen Ausraster erster Güteklasse, deckte Reiber erst mit einer Flut von Kraftausdrücken ein, die auch nicht abnahm, als der Angesprochene gegen den Amerikaner längst eine 10-Minuten- sowie eine Spieldauerdisziplinarstrafe ausgesprochen hatte. Playoff-würdig emotional wütete Mowers weiter. Da flog auch noch ein Stuhl von der Strafbank aufs Eis, es war der Schlusspunkt von Mowers’ Wutanfall.
2:1 führten die Berner zu dem Zeitpunkt, als sie sich zum Bully für ihr viertes Powerplay des Abends aufs Eis begaben. Ihre Entschlossenheit, mit einem Tor die Vorentscheidung herbeizuführen, war spürbar. Dubé, Roche und Rüthemann liessen den Puck zirkulieren, schossen, passten, schossen. Bis Rüthemann die Lücke fand – 3:1. Ob er tatsächlich so präzis gezielt hatte – oder auch eine Portion Glück dabei war –, wollte der 34-Jährige nicht verraten. Wie der Flügel danach seinen Stock durch die Hände gleiten liess, glich er einem Cowboy, der eben seinen Gegner im Duell erledigt hatte.
Die Geste passte: Die Freiburger hatten mit dem 1:3 den Dienst quittiert. (Der Bund)

description.hltext_display: 国新资产管理公司今挂牌
description.content:
“只闻楼梯响，不见人下楼”的“中投二号”终于尘埃落定。记者21日从国资委了解到，被业界称为“中投二号”的第三家国有资产经营管理公司——中国国新控股有限责任公司定于今日挂牌。此举意味着央企重组即将进入一个新的加速周期。
据悉，宝钢集团原董事长谢企华将出任国新公司的董事长，现任国有重点大型企业监事会主席刘东生将担任总经理。
这个被国资委副主任邵宁称之为“国资委的一个可以信赖与依靠的推手”的国有资本运作平台正式诞生，并且进入运营，将使得央企重组进一步加速。
从定位来看，国资委前主任李荣融曾多次表示，“国新公司主要职责是加快央企整合和调整国资产业布局，将纳入一些规模较小、微利、效益差、应退出市场的央企。”
国资委研究中心企业改革与发展研究部部长王志刚认为，国家将在军工、煤炭、电网电力、民航、航运、电信、石油石化等七大行业保持国有经济的绝对控制力，所以七大行业以外的行业被并入国新公司的概率更大。“主要是一些科研院所、贸易类央企和其他一些效益差、规模小的央企。”王志刚说。
数据显示，到目前为止，国资委监管的央企户数仍有123家，离此前确定的到2010年年底减至80至100户的目标还有一段距离。
多家券商报告认为，可以关注央企重组概念，如五矿发展、中航精机、银河科技、长航凤凰、长航油运、北矿磁材、乐凯胶片等。
值得注意的是，国新公司之前已经公开亮相，但并不是因为重组弱小央企，而是现身五矿系的整合当中。
国新公司持股五矿股份，业内认为是为了助推五矿整体上市，也是国资委探索通过国资经营公司持股的开始。国资委副主任邵宁上个月曾表示，国有企业改革的最终目标就是把大型国企打造成一个干干净净的上市公司。“以后要逐步把包袱消化掉，之后再把集团公司去掉，只保留中间做主营业务的上市公司，完全按照资本市场的要求进行运营。”邵宁说。（记者 张牡霞）

description.hltext_display: Rama Yade devrait être nommée ambassadrice à l'Unesco ce mercredi
description.author: minutes.fr
description.content:
POLITIQUE - Elle remplace Catherine Colonna... Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées Agrandir la photo Plus d'articles sur : Rama Yade L'ex-secrétaire d'Etat Rama Yade devrait être nommée ce mercredi en Conseil des ministres ambassadrice, déléguée permanente de la France auprès de l'Unesco en remplacement de Catherine Colonna, a indiqué une source proche du dossier, confirmant une information de RTL.
Figurant parmi les personnalités les plus populaires en France, Rama Yade, 34 ans, devrait être nommée ambassadrice auprès de l'Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture, dont le siège est à Paris. Ex porte-parole de l'Elysée sous Jacques Chirac, ex-ministre de Affaires européennes, Catherine Colonna occupait cette fonction depuis 2008.
Incarnation de l'anti-conformisme plus que de la «diversité»
Rama Yade a été secrétaire d'Etat aux droits de l'Homme (2007-2009) puis secrétaire d'Etat aux Sports (2009-2010). Après avoir fait ses premières armes à l'UMP, poussée par Nicolas Sarkozy, elle a rejoint récemment Jean-Louis Borloo au parti radical. De la visite de Kadhafi à sa critique -tardive- du discours de Dakar, en passant par ses caprices électoraux, la jeune femme, qui a eu 34 ans en décembre, a incarné au gouvernement l'anti-conformisme plus que la «diversité», aux Droits de l'homme puis aux Sports.
Née à Dakar d'un couple d'enseignants proche de Senghor, elle est arrivée en France à onze ans. Elle est diplômée de Sciences po, administratrice du Sénat, avant d'apparaître pour la première fois sous les feux des projecteurs le jour de l'investiture de Nicolas Sarkozy comme candidat UMP à l'élection présidentielle en janvier 2007. Battue aux municipales à Colombes (Hauts-de-Seine) en 2008, Rama Yade a tenu tête à deux reprises au chef de l'Etat et à l'UMP en refusant de se présenter aux Européennes en 2009, puis en choisissant de se présenter dans les Hauts-de-Seine et non dans le Val-d'Oise aux régionales de 2010.

description.hltext_display: Making good history
description.content:
When President Obama signs a bill repealing the military's "don't ask, don't tell" rule, it will be an event as significant for gay rights as President Harry Truman's order integrating the U.S. military was for black Americans. Obama's signature will mark historic progress for a nation that has for too long denigrated gay Americans. Our hope is that it is the death knell for one of the last frontiers of bigotry.
The U.S. Senate on Saturday did its part, striking down the ban that forced gay men and lesbians to deny who they are, even as they risked their lives for the rest of us. The House acted
earlier.
"Don't ask, don't tell" never made sense. It was intended by President Clinton to soften the military's outright ban. Instead, it acknowledged the obvious — that gays and lesbians were already serving, ably and courageously.
Ensconcing them in barracks and shipboard closets simply made the statement that being who they were was a flaw but that harboring prejudice against them was not. We should be past that as a nation. But then the military often has been a leader in such progress.
We make a prediction here that we don't believe to be bold: There will be no long-standing deterioration of military morale or readiness after repeal. A survey of the military earlier revealed that.
But the military must ensure this by having as little tolerance for the prejudices of homophobes as it now has for the bigotry of racists. It is, simply, the American thing to do.

description.hltext_display: Christmas trees will face new life as wood chips
description.content:
Baltimore County's collection of Christmas trees for recycling will take place over a two-week period, beginning Jan. 10.
Residents must have the trees out at the curb no later than Saturday, Jan. 15.
County officials ask residents to set out the tree only (no decorations, bags, tree stands, etc.); and only set out trees at the front curb. Trees will not be collected from alleys.
Collectors will pick up Christmas trees in standard trash/recycling trucks, and deliver them to county facilities to be chipped and later used as mulch.
Residents who live in an apartment or condominium should follow their property manager's rules when recycling Christmas trees.
Residents who want to drop off Christmas trees themselves may do so starting Monday, Dec. 27, at the following county drop-off locations:
* Eastern Sanitary Landfill Solid Waste Management Facility, off 11400 block of Pulaski Highway, White Marsh. Monday through Saturday, 7:30 a.m. to 3:30 p.m.
* Baltimore County Resource Recovery Facility, Drop-off Drive, off Warren Road, Cockeysville. Monday through Saturday, 7 a.m. to 4 p.m.
All county trash and recycling drop-off facilities will be closed Christmas Day, Saturday, Dec. 25; and New Year's Day, Saturday, Jan. 1. But the facilities will be open Christmas Eve, Friday, Dec. 24; and New Year's Eve, Friday, Dec. 31.
Residents can log onto www.bcrecycles.com for more information about recycling and trash collection, or call the Bureau of Solid Waste Management at 410-887-2000.
-- Steve Schuster
Local recreation volunteers honored as Shining Stars
At its Dec. 20 meeting, the Baltimore County Council, and the Department of Recreation and Parks honored 46 volunteers from recreation councils and nature center councils throughout the county at the fifth annual Shining Star awards.
Officials noted that in 2010 alone, almost 72,000 volunteers donated 1.6 million hours to assist with 1,938 recreation and nature council programs in Baltimore County.
Honorees representing local rec councils are: Michael Mulford, Loch Raven Recreation Council; John Pagano, Towson Recreation Council; Brian "Coach" Sheahan, Towsontowne Recreation Council; Eric Kihn, Lutherville-Timonium Recreation Council; and Stephen Jones, Cockeysville Recreation Council.
Also honored were Alan Lake of the Cromwell Valley Recreation Council; Ann Canoles, Oregon Ridge Nature Center; and Catherine Murphy of the Therapeutic Recreation Council.
Better Business offers tips on gift card purchases
The Better Business Bureau of Greater Maryland warns consumers that new regulations on gift card fees and expiration dates enacted by the Federal Reserve Board went into effect for all cards sold after Aug. 22, 2010. The changes apply to gift certificates, single-store cards and the Visa/MasterCard/Amex general-use gift cards which can be used at any store.
Prepaid phone cards and reloadable cards not marketed as gift cards and reward cards are exempt from the new regulations.
Under the new regulations, the balance on a gift card cannot expire before five years after it is issued. But the actual plastic card can expire. Bank-issued gift cards are more likely than retail cards to have an expiration date for the physical card, said the bureau.
Fees and limitations should be printed on the packaging of the gift card and include the amount of the fee will be and how frequently they will be made.
Companies can charge a monthly fee, if gift cards are not used after one year. These fees must be clearly disclosed to the consumer before buying the card. The Better Business Bureau urges consumers to:
* Check the terms and conditions of the gift card.
* Keep track of expiration dates and contact the store if your plastic card needs to be replaced soon.
* Remember that there is no maximum for monthly fees. A company could charge a very high amount after a year of inactivity as long as they disclose it. For example, Chase charges a $2.50 monthly fee after the first 12 calendar months following the gift card's purchase.
* Find out what information is needed if a card is lost or stolen and if there is a fee for replacing it.
Website, facebook are part of county tourism strategy
Baltimore County Executive Kevin Kamenetz last week announced a county tourism outreach initiative and released county tourism data.
Kamenetz, in a press conference at the Old Court House in Towson, said tourism is actually down in the county from previous years, but visitor spending in 2009 still totaled $1.85 billion.
Baltimore County has raised nearly $14 million in direct local taxes from tourism, officials said. According to Kamenetz, 18,026 people are currently employed in the tourism sector in the county.
Also introduced at the press conference were a new website, Enjoy a Greater Baltimore County -- www.enjoybaltimorecounty.com -- and social media tools including a new facebook fan page.
-- Steve Schuster
Coleman again leaving secret stashes in Towson
Nelson Coleman Jewelers, in Towson, will once again conduct its Secret Santa giveaway, in which the company "hides" packages containing jewelry in the downtown Towson area.
The packages are gifts to whoever finds them -- "finders keepers," according to a company release -- though the jeweler is asking recipients to alert them in order to be sure all gifts are claimed.
Staff started placing the gifts around town Dec. 13 and will continue through Dec. 24.
The company first conducted the campaign last year and left items in places such as the Towson library, a playground bench and a grocery store. This year, each box contains a sterling silver and diamond pendant.
"We started this holiday tradition last year, and the reactions have been wonderful, from both the gift givers and receivers," said Chris Coleman, company president and CEO, in the release.

description.hltext_display: Oregon’s Kelly wins coach of year
description.author: The Associated
description.content:
Eugene, Ore.
Smart move.
In just his second season leading Oregon, Kelly is taking the second-ranked Ducks to the national championship game on Jan. 10 against No. 1 Auburn — and for that he was voted AP Coach of the Year on Tuesday.
Kelly received 24 votes from the 60-member AP football poll panel to beat out his BCS title game counterpart, Gene Chizik of Auburn, who received 17 votes.
Stanford’s Jim Harbaugh was third with five votes, TCU’s Gary Patterson, last year’s winner, and Mark Dantonio of Michigan State each received three votes. Getting one vote apiece were Nevada’s Chris Ault, Oklahoma State’s Mike Gundy and Miami, Ohio’s Mike Haywood, who led the school to a Mid-American Conference championship before taking the top job at Pittsburgh last week.
One voter abstained and four did not return ballots.
Kelly has made a rapid rise from I-AA coordinator in New England to leading the Pac-10’s new powerhouse program to within a victory of its first national championship.

description.hltext_display: A Brief Look Back at Sports in 2010
description.author: Rahul Vaidyanath
description.content:
Spain's Man of the Match knocks in the winning against Netherlands. (Gabriel Bouys/AFP/)
It was a special year for sports in 2010. Whenever a World Cup, the month-long soccer festival that is the biggest sporting event in the world, takes place, it’s a special year for sports fans.
Coinciding with a World Cup year were the Winter Olympics, which were successfully hosted in Vancouver, Canada.
And once again, the Super Bowl delivered big time drama and a feel-good story for the city of New Orleans, still living in painful memories of Hurricane Katrina.
Spain Reigns
The first World Cup began inauspiciously for Euro 2008 champions Spain with a shocking 1–0 loss to Switzerland. But after that, Spain only allowed one more goal on the way to their first ever World Cup triumph.
The first World Cup on the African continent will be remembered for a number of interesting things: the drone of vuvuzelas, the incredible start to the tournament for South American nations, the United States winning Group B ahead of England, France imploding in Group A just to name a few.
But ultimately, Spain has to be recognized for winning it the right way. With superior technique, team play in midfield, and discipline, the Spaniards overcame every challenge from neighboring Portugal, the high-powered German attack, and a very aggressive and physical Dutch team in the final.
North American Rivals
The Winter Olympics wrapped up with a gold medal men’s hockey finale to be remembered for years to come.
It was almost a Miracle on Ice Part II, as Canada edged the United States 3–2 in overtime thanks to Canadian icon Sidney Crosby’s quick shot.
Canada's Sidney Crosby raises his arms after putting the puck past Ryan Miller in the U.S. goal. (Harry How/)
The United States has made significant progress to rise to the top of the hockey pyramid alongside Canada. And ratings for the gold medal game made significant progress too. The 2010 gold medal game broadcast on NBC was the second most watched hockey game, trumped only by the 1980 U.S. gold medal victory.
The United States had gone with a younger, faster team and gave Canada all it could handle. Goaltender Ryan Miller was sensational and could not be faulted for allowing the winning goal.
Canada’s Crosby probably assured himself a very special space in Canadiana forever.
Saints Win Super Bowl
New Orleans Saints quarterback and Super Bowl MVP Drew Brees called it “destiny.” After starting the season 13–0, the Saints were meant to meet the Indianapolis Colts in the Super Bowl.
Four years earlier, Hurricane Katrina had demolished New Orleans and Saints players talked about carrying the hopes of the people of New Orleans in their Super Bowl run.
Brees had a terrific game, not turning the ball over, and doing what he had done throughout the regular season.
Indianapolis quarterback Peyton Manning threw the game’s only interception, which was returned 74 yards for the touchdown by Tracy Porter. Porter, a Louisiana native, sealed the Saints 31–17 win with his great read of Manning.
The themes of winning the right way as Spain did, the establishment of a new rivalry in international hockey, and the feel-good story that was the Super Bowl make 2010 a year to not just think about big sporting events, but also what makes sports so riveting.

description.hltext_display: Plane with Paris Hilton emptied as knife found on board
description.content: Socialite Paris Hilton was one of the passengers on board a flight from Los Angeles to Hawaii's Maui island that had to be evacuated after a knife was found on board. Hilton said a passenger found a four-inch knife in a seat pocket and alerted a flight attendant. The attendant called security, and the plane was evacuated at the Los Angeles International Airport Tuesday, The New York Post reported Wednesday citing TMZ.com.Security swept the plane and eventually determined that the knife was a box-cutting blade that belonged to the plane's crew.Hilton, 29, had another knife-related close call in August, when a man armed with two large knives unsuccessfully tried to break into her Los Angeles home.Hilton said a passenger found a four-inch knife in a seat pocket and alerted a flight attendant. The attendant called security, and the plane was evacuated at the Los Angeles International Airport Tuesday, The New York Post reported Wednesday citing TMZ.com.Security swept the plane and eventually determined that the knife was a box-cutting blade that belonged to the plane's crew.Hilton, 29, had another knife-related close call in August, when a man armed with two large knives unsuccessfully tried to break into her Los Angeles home.

description.hltext_display: India scraps onion tax as prices soar
description.content:
Indian traders check the quality of onions in Ahmedabad on December 21. The Indian …
The Indian government, facing mounting public anger over soaring onion costs, on Wednesday scrapped tax on imports of the vegetable to try to rein in prices of the ingredient.
The move comes after Premier Manmohan Singh expressed "deep concern" over the cost of onions doubling in a matter of days and called for steps to lower prices of what is normally one of the cheapest vegetables.
Onions are selling for 80 rupees a kilogramme (88 cents a pound) after a price surge from 35 to 40 rupees, and stories about the increase have become front-page news.
Indian authorities are mindful that onions can be a potent political issue, with voters in 1998 throwing out the Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) in Delhi state polls after a sharp surge in onion prices.
The so-called "onion factor" also helped defeat the left-leaning, now defunct Janata Party in 1980 parliamentary elections when prices went up quickly.
The government, which is battling to curb inflation, has already banned the export of onions but has warned prices will stay high for several weeks due to unseasonal rains in western India's onion-growing region.
Authorities also say traders hoarding onions are driving up prices and starting to make the vegetable unaffordable for India's poor, who use it as an essential ingredient to add taste to food.
Onions are being trucked in from neighbouring Pakistan, where they cost a fifth of the price, in a bid to meet domestic demand.
"The customs duty on onions has been brought down to zero," Finance Secretary Ashok Chawla told reporters in New Delhi.
The government has also asked state-run cooperative stores to sell onions at wholesale rates of 35 to 40 rupees a kilogramme to cool prices.
The spike in onion prices comes as overall food inflation runs at nearly 10 percent, causing huge hardship for India's impoverished millions.
The government has been feeling the heat over inflation as the opposition BJP has seized on the issue to galvanise its fortunes.

event_or_fact.property: The customs duty on onions has been brought down to zero

description.hltext_display: 推高CPI约0.07个百分点
description.content:
国家发展改革委发出通知，决定自今天零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油（全国平均）每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。这是年内第四次调整成品油价格，也是最后一次调价。经过年内两升一降一升调价后，国内成品油零售价创出历史新高。据匡算，这次成品油价格调整直接影响当月居民消费价格总水平（CPI）环比上升约0.07个百分点。
记者从中石化北京石油分公司和中石油北京公司了解到，调整后北京地区成品油零售价分别为：93#京标IV清洁汽油（以下同）零售价由每公升6.92元上调至7.17元，上调了0.25元；97#汽油由每公升7.37元上升至7.63元，上涨了0.26元；98#京标IV汽油由每公升7.92元上调至8.18元，上涨了0.26元；0#柴油从每公升6.88元上扬至7.14元，上调了0.26元；-10#柴油每公升从7.29元上涨至7.57元，上涨了0.28元。-20#柴油每公升从7.64元升至7.93元，上扬了0.29元。
发改委同时调整了航空煤油出厂价，以民航普遍使用的3号喷漆燃料航油为例，每吨出厂价由5690元上调至5990元，上涨了300元。发改委有关负责人表示，此次成品油调价后，为控制调价连锁反应，这次成品油调价后，城市公交、农村道路客运（含岛际和农村水路客运）、铁路客货运价格、民航燃油附加标准均不提高。
今年10月26日，发改委上调成品油出厂价后，国内各大航空公司纷纷上调国内航线燃油附加费征收标准，即800公里以上每位旅客每段航程由40元上调到70元，800公里（含）以下每位旅客每段航程由20元上调到40元，也即加价幅度从75%-100%不等。
记者了解到，为缓解调价对下游行业和困难群体的影响，油价调整后，国家将按照2006年出台的既定补贴政策，继续对种粮农民、渔业（含远洋渔业）、林业、城市公交、农村道路客运（含岛际和农村水路客运）给予补贴，对出租车行业给予临时补贴。此外，明年中央财政将进一步提高对种粮农民农资综合补贴水平。各地也将综合考虑成品油、液化气等价格调整和其他居民生活必需品价格上涨等因素，保障城乡低保对象等困难群体的基本生活保障。
■北京地区成品油零售价调整情况
■
型号；原价；现价；上涨；
93#汽油；6.92元；7.17元；0.25元；
97#汽油；7.37元；7.63元；0.26元；
98#汽油；7.92元；8.18元；0.26元；
0#柴油；6.88元；7.14元；0.26元；
-10#柴油；7.29元；7.57元；0.28元；
-20#柴油；7.64元；7.93元；0.29元；
此次油价上调将影响CPI上升0.07%
国家发改委表示，此次成品油价格仍然是根据现行价格机制进行调整的。
10月26日国内成品油价格调整以来，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬。特别是进入12月以后，受主要经济体经济回升以及寒冷天气带动取暖油需求增长等因素影响，国际市场油价大幅走高。12月20日，美国西德克萨斯原油（WTI）和英国北海布伦特原油期货价格分别涨至每桶88.81美元和92.74美元，达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。截止目前国际市场原油连续22个工作日移动平均价格已超过4%，按现行成品油价格机制，应适当上调国内成品油价格。
综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。
然而此时调价超出了大部分市场人士的预期。多数人士原本推测，发改委基于通货膨胀的压力，或会推迟到下月才考虑调价。
发改委有关负责人表示，预计今年我国石油对外依存度将接近55%，石油安全面临的形势更加严峻。国内成品油调价是抑制石油消费过快增长而做出的现实、必然的选择。
此次成品油价格调整是否会推升价格总水平？
发改委表示，成品油是重要的生产和生活资料，价格调整主要是会对社会预期产生一定影响，对价格总水平直接影响十分有限。据匡算，这次成品油价格调整直接影响当月居民消费价格总水平（CPI）环比上升约0.07个百分点。为减缓调价影响，发改委已经做了相应部署，在继续落实好国务院所确定的各项措施的同时，严格控制调价的连锁反应，并做好相关群体和行业的补贴工作。

description.hltext_display: Chicago is Collins' kind of town
description.author: BOB COONEY
description.content:
Count the players among the people who frequented the city's shopping area. "This was a player call [to go to Chicago]," coach Doug Collins said before the Sixers lost to the Bulls, 121-76 last night. "I'm along for the ride. It's a nice place to spend a couple of days. Sunday, we had a nice meal together as a team. [Monday], we had some practice and then time to get out and do some Christmas shopping and get some rest." Collins is very familiar with the Chicago area, having spent 3 years here as the Bulls' coach and then more as a resident in the city. It is a special place for him to come back to, much like Philadelphia. "This is a great place for me," Collins said. "I spent 10 years here with my wife and children. [Son] Chris and [daughter] Kelly spent their formative years here, went to high school here. I had a wonderful time here, loved coaching the Bulls. This city is such a great place. After those [championship] runs and during a 12- to 13-year window, they had some bad teams, but every night this place sold out. They have great, great fans here." During his time in Chicago, Collins won 137 games, including 50 in 1987-88. He sees himself as a little calmer now, but the same in many ways. "I saw [Bulls television announcer] Neil Funk and he said 'I saw you guys early and you had a couple tough losses. I saw you walking off the floor and how calm you were. I was just waiting for some chairs to start flying.' I said, 'I'm too old to do that kind of stuff now.' "I think the compassion and the competitiveness and all is the same. I don't think I'm any different there. I just think I channel it out a little bit better. I just think the guys feel as bad as I do [after a loss], so why go in and make it worse? Sometimes when you're venting, you're only venting to make yourself feel better. I've been much better at that, and I'm enjoying it a lot more. I look at myself and wish I had taken the time to enjoy it more when I was younger." Turner back home
Rookie Evan Turner was busy settling ticket issues in the locker room before the game for family and friends coming to see him play in his hometown. "It's been good. I was able to go home and kick with my mom and see a couple of friends and get some food from my favorite spots," Turner said before reeling off his many favorite food spots. "I missed a couple, but I'm coming back in a couple of days and I'll get to them." After tonight's game in Boston, the team has a few days off before getting back together for the western part of the road trip, which begins with a game Sunday in Denver.
Meeks still confident
Though he is mired in a bit of a shooting slump, having made only 14 of his last 51 shots (27.4 percent), including four of 25 from three-point range, Sixers starting guard Jodie Meeks has the mentality of most shooters - forget and move on. "It's not something I worry about, my shooting I don't really worry about," he said. "If I'm not making shots, I just do other things to help the team win. We've been winning, so it doesn't really matter to me how many points I score." Since being put into the starting lineup, Meeks has averaged 12.7 points a game, but reached double figures only once in his last six games. Still, no worries on his part. "Once the game is over, I try not to think about it, good or bad," he said. "If I have a great game, I don't think about it; if I have a bad game, I don't think about it. It doesn't do anything to change things, so I move on to the next game." * For more Sixers coverage, read the
Daily News' Sixers blog, Sixerville, at
http://go.philly.com/sixerville.
Follow him on Twitter at
http://twitter.com/BobCooney76.

This was a player call [to go toChicago]; I'm along for the ride. It's a nice place to spend a couple of days. Sunday, we had a nice meal together as a team. [Monday], we had some practice and then time to get out and do some Christmas shopping and get so

description.hltext_display: Langnau biegt auf die Zielgerade ein
description.author: Dieter Stamm
description.content:
Nach anfänglicher Mühe steigern sich die SCL Tigers mitsamt ihrem Goalie und besiegen Biel mit 4:2. Das Playoff-Tor ist weit offen. Es gibt auch in einer langen Qualifikationsphase die eine oder andere Partie, die von Bedeutung ist. Biel gegen Langnau war gestern eine solche – oder wie es Tigers-Assistenztrainer Alex Reinhard aus Übersee ausrichten liess, wo er mit dem Nachwuchs die U-20-WM bestreitet: «Wenn wir dieses Spiel gewinnen, haben wir einen wichtigen Schritt getan.»
Tatsächlich ist die Sache nun wohl entschieden. 20 Punkte Vorsprung auf den Strich bei 15 ausstehenden Spielen: Eine solch dicke Butterschicht werden sich nicht einmal die SCL Tigers vom Brot nehmen lassen, und wenn sie noch so viel Erfahrung im Verspielen eines Vorsprungs haben.
Dabei begann das Spiel alles andere als vielversprechend für die Emmentaler. Nachdem sie ein kleines Geheimnis daraus gemacht hatten, wer den jungen Benjamin Conz vertreten würde, der mit Reinhard in den USA weilt, stand schliesslich B-Lizenz-Torwart Urban Leimbacher aus Olten zwischen den Pfosten. Der ehemalige NHL-Goalie Tyler Moss, der beim KHL-Klub Amur Chabarowsk unter Vertrag steht, hatte die lange Reise aus dem fernen Sibirien vorerst umsonst gemacht. Trainer John Fust wollte keinen seiner ausländischen Feldspieler für einen Söldner-Goalie «opfern».
Biel verpasst Vorentscheidung
Entsprechend kam Leimbacher unter Beschuss. Von der ersten Minute an feuerten die Bieler aus allen Rohren, und anfänglich vermochte der tapfere Oltner nicht zu verbergen, dass es eine Klasse tiefer ein bisschen weniger schnell zur Sache geht. Er liess nach drei Minuten einen ersten Gegentreffer zu, einen nicht sonderlich scharfen Schuss von Brendan Bell. Er liess im gleichen Drittel die Bieler Miéville und Zigerli so lange am herrenlosen Puck herumstochern, bis dieser drin war. Und dazwischen gab es den einen oder anderen Abpraller, der die Vorentscheidung hätten bedeuten können, wären die Bieler kaltblütiger gewesen. Man musste aus Langnauer Sicht mit dem Schlimmsten rechnen.
Leimbachers Steigerung
Doch dann demonstrierte Kevin Schläpfers Team, weshalb es das schlechteste im Dezember ist: Es baute unerklärlich ab und den Gegner auf, inklusive des Goalies. Gegen Schluss der Partie avancierte Leimbacher mit tollen Paraden gar zum Matchwinner, und danach wurde er verdient zum Mann des Spiels gewählt.
Während man im Hockey-Emmental also fröhliche Weihnachten feiern darf, muss Schläpfer konstatieren, dass seine Leistungsträger nicht in Form sind, dass nun auch noch Steinegger verletzt ist (Rücken), dass Bordeleau nach der langen Pause weiterhin keinen Einfluss auf das Geschehen hat und dass keiner da ist, der die Lücke füllen kann, wenn Spylo, Fata und Lötscher nicht treffen. Aber man hat ja nun 15 Partien Zeit, um diese Probleme zu lösen. Danach beginnen für Biel die Playouts. (Der Bund)

description.hltext_display: Първанов: Има криза в управлението
description.content: Правителството създава скандали, за да прикрие проблемите в управлението. Това заяви президентът Георги Първанов в предаването "Денят започва" на БНТ. Според него конфликти има в здравеопазването, образованието, безработицата. Той е категоричен, че имаме продължаваща криза, която се изразява и в крива на управлението. Държавният глава смята, че България има слаб премиер, който не може да преодолява проблемите в страната. "На България й трябва не шериф, а стопанин, знаещ и кадърен човек, който да управлява страната", изтъкна президентът. Първанов за пореден път заяви, че никога не е имал амбиции към премиерския пост, още по-малко след 20 години в политиката би се замислил за това. Трябва да се преодолее комплексът да се прилепваме към някой голям брат. Стремежът ми е бил да се постигне добър баланс между България и САЩ, между България и � усия в рамките на членството ни в Европейския съюз, заяви още Първанов. В същото време той изрази съмнения, че правителството и премиерът Бойко Борисов ще придвижат големите енергийни проекти. "Премиерът прегърна идеята за „Белене”, проведоха се разговори, но мисля, че полезното време за „Белене” изтича. Ако правителството реши, че централата няма да се строи, аз съм готов да инициирам референдум, защото е важен въпрос, по който хората трябва да се произнесат. Би било добре да съчетаем референдума и изборите”, допълни президентът.Държавният глава коментира и действията на министерството на вътрешните работи. Според него има показност, но големите босове на организираната престъпност не са в полезрението на вътрешния министър Цветан Цветанов. "Аз не знам дори истинските имена на част от хората от престъпността, те се подвизават в медиите с партизанските си имена. Но имам чувството, че има двоен стандарт при борбата с престъпността. Вярно ли е, че за последната 1 година контрабандата се е увеличила с 50%, не е ли това причина за вчерашното писмо на Франция и Германия? Очевидно е, че двете страни са на път да отложат членството ни в Шенген", попита Първанов. По отношение на бъдещето на движението "Алтернатива за българско възраждане" (АБВ), Първанов обясни, че не той е човекът, който ще посочи какво да е развитието. Той обаче беше категоричен, че АБВ няма да се превърне в партия, защото няма намерение да се занимава с партия, а и някои от хората в движението са преминали през такива. Все пак президентът уточни, че участниците в АБВ ще решат дали да има коалиция между АБВ и други партии.

description.hltext_display: Japan forecasts GDP growth to slow in 2011
description.content:
Consumers check items at a store in the Harajuku shopping district in Tokyo. The …
Chart showing Japan's trade surplus, which stood at 162.8 billion yen in November, …
Related Blogs
The pace of Japan's economic growth will halve in fiscal 2011 from this year as a stimulus-driven shopping rush eases and exports fall on a strong yen and softer demand, the government said Wednesday.
In its outlook report, the Cabinet Office also said consumer prices will stop falling but will not rise, dealing a blow to Prime Minister Naoto Kan's stated goal of ending deflation in the year.
Recent year-on-year falls in the consumer price index will halt in the middle of next year, the Cabinet Office said, but suggested this would not represent the defeat of chronic deflation in the economy.
Growth is forecast to slow to a real 1.5 percent from 3.1 percent in this year, the government said in its outlook report.
Government stimulus measures helped boost domestic production and consumption in the current year, including subsidy programmes for purchases of environmentally friendly vehicles and appliances.
Japan's economy grew 4.5 percent in the July-September quarter, amplified by a rush by car buyers to use expiring subsidies and smokers who stocked up on cigarettes ahead of a tax hike during the period.
The hottest summer on record also drove sales of items such as air conditioners, helping spur growth in the quarter. Private consumption accounts for around 60 percent of gross domestic product.
However, analysts warn of a contraction in the fourth calendar quarter as the removal of such one-off factors highlights Japan's exposure to a weakening export picture and slow domestic demand.
Recent data has shown a slump in industrial output, especially among carmakers, as well as weakening consumer confidence as such incentive programmes come to an end.
The economy remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading of a 9.1 percent increase fell short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
"The pick-up in the year-on-year growth rate of exports in November may look encouraging but exports are heading for a big quarterly fall," noted research consultancy Capital Economics.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
The central bank in October forecast that the country's economy would expand 2.1 percent in the fiscal year ending in April, and 1.8 percent in 2011.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, at nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
Consumer spending growth is expected to slow next year to 0.6 percent from 1.5 percent this year.
However, the government forecast unemployment to continue to slowly improve, with the jobless rate expected to fall in the fiscal year starting April to 4.7 percent from 5.0 percent currently.

description.hltext_display: 北京93号汽油涨至7.17元
description.content:
国家发改委昨日宣布，今日零时起上调汽柴油零售价，其中汽油上调310元/吨，柴油上调300元/吨。根据北京市发改委和中石化发布的数据，上调后，北京市场93号汽油零售价为7.17元/升，97号汽油为7.63元/升，每升分别上调了0.25元和0.26元。据了解，这也是93号汽油零售价首次“破7”。而为了控制调价连锁反应，国家发改委强调，城市公交、农村道路客运、铁路客货运以及民航燃油附加标准此次均不提高。
■影响CPI约0.07个百分点
据了解，这是今年第四次调整成品油零售价，也将是年内的最后一次调价。上次调价发生在10月26日，当时汽油零售价上调230元/吨，柴油零售价上调220元/吨。此次调价幅度较上次有所增加。
国家发改委表示，上次调价之后，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬，特别是进入12月份以后，受主要经济体经济回升以及寒冷天气带动取暖油需求增长等因素的影响，国际市场油价大幅走高，到12月20日，多地油价达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。
“据匡算，这次成品油价格调整直接影响当月居民消费价格总水平（CPI）环比上升约0.07个百分点。”发改委称，综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，已经适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。而一些分析人士表示，相较于目前4%左右的CPI，这一百分比几乎可以忽略不计。
■“调价经过慎重考虑”
实际上，息旺能源监测数据显示，截止到12月20日，三地原油连续移动加权均价较上次调价期涨幅高达9.16%，而早在11月底，4%的调价窗口就已打开。
“此时调价超出了市场人士的普遍预期，上个月底调价窗口就已打开，不过发改委并未做出调整，市场普遍预期，基于通货膨胀的压力，发改委会推迟到下个月才考虑调价。”一些分析人士认为，突发调价可能是为了彰显国家有关部门推进节能减排以及资源产品价格改革的决心。
发改委也强调，调价“是经过慎重考虑的”，目的是坚持资源性产品价格形成机制改革的方向，调动企业生产和进口积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。
发改委相关负责人则表示，今年我国石油对外依存度可能达到55%，坚持发挥价格杠杆的调节和引导作用，抑制石油消费过快增长。
■公交、铁路、民航燃油附加均不提价
为了控制调价连锁反应，发改委强调，这次成品油调价后，城市公交、农村道路客运（含岛际和农村水路客运）、铁路客货运价格、民航燃油附加标准均不提高，而对于成品油价格对出租车行业的影响，将综合采取增加补贴、适当调整出租车运价或收取燃油附加的方式疏导。
发改委相关负责人表示，为了从严控制公路客运价格调整，各地可以按照油运价格联动机制要求，在企业消化一部分成品油调价影响的基础上，适当疏导成本增支因素。
此外，调价后，国家将按照既定的补贴政策，继续对种粮农民、渔业含远洋渔业、林业、城市公交、农村道路客运含岛际和农村水路客运给予补贴。
晨报记者 周治宏
■相关新闻
汽油消费上月增长4.6%
晨报讯（记者 邢飞）国家发改委网站昨天公布的今年11月石油行业运行情况显示，11月份成品油表观消费量2007万吨，同比增长15.2%，其中汽油538万吨，增长4.6%；柴油1316万吨，增长21.4%，日均消费创历史最高水平。
此外，11月份成品油供应也在大幅增加，统计显示，11月份原油加工量3338万吨，同比增长11%，成品油产量2073万吨，增长10.3%。
发改委表示，11月份以来，全国成品油消费继续保持高水平，通过协调有关方面采取综合措施，增加资源供应，部分地区出现的柴油供应紧张状况逐步得到缓解，成品油库存趋稳回升。

description.hltext_display: Lohan accused of attacking rehab staffer

description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: Модернизация
description.content:
С лансирането на обновения всъдеход “Антара” “Опел” подсили още по-сериозно моделното си портфолио. Освежената версия на всъдехода е отлично решение до момента на цялостната му трансформация и представянето на неговото ново поколение. При версията 2011 година на “Антара” от “Опел” са съсредоточили усилията си не толкова върху дизайна, колкото върху оптимизирането на наличната техника и лансирането на нови инженерни предложения. Сериозни промени и подобрения се наблюдават също така и в интериора на автомобила, където откриваме по-ергономични форми и по-приятни за окото и ръката материали. Сериозно обновление и обогатяване е настъпило и в стандартното и допълнителното оборудване на всъдехода.
Обновеният “Опел Антара” идва с напълно ревизирана гама задвижващи агрегати. Всеки един от двигателите отговаря на строгите изисквания на Евро 5 стандарта, като в същото време предлага по-добра горивна икономичност и съответно ниво на отделяните в атмосферата вредни емисии. Важна новост при модела е и настъпилата оптимизация при двете налични предавателни кутии - шестстепенна механична и автоматична.
Основният акцент при тях попада върху подобряването на баланса между икономията на гориво и динамичното представяне на пътя. Всеки един от представителите на новата “Антара” пък ще разполага с електронна ръчна спирачка и система за подпомагане на потеглянето по наклон.
Основните промени в дизайна на версията 2011 година на “Опел Антара” са свързани с оформлението на предната част на всъдехода. Тук се наблюдават нови предна решетка, нови фарове за мъгла с хромирани рамки и други. Козметични промени са нанесени и в задната част на всъдехода, където са променени светлинните блокове. Освежаване е настъпило и във вътрешността на модела, където откриваме нова централна конзола с допълнително оформено отделение за малки вещи, нови материали и цветове и по-лесни за разчитане контролни уреди.
Новост в портфолиото на “Опел Антара” е 2,2-литровият турбодизелов задвижващ агрегат. Той ще се предлага в 2 мощностни версии - 163 и 184 конски сили, като при избор на първия моторът ще може да бъде комбиниран със система за задвижване на две или на четирите колела, като ще бъде съчетан с механична или автоматична шестстепенна трансмисия. Версията на “Антара” със 184 конски сили се предлага само във вариант с четири задвижващи колела. С избор между система за задвижване на две или на четирите колела се предлага модификацията с обновения 2,4-литров, четирицилиндров мотор и неговите 170 конски сили.

description.hltext_display: UConn win not loss for UCLA
description.author: Bill Plascke
description.content:
It was yet another empowering landmark reached by an amazing group of athletes, yet it felt hollow and forced.
Because, once again, a triumph by women was measured against something achieved by men.
Everyone is chortling about the University of Connecticut women’s basketball team breaking the UCLA men’s record 88-game winning streak Tuesday, except, well, they didn’t. Different game. Different league. Different records.
Everyone is yakking about how Connecticut Coach Gino Auriemma is the new John Wooden except, well, he’s not. Different game. Different league. Different coaches.
After his Huskies shredded Florida State, 93-62, Auriemma said the right thing in referring to the Bruins’ 1971-74 streak, telling an interviewer, “I’m not John Wooden, and this isn’t UCLA. This is Connecticut, and for us, this is good enough.”
But earlier, his team and its fans didn’t act like it.
It was less of a game than a celebration.
At the final buzzer, the ESPN announcer summed up the atmosphere by claiming, “UConn has one-upped UCLA!”
It has not. It cannot. Why would it even want to?
“By saying those sort of things, people not only take credit away from UCLA, but they take credit away from Connecticut,” said Nan Muehlhausen, John Wooden’s daughter, in a phone interview. “If Daddy was alive, he would be very happy for them, he loved women’s basketball. But why can’t they celebrate for what they are?”
A more enduring question, perhaps, is why do we keep doing this to women’s sports? Why do we keep judging their achievements by those of their male counterparts? Why can’t we just celebrate great female athletes for being, you know, great female athletes?
It’s a waste of precious time, attention and the ideals of gender equity. It’s not equal if you act as if the men’s game is so much more important, you celebrate breaking a men’s record as if you just won a championship.
It’s sort of like the excitement over a woman dunking. Why? Who cares if a woman can dunk? That is not why fans love women’s basketball. That’s not what the sport is about.
The female Huskies indeed broke an incredible record Tuesday night — they broke their own record of 88 consecutive wins. Auriemma is indeed a great coach who should be compared to other great coaches — such as Tennessee’s Pat Summitt and Stanford’s Tara VanDerveer.
This should have been yet another night to embrace the fundamental beauty of the women’s game and the incredible consistency of Connecticut in owning it. Instead, TV viewers were treated to cutaway shots of Bill Walton’s hooks and Jamaal Wilkes’ jumpers. It felt like watching a baseball team attempting to break a record set by football players.
Different isn’t always worse. Sometimes different is just different. Can’t Connecticut win without UCLA losing?
The Huskies have the best college women’s basketball program in history, and shame on all of us if they need to play against the specter of a men’s team to prove it.

event_or_fact.property: the right thing in referring to the Bruins? 1971-74 streak, telling an interviewer, ?I?m not John Wooden, and this isn?t UCLA
?By saying those sort of things, people not only take credit away from UCLA, but they take credit away from Connecticut,?

description.hltext_display: Fujitsu Upgrades Production Management System for Daifuku in China
description.content:
Enhances factory production system in anticipation of increased demand for material handling systems
Tokyo, December 21, 2010 — Fujitsu today announced that, in collaboration with Daifuku Co., Ltd., which is globally expanding its material handling system, it has upgraded the production management system at Daifuku (China) Manufacturing Co., Ltd., the company's Shanghai-based Chinese production center. Responding to increased demand for material handling systems in China, the new system started operations in November 2010.
The new system will enable Daifuku to accelerate initiatives for improving its productivity through the standardization of production processes, as well as shortening turnaround times, reducing costs, and flexibly responding to changes in product requirements. At the same time, by connecting the company's production management system with other systems, including its accounting, sales management, and inventory management systems, the upgraded system will strengthen Daifuku's revenue management and the management of the progress of projects.
Daifuku is a global corporation with business outside of Japan accounting for more than half of its sales. The company offers a comprehensive line of services, from the development of material handling systems for building internal material handling systems involved in production and distribution, to the sales, manufacturing, and support of these systems. Daifuku has positioned China as the largest and most important market for its business outside of Japan. In response to increased demand for its material handling systems, Daifuku has been strengthening its business under a new organizational structure with Daifuku (China) Co., Ltd., a new company it established in April 2010, at its core. Daifuku had revised the production processes at Daifuku (China) Manufacturing Co., Ltd., and had been considering upgrading its system platform in order to speed up the standardization of and productivity improvements for these processes.
In January 2010, Daifuku migrated the accounting, sales management, and inventory management systems at Daifuku (China) Co., Ltd. to an SAP platform. Through the latest upgrade of the production management system at Daifuku (China) Manufacturing Co., Ltd, to an SAP platform, the company aims to enhance its system governance. This will allow Daifuku to standardize the different production processes for each of its products, bring visibility to its production operations, and further improve productivity. At the same time, by managing the progress of individual projects and revenue in real-time, Daifuku will strengthen its project management framework for adhering to deadlines and budget constraints.
The new system will allow Daifuku (China) Manufacturing Co., Ltd. to thoroughly manage inventory, projects, and delivery dates, while at the same time being able to deliver higher-quality products with a strong commitment to quality, cost, and delivery through the visualization of Daifuku's work processes.
With sales and production centers in 20 countries around the world, Daifuku is building a globally-optimized production and supply chain. Through seamless collaboration among its local subsidiaries around the world, the company is implementing a global production framework that fulfills all requirements in terms of quality, cost, delivery, and the environment. In the future, Daifuku will continue to optimize the production systems of its subsidiaries in each country and work to further improve productivity.
On August 1, 2010, Fujitsu established a new business unit to provide strong and seamless support between Japan-based companies and their local subsidiaries in Asia in the manufacturing, retailing, and distribution industries, for Japanese customers who are launching or expanding business in Asia. The new Asia business unit will provide solutions as well as infrastructure services. For Daifuku's new system, the new business unit and Fujitsu (China) Holdings Co., Ltd.—which has SAP expertise as well as system development experience in China—in collaboration with Daifuku (China) Manufacturing Co., Ltd and Daifuku corporate headquarters, were able to quickly develop a system that complies with Chinese business practices and regulations, and for which governance can be handled by Daifuku's headquarters in Japan.
Fujitsu will continue to support Daifuku in expanding its business in China, while at the same time, as a business partner, proposing ideas from a global perspective that generate added value for Daifuku's business.
About Fujitsu
Fujitsu is a leading provider of ICT-based business solutions for the global marketplace. With approximately 170,000 employees supporting customers in 70 countries, Fujitsu combines a worldwide corps of systems and services experts with highly reliable computing and communications products and advanced microelectronics to deliver added value to customers. Headquartered in Tokyo, Fujitsu Limited (TSE:6702) reported consolidated revenues of 4.6 trillion yen (US$50 billion) for the fiscal year ended March 31, 2010. For more information, please see: www.fujitsu.com.
Press Contacts
Fujitsu Limited
Public and Investor Relations Division
Customer Contacts
Fujitsu (China) Holdings Co., Ltd.
Planning Department
Tel: +86-21-5887-1000
All other company or product names mentioned herein are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. Information provided in this press release is accurate at time of publication and is subject to change without advance notice.

description.hltext_display: Vovse redder familie fra døden
description.content:
I dag kan de takke deres hund for, at de stadig er i live. Det skriver Ekstra Bladet.
Det lykkedes nemlig hunden at vække den sovende familie, så de kunne komme ud af flammehavet. Familien nåede også at få reddet gårdens andre dyr. Det eneste der ikke blev reddet var huset. For selv om brandvæsnet hurtigt var på på stedet. Kunne gården ikke reddes. Fire ud af tre af gårdens længder brændte helt ned.
Hvad der ligger til grund for branden vides endnu ikke.
Kilde: eb.dk

description.hltext_display: Japan exports grow 9.1 per cent in November
description.content:
TOKYO - Japan's export growth improved for the first time in nine months in November, a possible sign that global demand is turning up again.
Exports from the world's third-largest economy rose 9.1 per cent from a year earlier, the government said Wednesday.
While exports have expanded throughout the year, the rate of growth has steadily fallen as overseas demand cooled and the yen rose to 15-year highs. In February, exports jumped more than 45 per cent. By October, that had slid to less than 8 per cent.
The slowdown triggered widespread concern about the fate of Japan's recovery, which has depended heavily on exports.
The central bank on Tuesday kept interest rates on hold at virtually zero and maintained its cautious assessment of the economy. The recovery "seems to be pausing" and exports are flat, it said.
On Wednesday, the Cabinet Office went a step further in its monthly economic report. It cut its view on exports, describing them as "decreasing moderately."
Companies are worried too, as Europe's ongoing debt problems and possible monetary tightening in China add to the uncertainty. A key central bank survey last week showed that business sentiment fell for the first time in seven quarters.
Some economists predict that Japan's gross domestic product contracted this quarter.
But the latest figures offer a hint of hope for Japan. Goldman Sachs economist Chiwoong Lee is optimistic about 2011 and expects the country's exports to keep improving.
"With assistance from an easier yen, exports should sustain growth on the strength of the U.S. economy," Lee said in a note to clients.
Exports to China, Japan's biggest trading partner, rose 18.3 per cent in November from a year earlier, the finance ministry said. Shipments to the European Union climbed 10.1 per cent, while those to the U.S. rose a lacklustre 1.2 per cent.
Robust demand for general machinery, particularly from China, offset declines in electrical machinery such as semiconductors and audiovisual devices.
Imports rose 14.2 per cent, shrinking Japan's trade surplus for the month by 55 per cent to 162.8 billion yen ($1.9 billion).
Injecting life into Japan's economy is the government's top priority as it faces falling approval ratings.
Last month, it passed a new $61 billion stimulus package with support for small businesses and regional economies. Then last week, Prime Minister Naoto Kan announced plans to cut the country's corporate tax rate by 5 percentage points in a bid to help Japanese businesses stay competitive.
The government on Friday is expected to release a draft budget for the next fiscal year starting April.
If Japan's economy doesn't improve, the government may press the central bank for more help. With huge public debt, Japan has limited room for new stimulus spending.
"The government expects that the Bank of Japan will support the economy by appropriate and flexible monetary policy management while working closely with the government," the Cabinet Office said.

event_or_fact.property: plans to cut the country's corporate tax rate by 5 percentage points in a bid to help Japanese businesses stay competitive
With assistance from an easier yen, exports should sustain growth on the strength of the U.S. economy

entity.property: appropriate and flexible monetary policy management

description.hltext_display: Jarnvig: Mere vild kulde og snestorm på vej
description.content:
De sydlige og østlige egne bliver hårdest ramt
Det er den koldeste morgen i 100 år og jeg lever.
Sådan kunne en letomskrivning af Gnags-hittet 'Det er den dejligste morgen' sagtens lyde her til morgen.
Men selv om temperaturen har ramt under minus 25 grader i Holbæk, så er det trods alt kun den koldeste morgen i december i 29 år.
Og det kan blive endnu koldere senere i juledagene, frygter TV 2 Vejrets Mikael Jarnvig.
"Det kan godt blive endnu koldere. Det er ikke umuligt. Det bliver nok ikke lige her de første par dage, fordi der kommer flere skyer og mere vind. Men når vi kommer til søndag-mandag begynder vinden at tage af igen. Og så har vi samme situation; altså sne på jorden, iskold luft og aftagende vind. Så der kan vi sagtens komme ned omkring de 20 frostgrader lokalt," siger han til Newspaq.
Samtidig er der udsigt til, at juletrafikken får nøjagtig så svære vilkår, som udsigterne har varslet de seneste dage. Et kraftigt snevejr er nemlig på vej ind over særligt de sydlige egne.
De hvide fnug vil dog ikke få lov at falde stille og fredeligt. Den tiltagende vind giver således udbredt fare for fygning.
Derfor opfordrer myndighederne til, at man tager hjemmefra i ekstra god tid. Ligesom bilister skal udvise ekstra agtpågivenhed, hvis de bevæger sig ud på de spejlglatte veje.
En særlig advarsel går på den såkaldte sort is. Den kan forekomme på veje, hvor isen er gennemsigtig. Det betyder, at bilister har svært ved at orientere sig i de svære forhold.

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: 玩家谈星际2的几大软肋：暴雪急功近利
description.content:
和这里所有90前就开始玩电脑的诸君一样，星际争霸的续作尽管延期了但是我仍然很高兴。我的老天啊！花了12年制作出来的东西，等待期里仍然是各种舅舅和跳票。
尽管现在星际争霸2的赛事生机勃勃，但我很担心缺乏吸引更多群体的元素导致星际2有些掉价，难以承受星际争霸这个名门的身价。看起来，现在的玻璃渣已经越来越急功近利，不像让这个游戏长期并稳定发展。
没有局域网
可以说是旧话重提，但事实就是，这是一宗原罪！跳出职业电子竞技圈，这是星际争霸最大也是最成功的根基所在。在韩国几乎所有的网吧里，90%的人们在玩母巢之战而不是星际争霸2。(我明白玻璃渣想让这个游戏全球化，我们稍后再说这个)假设韩国拥有全球最好的网络环境，即便网络延迟无需担心的情况下，仍然有人愿意几个朋友聚在网吧里一起玩游戏。他们可能在自己的电脑里有星际2(价格是另外一个问题，不过能用钱解决的问题都不算问题，而且星际2在韩国的销量其实并不怎么惊人)，但这也是为什么没人愿意玩星际2而是去玩母巢之战。
快餐化
尽管根据战网的统计，在亚洲只有15%的玩家是新手。这表示着星际2基本吸引的都是老玩家，比如80后和早期90后的人们，而再往后的玩家不是年龄不够就是不会品位游戏。而且，这意味着他们都是星际争霸或者玻璃渣的死忠，无论做的多烂都会买星际2的那批人。玻璃渣需要他们，是的，但是他们也需要更多新鲜的血液加入才好让他们的腰包爆掉。
小型比赛
母巢之战时代，任何技术够强力的人都能称霸一方的赛事。很多地区性的赛事也有很多的霸主级角色。想想当年的那些战队联赛，社团友谊赛，iCCup巡回赛和那些挑战赛。因为足够的保密性和匿名性，很多低调的高手总是默默的诞生。现在看看星际2，大赛中优胜的选手出现在某个奖金50/100/500美刀的地区的小比赛名单里的时候，你就知道他们又来圈钱了。
GSL
是的，GSL。想想看：玻璃渣和GSL的赞助商之所以砸钱是为了拓展市场，为了星际2和他们的产品。但如果你看看观众群们，他们的目标是谁？韩国民众不在乎赞助商是谁，他们之所以追那些比赛是因为他们追的是那款游戏！他们不在乎赞助商卖的是国际名牌还是山寨货。欧洲也一样。

description.hltext_display: 发改委释疑：为何高物价下仍调油价
description.content:
近日，国家发展改革委发出通知，决定自12月22日零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油（全国平均）每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。就此，记者采访了国家发展改革委有关负责同志。
问：这次成品油价格调整的背景是什么？
答：这次成品油价格仍然是根据现行价格机制进行调整的。10月26日国内成品油价格调整以来，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬。特别是进入12月以后，受主要经济体经济回升以及寒冷天气带动取暖油需求增长等因素影响，国际市场油价大幅走高。12月20日，美国西德克萨斯原油（WTI）和英国北海布伦特原油期货价格分别涨至每桶88.81美元和92.74美元，达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。截止目前国际市场原油连续22个工作日移动平均价格已超过4%，按现行成品油价格机制，应适当上调国内成品油价格。
但是，综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。
问：在当前国内价格总水平上涨压力较大的情况下，国家坚持按成品油价格机制理顺成品油价格主要基于什么考虑？
答：7月份以来，受国内外多种因素影响，国内价格总水平上涨较快。对此，党中央、国务院高度重视，要求各地区、各部门积极采取措施，稳定消费价格总水平，保障群众基本生活。在这种情况下，国家仍然坚持按现行价格机制提高国内成品油价格是经过慎重考虑的，是从国民经济全局和长远发展角度作出的选择，目的是坚持资源性产品价格形成机制改革的方向，调动企业生产和进口积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。

description.hltext_display: Cookie store owner disappears
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 10:00 PM EST
Video Gallery
2:05
Most Viewed Stories
RSS Feeds
Get news stories via RSS. More>>
Get sports stories via RSS. More>>
Add headlines to your RSS news reader More>>
Where is Chip Nutty? The proprietor behind "Chip Nutty Cookies and Coffee" real name is Charles Rivers. Rivers opened three locations in Charlotte and said he wanted to expand to as many as 11 stores in the coming years and maybe someday go national.
However, Rivers' business partners and employees say Chip Nutty vanished Wednesday. At first, his employees were worried. Now, they're worried he vanished on purpose.
They now worry that he took the dough, cashed in his chips, cleaned out the cookie jar, and left them with nothing but crumbs.
Charles Rivers, aka Chip Nutty, recently started taping red cards to the top of his bakery boxes which said "this season we can think of no better gift for your friends than our company's stock."
Well, Ralph Gonas can't think of a worse gift, or he now worries, a worse friend. But it wasn't always that way.
"He was a real friend to us. We got to know him in the barn yard flea market back a couple years ago. He was selling cookies one hot summer day," Gonas said.
Since then, Rivers convinced Gonas to invest $60,000 in the Chip Nutty franchise, he swore it would go national he even asked Gonas to pose for posters.
"We were going to be his mascot as time went on. We were supposed to be on several TV commercials talking about the quadruple crunch donut," Gonas said.
Chip Nutty developed a real fan base. Everything seemed to be going great. The business was doing a little bit better every week and Gonas dutifully checked in every day, where it appeared Rivers and his wife was working non-stop.
"They were working almost 16 to 17 hours a day if not more," Gonas said.
Gonas said the couple and their young son would often sleep in the back room of the bakery. Gonas assumed it was because they were exhausted.
"Back through the last several months, they had a makeshift bedroom set up," Gonas said.
But last week, Gonas showed up to find the place stripped bare by disgruntled employees who hadn't been paid and said Chip Nutty stopped showing up for work.
"It just seems like a total mystery. Did the guy get held up and forced out at gunpoint or did something else happen? Did he vanish on his own? We don't know," Gonas said.
The police have been called however Rivers and his family seem to be gone and, Gonas says, are all of Chip Nutty's recipes. That's the one fact that has him doubting his friend and asking him to please come back and explain what he's done.
Charlotte-Mecklenburg police have been alerted to the disappearance of Rivers AKA Chip Nutty, however have not commented on if they are investigating.

description.hltext_display: Kraus, Katzenberger und Co: So feiern die Promis Weihnachten
description.content: Endlich ist es wieder so weit: Weihnachten steht vor der Tür. description.hltext_display: Американска мечта
description.content:
Американците обичат пикапи! Многофункционални, а през последните години и достатъчно луксозни, те предлагат гъвкава комбинация, напълно приложима във всекидневието. Само през изминалия месец “Форд” отчете ръст в продажбите на легендарната си серия “F” в размер на 26 процента, а новите регистрации на модела достигнаха 473 461 единици за периода януари- ноември.
На салона в Детройт (10-23 януари) на щанда на друга легендарна американска компания - GMC, ще се състои световната премиера на нова концептуална разработка, която ще пренесе измерението на понятието пикап на ново ниво.
GMC Sierra All Terrain HD идва със специално променено и оптимизирано окачване, гарантиращо по-широка стъпка на пикапа. Това от своя страна е позволило на дизайнерите на компанията да поразвихрят въображението си и да оборудват автомобила със специално ново товарно корито с интегрирани в калниците допълнителни отделения за багаж. В резултат на нанесените конструкционни промени по окачването отстоянието на Sierra All Terrain HD от пътя е увеличено с почти 8 сантиметра и достига впечатляващите 53,6 сантиметра. Интересен акцент в екстериора на пикапа е и новата му осветителна система, която е изпълнена изцяло с LED диодна технология.
Концептуалната разработка GMC Sierra All Terrain HD идва със стилен интериор, в който са използвани естествена кожа, хромирани и алуминиеви апликации, карбонови орнаменти, контрастни червени шевове на тапицерията, мултимедийна и навигационна система и други системи и дизайн решения, които сме свикнали да свързваме предимно с оборудването на луксозните флагмани и лимузините.
Концепцията Sierra All Terrain HD идва с адекватен на дизайна си, потентен задвижващ агрегат. В частност това е нов 6,6-литров Duramax турбодизелов двигател, който е комбиниран с шестстепенна автоматична предавателна кутия и система за задвижване на четирите колела.
Въпреки че максималната мощност на мотора е достатъчно респектираща - 400 конски сили, истинският “боен” потенциал на пикапа е подсигурен от наистина внушителния максимален въртящ момент на агрегата - 1037 Нм.
