description.hltext_display: Our thoughts... Some Christmas cheer
description.content:
An Irish Christmas Blessing
The light of the Christmas star to you
The warmth of home and hearth to you
The cheer and good will of friends to you
The hope of a childlike heart to you
The joy of a thousand angels to you
The love of the Son and God’s peace to you
As we celebrate the 2,010 anniversary of the birth of Christ this Saturday, we reflect on the good and positive things we have to celebrate here in Newton County.
Recently Associated Press reported that Newton County is the 19th-most economically stressed county in the nation.
That might be true on paper, but it is far from the truth when it comes to the special spirit in those of us who call this home.
This very cold season we have seen acts of kindness including the sharing of food and toys and gifts for the little ones.
We have seen neighbors go out of their way to help their neighbors through these tough economic times.
We have seen elected officials of our city say no to passing on extra costs for electricity this year.
We still see people with a smile and extra giddiup in their step.
We have seen stepped-up efforts from our law enforcement people who protect us around the clock from those who do not share the same spirit.
We have seen our firefighters go out in freezing temperatures to ensure that our homes are safe.
As we drive around our community, we see the twinkling lights and special Christmas displays that warm hearts.
We have a good and caring people who live here in Newton County, who not only show that spirit during the Christmas season but all year long.
So we don’t worry when national news groups report that we are in somebody’s top 20 and should be rolling in self pity and demanding federal money to survive.
We know and experience the true spirit of our community. We see a people who might be a little down, but are ready, willing and able to charge ahead and enjoy the prosperity that will be awaiting us some time in the future.
In order for our staff to enjoy some special time with their families, we will be putting out a special weekend edition, which will be distributed late Christmas Eve night and be at your house Christmas Day.
We will not have a Friday or a Sunday paper.
We hope you enjoy our Christmas treat for you, and that you enjoy a very special Christmas this year.

entity.property: 010 anniversary of the birth of Christ

description.hltext_display: 2010: a year in technology
description.author: Jack Riley
description.content:
As you?d expect from the dizzying pace of technological progress this century, this year has seen yet more of our fantasies about the future become reality; some positive, like the release of the dazzlingly slick iPad and latest iPhone, and others less savoury, like revelations about state-sponsored hacking and arguments over the value of net neutrality.
This is only a brief rundown of all of the major releases and developments in what?s been an unarguably busy year for web geeks and gadget-lovers alike.
Google in China It?s not just the US who are keen to control the free flow of information on the internet, as this year?s disagreement between technology giant Google and the Chinese authorities has revealed. After making efforts to ensure Chinese internet users have access to unfiltered search results by redirecting Google.cn traffic to the search engine?s Hong Kong servers, Google faced the prospect of a blackout and propaganda war from the Chinese who accused the company of refusing to comply with state legislation.
With further evidence mounting that Chinese public bodies have been responsible for many high-profile US hacks this year, of state department computers as well as the systems of prominent internet companies, for the internet, another battlefield is opening up in the East.
The iPhone 4 (and antennagate)
When it comes to the case of the Apple engineer who lost a prototype handset of the highly secretive tech company?s iPhone 4 this year, sympathy doesn?t quite cover it. Handing a scoop to tech blog Gizmodo, who bought the lost gadget for $5000 from a go-between in April, the phone?s official release, in June, was no less impressive, thanks to features like the ultra-sharp ?retina display?, front-facing camera, and gyroscopic sensor. The handset?s new antenna did not get the same adulatory reaction though, and Apple CEO Steve Jobs was forced to concede the issue of the phone?s annoying knack of dropping calls, and offered customers a free bumper case to try to mitigate the problem.
Wikileaks
Since the internet first became available to the public, it?s disruptive potential has seen it wreak havoc on traditional modes of distribution, from music and film through to the media. With the release of hundreds of thousands of secret diplomatic cables though, Julian Assange?s organisation has brought that same chaos to the field of internatioal relations. With the ongoing war between sympathetic ?hacktivists? trying to ensure the information contained in the cables is available online and states keen to contain the damage caused by the release, some have gone so far as to describe the clash as a battle for the soul of the internet - a little dramatic, certainly, but not as far from the truth as many would be comfortable with.
iPad
It was January 27 that Apple chose to announce their biggest product release since the first iPhone. With speculation rife that the company was about to unveil a tablet computer, the launch of the 24cm by 19cm iPad confirmed many of the rumours, but with a slightly awkward keyboard and no camera, the first mass-market tablet device came in for some criticism on the basis that it?s more for consuming media than creating it.
Nevertheless, the near-flawless UI and ability to run iPhone-native apps as well as new programs designed exclusively for the iPad meant that it hit the ground running, selling 7.5 million units by the end of September.
Angry Birds
If the sight of a neon green pig wearing a helmet is enough to raise your heart-rate then chances are you?re one of the 50 million or so players of Angry Birds, the Android, iPhone and iPad game that?s become a byword for simple and addictive app design.
Even Prime Minister David Cameron has admitted to playing the single-finger porcine destruction simulator, and with a PC version out soon and console editions coming next year the reign of the Angry Birds is set to last into 2011.
Street View
Public discomfort with information collected for Google?s Street View has persisted since day one, but it hit a crisis point this year when it became public that the specially adapted cars used to take pictures of the UK?s roads were also collecting WiFi data, in some instances comprising unencrypted and personally-identifiable data. To their credit, Google complied with the UK Information Commissioners Office in destroying illegally-captured information in a timely fashion, but the public relations damage was done.
In a further twist to the service?s international rollout, German homeowners were given the opportunity to have images of their homes blurred in the mapping service before it went live in the country, with 250,000 households (or 3 per cent) of the areas affected opting out. Google?s Nexus phones 2010 was the year Google jumped into the mobile hardware market with the Nexus One, the company?s flagship Android phone manufactured by HTC, which drew a lukewarm reception thanks in part to an unusual US distribution model.
December has seen the announcement of the Nexus S followup, created in conjunction with Samsung, which boasts the ?Gingerbread? version of the Android operating system, front and back-facing cameras, near field communications capability and an unusual contour display, meaning the screen is curved to fit to a user?s face when making a call.
With the dominance of the iPhone 4 over the smartphone market shaken, the ball is now squarely back in Apple?s court. Kinect and PS3 Move
Having watched sales of Nintendo?s Wii run away with this generation?s console war, 2010 was the year Microsoft and Sony decided to get into the movement-aware gaming business. The totally hands-free Kinect was the Xbox 360 offering, with the prototype Project Natal eventually launching as an add-on dual-camera and sensor unit which was teased with an impressive test demonstration from Peter Molyneux.
PlayStation Move, the Sony equivalent, involves handheld controllers in conjunction with a camera. Both were released with impressive launch titles and have received a positive critical reception - but the winner of the motion wars remains to be seen. ? The Independent

event_or_fact.property: to playing the single-finger porcine destruction simulator, and with a PC version out soon and console editions coming next year the reign of the Angry Birds is set to last into 2011

entity.property: Nexus One, the company?s flagship Android phone

description.hltext_display: Small Space Decorating 101- Tips For Affordably Decorating Your Small Space In Style
description.content:
Books have been written about it, movie storylines have revolved around it, and Broadway plays have been based on it. It's the story of the millions of people who leave their homes in the suburbs to try to "make it" in the big city. This leap of faith can bring success, fame, or simply independence. Unfortunately, it often also brings small living spaces. It can be really difficult to be proud of a tiny apartment – you don't have much seating, you have limited space for your stuff, and it can feel very cramped if too many people come over to visit at once.
Don't let your small space cramp your style! Here are five decorating tips to turn your small space into a home that you can be proud of.
1. Make it cozy: Your space is already small, so why not also make it cozy? Use warm paint colors on an accent wall, drape your windows with fabric, and place blankets and throw pillows on your couch(es) to create that comfy, cozy feel that compels your guests to sit and stay awhile.
2. Reduce clutter: Clutter can make your space-challenged apartment feel chaotic and even smaller. To reduce clutter, use items that can serve both aesthetic and functional purposes. Larger furniture pieces will actually make your space look a little bigger and they often have lots of storage space. If you have a large bookshelf, you can stuff it to capacity and hide all of its contents by covering the bookshelf with a curtain…preferably one that matches your window treatments. Ottomans and chests that have space for storage can serve as seats or tables and also allow you to store items in a safe place. Store loose papers and other small items in stylish boxes that compliment your color scheme.
3. Create seating: Those ottomans with storage serve as great extra seating options for your guests. You can also make your own seats by buying foam cushions and covering them with fabric that matches your décor. These creative seats make sitting on your floor a little more comfortable and acceptable…and when they're not in use you can simply stack them and store them out of sight.
4. Cover up bare walls: Large paintings can make your space look larger but this can come with a hefty price tag. A more affordable option is to purchase wall decals, which come in a wide variety of sizes, shapes, colors, and themes. Wall decals can be used on virtually any surface that's clean and smooth and they are quick and easy to use with no artistic skill or tools required. They are especially great for renters since they are easily removable and don't do damage to your walls. You can find wall decals with modern patterns, decals that look like trees and flowers, decals of celebrities and musicians, decals that are sports-related, decals that are holiday themed, inspirational quote decals, dry erase and chalkboard decals to keep you organized, and even wall decal mirrors.
5. Pay attention to details: It's the little things that make your space special. Photos bring a personal touch to your place, while accent pillows, rugs, and lamps show off your style.Take this advice and you'll be proud to host intimate gatherings and parties in no time at all in your new, stylish space!

description.hltext_display: Twitter abschalten: 51 Ratschläge für mehr Produktivität
description.content:
Arbeit am Vorabend planen und Störquellen ausschalten: Celestine Chua gibt in ihrem Blog Tipps für mehr Produktivität. Wir zeigen, wie man einige davon umsetzt.
An der persönlichen Produktivität gibt es immer etwas zu verbessern, glaubt Celestine Chua. In Ihrem Blog "The Personal Excellence" gibt sie 51 Ratschläge, um die eigene Produktivität anzukurbeln.
Es kann durchaus motivierend wirken, Aufgaben als "erledigt" zu markieren.
Foto: Mindwalker - Fotolia.com
Ein erfolgreicher Tag beginnt für sie schon am Abend zuvor. Die Produktivitätsexpertin rät, vor dem Schlafengehen fünf Minuten lang über den nächsten Tag nachzudenken. Dabei sollte man an die bevorstehenden Aufgaben denken, ihnen eine Priorität zuordnen und sich schon einen ungefähren zeitlichen Ablauf überlegen. So könne man am kommenden Tag gleich loslegen.
Schwierige Aufgaben werden bei Chua erledigt, nicht geschoben. Legt man dann morgens los, sollte man sich zuerst den härtesten Brocken vornehmen. Ist er abgeschlossen, gibt das Aufwind für den restlichen Tag.
Zum produktiven Arbeiten gehört für Chua eine To Do-Liste. Sie verschafft einem Klarheit darüber, was alles bis wann erledigt sein muss und verhindert, dass man etwas vergisst.

description.hltext_display: Quantum Survey Confirms Importance of Comprehensive Disaster Recovery Strategy
description.content:
Quantum Corp. (NYSE: QTM), the leading global specialist in backup, recovery and archive, today released findings focused on disaster recovery from its 2010 IT Manager Survey. Every single respondent reported at least one data security incident in the past year, with the most cited being virus attacks (43 percent) and hardware corruption (40 percent). In addition, approximately one in five respondents had faced a natural disaster while similar percentages had to address issues resulting from lost or stolen devices and hacking.
Most survey respondents expressed concern about the risk posed by data security incidents. Eighty-seven percent said they feel their data is vulnerable in the event of such incidents, with nearly half reporting that their data is "somewhat" or "extremely" vulnerable (as opposed to "slightly" or "not at all" vulnerable).
At the same time, the survey confirmed that data security issues have a definite business impact. According to the results, it took respondents an average of 10.5 hours to resume normal operations after a data disaster, with more than 25 percent saying it took 11 hours or more, including 13 percent that reported delays of at least a day.
"As the survey results show, at some point an organization will be affected by a disaster that puts critical data at risk and impacts business operations; it's not a matter of if, just when," said Mike Dickstein, senior vice president, Marketing and Alliances, Quantum. "The good news is that disk-based deduplication has enabled cost-effective replication that -- combined with tape and the advantages of removable media -- provides a comprehensive disaster recovery strategy for addressing the full range of risks."
Survey Methodology and Demographics
Quantum contracted with Toluna, a research service, to conduct a field survey of 300 North American IT professionals on topics related to data storage. All of the respondents had direct exposure to data storage practices within their organization and were not limited to Quantum customers. Thirty-two percent of those surveyed were employed at organizations with more than 1,000 employees, 51 percent at organizations with 100-999 employees and 17 percent at organizations with fewer than 100 employees. Spending results were weighted based on U.S. Census Bureau data to arrive at results representative of U.S. businesses. Forty-nine percent of respondents considered themselves to be "average" buyers, 35 percent identified themselves as "leading-edge" buyers and 16 percent described themselves as "conservative." For more details on the results of the survey, visit: http://www.quantum.com/Solutions/datadeduplication/Index.aspx.
To learn about how one Quantum customer addressed its disaster recovery needs, visit: http://www.quantum.com/Solutions/DataRetention/Index.aspx.
About Quantum
Quantum Corp. (NYSE: QTM) is the leading global specialist in backup, recovery, and archive. From small businesses to multinational enterprises, more than 50,000 customers trust Quantum to solve their data protection, retention and management challenges. Quantum's best-of-breed, open systems solutions provide significant storage efficiencies and cost savings while minimizing risk and protecting prior investments. They include three market-leading, highly scalable platforms: DXi®-Series disk-based deduplication and replication systems for fast backup and restore, Scalar® tape automation products for disaster recovery and long-term data retention, and StorNext® data management software for high-performance file sharing and archiving. Quantum Corp., 1650 Technology Drive, Suite 800, San Jose, CA 95110, (408) 944-4000, www.quantum.com.
Quantum, the Quantum logo, DXi, Scalar and StorNext are registered trademarks of Quantum Corporation and its affiliates in the United States and/or other countries. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

description.hltext_display: South Korea to hold largest-ever live-fire drill
description.content:
South Korea is set to hold its largest-ever live-fire drill on Thursday. [AFP]
South Korea says it will hold its largest-ever live-fire drill near the military border with North Korea on Thursday.
The drill will involve artillery, fighter jets and the largest number of personnel in a peace-time exercise.
A South Korean army officer told Reuters news agency similar drills had been staged previously on more than 50 occasions, but the scale this time is unprecedented.
He said the shelling of Yeonpyeong island last month by North Korea was a factor in the drill's planning.
The drill will take place in Pocheon region, less than 50 kilometres north of downtown Seoul.
The South carried out live-fire drills on Yeonpyeong on Monday, which provoked only a verbal reaction from the North.
North Korea had vowed to strike back if the South went ahead with the drills, prompting fears of all-out war.
China, North Korea's only major ally, has continually urged dialogue to resolve the crisis and urged Pyongyang to follow through on its offer to allow UN inspectors into the country.
The Chinese foreign ministry had no immediate comment on the planned drill.
No talks
Meanwhile, the US has ruled out resuming talks with North Korea unless it shows it is serious about meeting its obligations on halting its nuclear activities.
The White House says Pyongyang must stop its "belligerent actions".
The comments follow an unofficial visit to North Korea by US politician Bill Richardson.
Mr Richardson says Pyongyang will re-open its facilities to UN nuclear inspectors.
But North Korea has yet to confirm any offer and there has been no comment from the UN's nuclear watchdog, the IAEA.
White House spokesman Robert Gibbs says the North is not "even remotely ready" for such talks.

event_or_fact.property: the North is not "even remotely ready" for such talks
Pyongyang will re-open its facilities to UN nuclear inspectors

description.hltext_display: Banjarsari Boyong 2 Emas
description.content:
Selain Gilang Angga Kusumah dan Jejen Zaenal Abidin, persoalan cedera masih dihadapi bek Persib, Isnan Ali. Mantan pemain Sriwijaya FC ini kembali mengalami cedera pada sesi latihan pagi di Lapangan Sepak Bola Brigif Cimahi, Selasa (21/12). Akibat otot paha kanannya tertarik, Isnan terpaksa menghentikan latihan untuk mendapatkan perawatan.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Persib U-21 Kedatangan Striker Jebolan SAD Indonesia
Selain Johan Yoga Utama yang proses perekrutannya tengah dijajaki dengan manajemen tim dan pelatih Persib senior, Persib U-21 juga berpeluang mendapatkan seorang striker jebolan SAD Indonesia yang sudah dua tahun berlatih di Uruguay. Pemain bernama Sahlan Sodiq itu sudah tampak berlatih dengan Rudi Geofani dan kawan-kawan pada sesi latihan sore di Stadion Persib, Jln. A. Yani Bandung, Selasa (21/12).
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Umuh, "Soal Johan Kita Bicarakan Dulu"
Manajer Persib Bandung, H. Umuh Muchtar mengisyaratkan kesepakatannya untuk menjajaki kemungkinan perekrutan Johan Yoga Utama melalui Persib U-21. Pasalnya, proses pendaftaran pemain di Liga Super Indonesia (LSI) U-21 masih akan dibuka hingga akhir Januari mendatang.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Disuntik Bonus 5.000 Ringgit
Awas, Malaysia Usung Balas Dendam!
Pemain Malaysia mengusung misi balas dendam saat menghadapi Indonesia dalam dua pertandingan final AFF Suzuki Cup 2010 di Stadion Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Minggu (26/12) dan Rabu (29/12) di Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Bepe Tidak Takut
Laga pertama final Piala AFF Suzuki antara Malaysia kontra Indonesia akan digelar di Bukit Jalil, Malaysia, Minggu (26/12) malam. Timnas kesebelasan Indonesia tidak mengkhawatirkan tekanan penonton di negeri jiran.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Polisi Diraja Jamin Keamanan Suporter
Penuh gengsi, tensi tinggi, dan atmosfer yang panas akan mewarnai pertandingan final AFF Cup 2010, antara Malaysia melawan Indonesia. Semua pihak berharap laga ini bisa berjalan sportif dan murni olahraga tanpa ada unsur politik kedua negara yang kerap bersinggungan.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
LOC Siapkan 5 Lokasi Penjualan Tiket
Panitia Piala AFF sudah merilis jadwal penjualan tiket laga kedua final di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno. Tiket akan dijual secara menyebar mulai tanggal 23-27 Desember 2010 di lima titik yang ditentukan.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Rahma Azhari dan McMenemy Berfoto Mesra
Timnas Filipina sudah tersingkir dari Piala AFF 2010, tapi "The Azkals" masih menyisakan sebuah kisah. Bukan kisah di lapangan melainkan kisah foto-fotonya dengan artis Indonesia Rahma Azhari.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Taekwondo Piala Wali Kota 2010 Unit Banjarsari Banzai berhasil memboyong dua medali emas pada Kejuaraan Taekwondo Wali Kota Cup 2010 di GOR Bandung, Selasa (21/12). Kedua medali tersebut diraih melalui Jati Attalah dan Arjun Fariz.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Tim Drumband SDN Cisitu Sabet Gelar di Malaysia
Di saat bangsa Indonesia tengah dilanda euforia pada timnas sepak bola, tim drumband junior Sankdatu Junior Corps SDN Cisitu Bandung meraih prestasi internasional di Malaysia. Tim drumband junior ini mampu meraih special award pada Kualalumpur Marching Band World Competition di Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 11-18 Desember lalu.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Dua Karateka Jabar Rebut 2 Perunggu
Dua karateka Jawa Barat, Dian Saputri dan Irfan Ramadani berhasil meraih perunggu pada Kejuaraan Dunia Karateka "Open Campiana Internazionale" di Napoli, Italia, 11-12 Desember lalu. Putri --sapaan akrab Dian Saputri-- dan Irfan merupakan dua karateka dari 6 karateka yang dikirim mewakili Indonesia di ajang tersebut.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Akan Dibuka Bupati Bandung
600 Guru Siap Bersaing di POR PGRI
BLK. FACTORY,(GM).-
Sekitar 600 peserta akan memeriahkan Pekan Olahraga (POR) PGRI XI se-Kab. Bandung yang dimulai tanggal 24-29 Desember mendatang di beberapa kecamatan, di antaranya Kec. Cicalengka, Nagreg, dan Cikancung. POR PGRI ini akan mempertandingkan 5 cabang olahraga yakni tenis meja putra/putri, bulu tangkis putra/putri, bola voli putr/putri, sepak bola putra, serta catur putra/putri. Para peserta yang ikut pada POR PGRI XI yang baru akan dibuka Minggu (26/12) ini merupakan guru yang tersebar di 31 kecamatan yang ada di Kab. Bandung.

description.hltext_display: 賃貸マンションの更新料払うべき？ - 更新料免除してもらいました
BWT investiert 75 Mio. Euro - 2011 Ergebnisrückgang erwartet
description.content:
Ihre Email *
Empfänger Email *
Geben Sie hier die E-Mail-Adresse des Empfängers ein (z.B. m.mustermann@wb.com). Mehrere Empfänger werden durch Komma getrennt. Der börsenotierte Wasseraufbereiter BWT investiert 2011/2012 rund 75 Mio. Euro in die Produkteinführung eines neuen Tischwasser- und Kaffeemaschinenfilter sowie in den Kapazitätsausbau. Das Konzernergebnis werde 2011 von heuer voraussichtlich 23 auf 18 Mio. Euro sinken. Für 2011 erwartet das Unternehmen einen Umsatz von 500 Mio. Euro gegenüber voraussichtlich rund 450 Mio. Euro 2010.
BWT verwendet für das neue Filtersystem eine patentierte"Magnesium Mg2+ Technologie", welche den Ionenaustausch bei Wasserfiltern verbessert und Natrium durch Magnesium ersetzt. Den Gastronomen und den Konsumenten werde ein "gänzlich neues Geschmackserlebnis geboten", so das Unternehmen.

description.hltext_display: 嵐、AKB48、福山雅治ら紅白全出場者の曲目が出そろう!!
description.content:
2010年12月22日 ザテレビジョン
初出場のAAA は「逢いたい理由」、西野カナ は「Best Friend」、植村花菜は 「トイレの神様」、クミコ は「INORI〜祈り〜」、HY は「時をこえ」を歌う
NHK総合で放送の「第61回 NHK紅白歌合戦」の出場者が歌う曲目が、12月21日放送の「もうすぐ紅白! 予習SP」（NHK総合）の紅白特別番組内で発表された。
出場歌手は全44組。その中で、紅組はAKB48、倖田來未、和田アキ子が、白組は嵐、NYC、加山雄三、郷ひろみ、SMAPの8組がメドレーで'10年を振り返る。
ほか、植村花菜は「トイレの神様」を、坂本冬美は「また君に恋してる」など'10年を象徴する選曲となり、EXILEは「2010世界バレー」（TBS系）のテーマ曲「I Wish For You」を、flumpoolは、多部未華子と三浦春馬が出演の映画「君に届け」の主題歌「君に届け」など、多方面でヒットした曲で紅白を彩る。
また、白組の福山雅治は、自身の年越しライブ「福山☆冬の大感謝祭 其の＋」の会場・パシフィコ横浜 展示ホールより中継を繋ぎ、曲を披露することが決定している。
さらに、同番組の放送開始時間（夜7:30）に登場し開会宣言を行う人物に、プロゴルファーの石川遼選手が抜てき。紅白の出演は初ながら、大役を担うこととなった。
【紅組】
aiko 「向かいあわせ」（9）、アンジェラ・アキ 「輝く人」（5）、いきものががり 「ありがとう」（3）、石川さゆり 「天城越え」（33）、植村花菜 「トイレの神様」（初）、AKB48 「紅白2010 AKB神曲SP」（3）、川中美幸 「二輪草」（23）、クミコ 「INORI〜祈り〜」（初）、倖田來未 「KODA KUMI 2010 Special Medley」（6）、伍代夏子 「ひとり酒」（17）、小林幸子 「母ちゃんのひとり言」（32）、坂本冬美 「また君に恋してる」（22）、天童よしみ 「人生みちづれ」（15）、DREAMS COME TRUE 「生きてゆくのですfeat.ザ紅白スペシャルブラスバンド」（14）、中村美津子 「河内おとこ節」（15）、西野カナ 「Best Friend」（初）、浜崎あゆみ（12）「Virgin Road」、Perfume 「ねぇ」（3）、平原綾香 「Voyagers」（7）、水樹奈々 「PHANTOM MINDS」（2）、水森かおり 「松島紀行」（8）、和田アキ子 「AKKOィィッ! 紅白2010スペシャル」（34）
【白組】
嵐 「2010紅白オリジナルメドレー」（2）、五木ひろし 「おしろい花」（40）、HY 「時をこえ」（初）、EXILE 「I Wish For You」（6）、NYC 「よく遊びよく学べ100%NYC」（2）、加山雄三 「若大将50年 スペシャルメドレー」（17）、北島三郎 「風雪ながれ旅」（47）、郷ひろみ 「GO! GO! イヤー紅白スペシャルメドレー」（23）、コブクロ 「流星」（6）、SMAP 「This is love'10 SPメドレー」（18）、TOKIO 「advance」（17）、徳永英明 「時の流れに身をまかせ」（5）、AAA 「逢いたい理由」（初）、氷川きよし 「虹色のバイヨン」（11）、FUNKY MONKEY BABYS 「あとひとつ」（2）、福山雅治 「道標」（3）、flumpool 「君に届け」（2）、細川たかし 「浪花節だよ人生は」（34）、ポルノグラフィティ 「君は100%」（9）、森進一 「襟裳岬」（43）、遊助 「ひと」（2）、L'Arc〜en〜Ciel 「BLESS」（4）

description.hltext_display: 5 minutes with ... Claude Giroux
description.content:
Born: Jan. 12, 1988
Offseason residence: Ottawa, Ontario
Hometown: Hearst, Ontario
Favorite food: Grilled cheese and shepherd's pie
Least favorite food: Tomatoes
First car: 1997 purple Toyota Corolla
Best-dressed teammate: Ville Leino
Worst-dressed teammate: James van Riemsdyk
Game-day routine: Breakfast, pregame skate, pregame meal with pasta and chicken, sleep 3 hours, wake up, drive to rink, eat a grilled cheese.
Favorite road city: Ottawa
Least favorite road city: Buffalo
Best team prankster: Scott Hartnell
Favorite hockey memory: Last year's run to the Stanley Cup finals
Superstitious: Yes. Let's say I play a good game. I'll wear the same dress shirt or tie the next day, something like that. If I'm playing well, I don't like to change things up.
Best part about living in Philly: It's a sports town.

description.hltext_display: CNET评出过去十年IT产业十大� 厘头并购案
description.content:
美国IT网站CNET日前评选出过去十年IT产业十大� 厘头并购案，结果被称为世纪交易的时代华纳与AOL的合并位居榜首。以下排行榜详情：
第一：时代华纳与AOL的合并
AOL 在1999年是证券市场的热门股票。时任首席执行官史蒂夫�凯斯（Steve Case）希望利用股价高涨的优势，来收购所有类型的公司。时代华纳与AOL在2001年正式合并，当时这笔交易被称为世纪交易，被认为是新旧两家媒 体的成功联姻。但随后AOL的迅速陨落，以及时代华纳旗下电视和杂志业务未能获得新发展，使得公司股价大幅缩水。 2003 年，合并后的公司把名称从AOL时代华纳更改为时代华纳，并把证券代� �从AOL更改为TWX。2005年，市场中有消息称时代华纳将分拆 AOL。直到2009年12月，AOL正式从时代华纳中分拆出来，从而结束了这段持续十年的姻缘。在AOL首席执行官蒂姆�阿姆斯特朗（Tim Armstrong）领导下，AOL视剥离为机遇，重新定位为一家新的数字媒体公司，离原拨号上网业务越走越远。
第二：eBay收购StumbleUpon
拍卖网站巨擎eBay在2007年宣布，将斥资7500万美元收购网站推荐服务StumbleUpon。没有人知道eBay为何要收购StumbleUpon。当时最大的猜测，是eBay可能要把StumbleUpon的技术应用到eBay的产品推荐当中。
在 收购StumbleUpon大约两年之后，eBay把StumbleUpon出售给其创始人--� 勒特�坎普（Garrett Camp）、杰奥夫�史密斯（Geoff Smith）和风险投资公司Accel Partners、August Capital及Ram Shriram of Sherpalo Ventures。截至目前，StumbleUpon运行相当不错，并成为一家最有前途的公司，StumbleUpon� �据用户个人偏好通过浏览器插件向 用户发送大多人推荐的高质量内容。
第三：微软收购Bungie
Bungie在微软进入游戏机领域及发布最初版Xbox游戏机起了关键作用。微软于2000年收购Bungie，这时距Bungie推出视频游戏《光晕》� �本仅仅过去了一年时间。 2007 年年底，就在发布《光晕3》后不久，微软和Bungie宣布，Bungie工作室将从微软中分拆出来。不过很快Bungie便推出数款Xbox游戏机专用 《光晕》游戏，开发人员此后又发布两款《光晕》系列游戏：Halo: ODST和Halo: Reach，并与动视暴雪签订了10年发行协议。
第四：eBay收购Skype
eBay在2005年以41亿美元的价� �收购了Skype，不过eBay随后承认收购价� �过高，并没有向Skype所有者支付近10亿美元的收购费用。
eBay 在去年9月初宣布，以19亿美元现金和1.25亿美元债券的价� �向一个风投公司组成的财团出售Skype 70%的股权。在交易完成之后，eBay仍然持有Skype 30%的股权。Skype今年上半年的营收为4亿美元，全年营收约为8亿美元。目前，作为全球使用人数最多的网络视频和音频通讯平台，Skype的全球注 册用户总数已达到5.6亿人。
第五：Six Apart收购博客社区网站LiveJournal
作 为社交媒体和博客网站的先驱，LiveJournal创办于1999年。很快，LiveJournal便成为青年网民发泄情感和联系的中心。 LiveJournal曾拥有独特的受众群体：十� 岁的青年用户、亚文化群和小说迷社区，并在俄罗斯拥有大量的用户。2005年，美国博客先驱Six Apart收购了LiveJournal。但是很快便有证据显示，Six Apart的管理层并不了解LiveJournal的文化，偶尔还触犯众怒。2007年中，逾500篇日志被� 除，� 为这类博客中包含明显的性讨 论，Six Apart� 此向公众道歉。 2007年年底，Six Apart宣布把LiveJournal出售给俄罗斯商业合作伙伴SUP。Six Apart并没有一个好的结局。不久之后，该公司关闭了其Vox博客平台，并最终被一家名为VideoEgg的广告公司收购。截至目前，Six Apart原有的TypePad和Movable Type博客平台仍然得到了新公司的支持。
第六：IAC收购Expedia
全 球最大的在线旅游公司Expedia最初由微软创办，1999年网络股受市场追捧时期，该公司从微软分拆出来，成为一家独立上市公司。两年之后，当网络股 泡沫� �灭以后，Expedia被巴里�迪勒（Barry Diller）的Ticketmaster公司收购。这家公司最终更名为IAC。
2004年，IAC发展壮大，迪勒将Expedia及其它旅游业务同IAC剥离，成立Expedia，目前仍是一家上市公司，IAC持有该公司股份。
第七：CNET收购Webshots
2004年，CNET斥资7000万美元收购照片分享站点Webshots，2007年底以4500万美元将Webshots转售给American Greetings。
第八：Terra收购Lycos
作 为Web 1.0时代的著名网络公司之一，Lycos在2000年年初以125亿美元的价� �出售给Terra。4年后，Lycos被出售给韩国Daum Communications，� 闻售价9500万美元。今年8月份，印度公司Ybrand Digital以3600万美元从Daum Communications手中收购Lycos。
第九：诺基亚收购MetaCarta
MetaCarta今年4月份被诺基亚收购。仅3个月后，诺基亚将该公司出售给Qbase Holdings。诺基亚在出售MetaCarta时曾发表声明称，将保留MetaCarta地理智能技术，将之整合至本土搜索和其它服务中。
第十：AOL收购Bebo
Bebo 目前能否在市场中存活下来仍是未知数。AOL于2008年斥资8.5亿美元收购社交媒体Bebo，目前Bebo流量和业界信誉度均不及Facebook。 如果说AOL与时代华纳的结合是网络股泡沫期最恐怖的并购事件，那么AOL收购Bebo应该是Web 2.0时代最恐怖的并购交易。有报道称，在收购Bebo之初，连AOL的高管都不看好这一并购交易。
AOL今年初将Bebo贱卖给Criterion Capital Partners。令人难以理解的是，Bebo创始人迈克尔�波奇（Michael Birch）重新� 盟Bebo董事会，并对该公司进行了注资。

description.hltext_display: It’s high-speed internet or die!
description.content:
New York - High-speed internet has had the greatest technological impact on society over the past decade and is the technology most people say they cannot live without, according to a new poll.
Twenty four percent of 1,950 US adults questioned in the online survey conducted by Zogby International said high-speed internet had the greatest impact on thie lives, followed closely by Facebook at 22 percent and Google with 10 percent.
Of the technologies people say they cannot live without, high-speed internet came in first at 28 percent and email was second at 18 percent.
When asked what they thought would be the greatest technological advancement in the next year, 24 percent said it would be in home entertainment and 16 percent said it would be in general computing.
Looking ahead to the next decade, 43 percent of those surveyed predicted there would be regular use of stem cells and cloning techniques to create human organs for transplant.
Forty percent said computer chips would be implanted in people to monitor their health, and the same number said robots would be capable of performing manual labor jobs. - Reuters

description.hltext_display: � 微软将于明年1月份宣布ARM版Windows
description.content:
微软会在明年年初的CES 2011大会上推出新系列的平板机，对抗苹果iPad。今天又有消息称微软将在CES 2011大会上发布一款新的Windows版本，专门运行在基于ARM处理器的设备上。
据《彭博社》报道，两位知情人士透露，1月份的CES大会上，微软将首次宣布一款运行于ARM上的Windows版本。该版本将针对使用电� 的移动设备进行优化，比如平板机或其它手持设备。
这款操作系统将提高微软在平板机和手机领域的竞争力，在这个市场，微软已经稍显落后于苹果和Google。据悉，这款系统还可以在Intel和AMD处理器上运行。
微软官方发言人Bill Cox拒绝对此发表评论，ARM一位官方发言人Charlene Marini表示公司不会对� 言或猜测进行评论，Intel同� �拒绝评论。

description.hltext_display: 7.4-magnitude quake hits Japan
description.content:
An earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 7.4 jolted Ogasawara Islands in the Pacific early Wednesday, said the Japan Meteorological Agency (JMA), which issued a tsunami warning; Kazinform refers to China Daily.
The focus of the quake, which occurred at 2:20 am Wednesday (1720 GMT Tuesday), was located around 10 km under the sea off Chichijima in the Ogasawara island chain, some 1,000 km south of Tokyo, said the agency.
There were no immediate reports of casualties or damage to properties.
The agency also issued tsunami advisory to Izu, Amami and Tokara islands, as well as the Pacific coasts along Shizuoka, Aichi, Mie, Wakayama, Tokushima, Kochi and Miyazaki prefectures.

description.hltext_display: Rahma Azhari dan McMenemy Berfoto Mesra
description.content:
Selain Johan Yoga Utama yang proses perekrutannya tengah dijajaki dengan manajemen tim dan pelatih Persib senior, Persib U-21 juga berpeluang mendapatkan seorang striker jebolan SAD Indonesia yang sudah dua tahun berlatih di Uruguay. Pemain bernama Sahlan Sodiq itu sudah tampak berlatih dengan Rudi Geofani dan kawan-kawan pada sesi latihan sore di Stadion Persib, Jln. A. Yani Bandung, Selasa (21/12).
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Umuh, "Soal Johan Kita Bicarakan Dulu"
Manajer Persib Bandung, H. Umuh Muchtar mengisyaratkan kesepakatannya untuk menjajaki kemungkinan perekrutan Johan Yoga Utama melalui Persib U-21. Pasalnya, proses pendaftaran pemain di Liga Super Indonesia (LSI) U-21 masih akan dibuka hingga akhir Januari mendatang.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Disuntik Bonus 5.000 Ringgit
Awas, Malaysia Usung Balas Dendam!
Pemain Malaysia mengusung misi balas dendam saat menghadapi Indonesia dalam dua pertandingan final AFF Suzuki Cup 2010 di Stadion Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Minggu (26/12) dan Rabu (29/12) di Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Bepe Tidak Takut
Laga pertama final Piala AFF Suzuki antara Malaysia kontra Indonesia akan digelar di Bukit Jalil, Malaysia, Minggu (26/12) malam. Timnas kesebelasan Indonesia tidak mengkhawatirkan tekanan penonton di negeri jiran.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Polisi Diraja Jamin Keamanan Suporter
Penuh gengsi, tensi tinggi, dan atmosfer yang panas akan mewarnai pertandingan final AFF Cup 2010, antara Malaysia melawan Indonesia. Semua pihak berharap laga ini bisa berjalan sportif dan murni olahraga tanpa ada unsur politik kedua negara yang kerap bersinggungan.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
LOC Siapkan 5 Lokasi Penjualan Tiket
Panitia Piala AFF sudah merilis jadwal penjualan tiket laga kedua final di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno. Tiket akan dijual secara menyebar mulai tanggal 23-27 Desember 2010 di lima titik yang ditentukan.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 Timnas Filipina sudah tersingkir dari Piala AFF 2010, tapi "The Azkals" masih menyisakan sebuah kisah. Bukan kisah di lapangan melainkan kisah foto-fotonya dengan artis Indonesia Rahma Azhari.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Taekwondo Piala Wali Kota 2010
Banjarsari Boyong 2 Emas
Unit Banjarsari Banzai berhasil memboyong dua medali emas pada Kejuaraan Taekwondo Wali Kota Cup 2010 di GOR Bandung, Selasa (21/12). Kedua medali tersebut diraih melalui Jati Attalah dan Arjun Fariz.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Tim Drumband SDN Cisitu Sabet Gelar di Malaysia
Di saat bangsa Indonesia tengah dilanda euforia pada timnas sepak bola, tim drumband junior Sankdatu Junior Corps SDN Cisitu Bandung meraih prestasi internasional di Malaysia. Tim drumband junior ini mampu meraih special award pada Kualalumpur Marching Band World Competition di Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 11-18 Desember lalu.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Dua Karateka Jabar Rebut 2 Perunggu
Dua karateka Jawa Barat, Dian Saputri dan Irfan Ramadani berhasil meraih perunggu pada Kejuaraan Dunia Karateka "Open Campiana Internazionale" di Napoli, Italia, 11-12 Desember lalu. Putri --sapaan akrab Dian Saputri-- dan Irfan merupakan dua karateka dari 6 karateka yang dikirim mewakili Indonesia di ajang tersebut.
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010
Akan Dibuka Bupati Bandung
600 Guru Siap Bersaing di POR PGRI
BLK. FACTORY,(GM).-
Sekitar 600 peserta akan memeriahkan Pekan Olahraga (POR) PGRI XI se-Kab. Bandung yang dimulai tanggal 24-29 Desember mendatang di beberapa kecamatan, di antaranya Kec. Cicalengka, Nagreg, dan Cikancung. POR PGRI ini akan mempertandingkan 5 cabang olahraga yakni tenis meja putra/putri, bulu tangkis putra/putri, bola voli putr/putri, sepak bola putra, serta catur putra/putri. Para peserta yang ikut pada POR PGRI XI yang baru akan dibuka Minggu (26/12) ini merupakan guru yang tersebar di 31 kecamatan yang ada di Kab. Bandung.

description.hltext_display: ARG – Lamas feels huge sense of responsibility as coach of Argentina
description.author: rss-editor@fiba.com
description.content: BUENOS AIRES () – Julio Lamas is going to be leading “the most important team of his career” after being appointed as coach of Argentina. The veteran tactician has taken the reins of a national side that were held by Sergio Hernandez from 2005 through this summer’s FIBA World Championship, where he guided the team to a fifth-place finish. Lamas has coached Argentina before, leading them at the 1998 FIBA World Championship in Athens in his first stint. "This is the most important team I have coached in my career and to do it for a second time, is a privilege and something that doesn’t happen often,” he said after his unveiling to the media. “For me, this is a huge responsibility and I'm going to try to do it in the best possible way." Basketball will take center stage next year in Argentina when the is staged in Mar del Plata. "Our first aim is to qualify for the Olympics, and if we have everyone available, to play well,” Lamas said. “We have players for that and the idea is that the team works as it has done in the past. “A successful coach has left the national team and I hope to do it as well as Sergio Hernandez did. “I will study all the players. “I have spoken to Sergio and I will continue to talk to him to get enough information to follow players. “I will study the situation and the first thing that a player needs is to have a consistent sporting performance that justifies being called up to the national team in 2011." The two sides that reach the title game of next year’s event in Mar del Plata will qualify for the Olympics. FIBA Americas giants Team USA booked their place at London 2012 by capturing the gold medal this year at the FIBA World Championship in Istanbul. They will not compete at Mar del Plata. FIBA

description.hltext_display: Microsoft counting on its Windows 7 smartphone
description.content:
Los Angeles - More than 1.5 million cellphones carrying Microsoft's Windows Phone 7 operating software have sold in the first six weeks of launch, meeting what the company called ?realistic? expectations. Windows Phone 7, unveiled in October, may be Microsoft's last chance to establish a major presence in a hot market now dominated by Apple and Google, analysts say.
The sales numbers were disclosed for the first time by Achim Berg, vice president of business and marketing for Windows phones, in an internally conducted interview posted on Microsoft's website. ?It's a decent number. The mobile market is going to be a battle for Microsoft,? said Colin Gillis, an analyst with BGC Partners who has a ?buy? rating on Microsoft.
But he noted that the shipment of 1.5 million phones was sales into the distribution channel, rather than directly into consumers' hands, which tempers the announcement.
Taiwan's HTC, Dell, Samsung Electronics and LG Electronics are among the vendors who have launched or plan to begin selling Phone 7-based devices.
The industry is closely watching the early days of what could be a longer-term driver of growth. Gillis forecasts about 25 million Phone 7 sales in 2011. In contrast, analysts expect Apple to sell more than 60 million iPhones next year. ?We all know that the competition is extreme in this industry, and we have to compete on multiple fronts,? Berg said in the interview. ?We are on a path to begin releasing the first of several updates in the next couple of months, and several more mobile operators around the world will introduce Windows Phone 7 on their network in 2011.? Gillis noted that Microsoft is spending $500 million to market the Windows 7 smartphone, and suggested the company could see market gains by using some of that cash to subsidize the devices so consumers get them for free.
Microsoft's disappearance from the phone market and its delayed response to tablet devices like Apple's iPad has been seen as a drag on shares this year. - Reuters

description.hltext_display: 不要被虚� 声势的Android忽� 了
description.content:
移动应用开发者如今面临着多种移动开发平台的选择，随着Symbian，Android和iOS操作系统的竞争愈演愈烈，Windows Phone 7的� 入，� 疑使得这场战争充满了火药味。开发者正在为选择哪个平台开发移动应用烦恼时，新手持终端、平板电脑、智能手机的蜂拥上市，更令移动开发者们应接不暇。Apple用iPhone和iPad早已点燃了开发者们的热情。Symbian，Apple iOS，Google Android，Windows Phone 7都全面提升了平台开发的性能和可编程性水平。
Google是家广告公司
Google已经不再仅仅是个搜索引擎了，用Google CEO埃里克�施密特（Eric Schmidt）喜不自胜的话说我们就是一家广告公司，Google已是当今互联网上最强大的商业力量，已经成为全球最大的互联网广告公司。
Google 97%的收入来自广告，从Google 2010年第三季度财报来看，Google的广告业务由三驾马车驱动，首先是它的搜索广告，这部分业务依然是Google整体收入的主体构成；其次是展示广告业务，收入达25亿美元；最后，移动广告收入也高达10亿美元。对于搜索广告，Google基本是独自开创了一个业务领域，独� 鳌头；在展示广告领域，它用展示广告网络整合了一系列媒体，包括AdSense/DoubleClick合作伙伴网站、Youtube以及Google自己的资源，如Google财经、Gmail、地图、Blogger等，并启用了Google Display这一共同品牌整合之前的展示广告，除了Facebook和Twitter它� 法爬取信息之外，它的展示广告基本处于互联网的统治地位。但在移动广告领域，Google和其他大公司� 乎是同时开始，而且竞争刚刚展开，� �局并未明确。 Android的移动广告使命
最近，Google企业发展副总裁大卫�拉韦(David Lawee)表示，2005年以5000万美元收购安迪�鲁宾(Andy Rubin)一手创立的Android公司是Google历史上最成功的交易。Android系统现今已经成为高端手机的首选操作系统之一，并成功抢夺苹果iPhone的市场份额。
为了挑战苹果的App Store，Google于2008年推出了Android Market，且Google没有像苹果那� �对App Store内的应用程序进行严� �的监管，而是采用了让用户买单反馈后审� �机制，并一再强调Android Market扮演的角色仅仅是软件销售和� 播的中心而不是软件过滤器，认为开发者需要的是一个开放的、毫� 阻碍的环境来创� 内容。 尽管Google并不直接收取Android操作系统授权费，但其通过在Android手机上展示广告获利丰厚。在最近举行的一个电话会议上，Google高管曾透露，Google移动广告业务的全年营收已经达到10亿美元。这其中的大部分收入都来自AdMob。
Google 2010年初斥资7.5亿美元高价收购了AdMob，希望借此� 强自己在移动广告领域的技术。这次收购旨在为Google提升移动广告服务，Google非常看好移动广告市场的前景。Google表示，此次收购将增强其移动广告业务和技术。AdMob创始人兼首席执行官哈姆伊表示，我认为人们低估了广告对于互联网内容创新的重要性。而我们AdMob的目� �是将同� �的业务模式搬到移动网络，为开发者和发布商提供广告服务。 开发Android应用到底能不能挣钱
苹果用App Store点燃了开发者们的热情。随着越来越多的手机制� 商选择Android操作系统，Android手机的出货量激增，� 据了一定的市场份额，越来越多的开发者转移到为Android开发应用。苹果的App Store已经向开发者们证明了，给App Store开发手机应用可以带来可观的收入，《植物大战僵尸》、《愤怒的小鸟》、国内的《多彩水族箱》等都赚得盆赢钵满。但鲜有听说在Android Market上赚钱的例子，随着《愤怒的小鸟》移植到Android平台上，它� Android广告每月收入就可达到100万美元，似乎可以证明为Android开发应用一� �可以赚钱。 那么，开发者应该以那个平台为主进行应用开发，iOS还是Android？对于移动开发者来说，为苹果开发iOS应用仍然是最佳的选择，� 为iOS的统一性的优势，保证了开发者的高效率、低成本，何况iOS在欧美庞大的用户群，足够开发者施展自己的能力，为苹果这种追求高� �准的公司开发游戏，也会潜移默化地提高团队的整体� 质。 而Android操作系统的开放，Android Market的后审� �机制，所有的这些战略都是为了尽快增� Android应用程序，只有Android Market的应用程序足够多，才能产生强大网络效应，对广告商才有说服力，才能保证Google移动广告战略的成功。Android Market由于很长时间都没有解决付费应用程序的支付问题，导致Android Market上多是免费应用，已然成为免费应用商店的代名词。直到2010年底，全球最大的支付产品PayPal才支持Android Market付费应用程序的支付，而且PayPal这项功能的支付地区仅限于美国、澳大利亚、� 拿大、法国、英国、意大利和荷兰。与苹果的App Store相比还有很大差距。
另外，由于Android的分化问题严重，《愤怒的小鸟》已经宣布到目前为止，我们已经不愿意在为Android设备做更多版本的《愤怒的小鸟》了。不过� �据我们得到的反馈，我们感觉应该再为我们的粉丝多少做点什么。我们目前正致力于在低端Android设备上运行《愤怒的小鸟》的解决方案。话语中流露着� 奈。 苹果CEO 史蒂夫乔布斯把这种分化问题描述为让人丧失信心的挑战。他在Twitter上表示：开发者不得不应付在244种不同手机上开发超过100种不同的软件版本，这是一个让人丧失信心的挑战。许多Android程序只能在特定的手机上运行，或者对Android版本有要求限制。即使是1年前的机器也是一� �。而iPhone只需要 对2个版本进行测试。 其实从目前流行的移动应用可以看出，只有当应用程序在App Store上成功推出，形成品牌之后，再移植到Android Market上才能带来可观的广告收益。一款新的应用如果只发布到Android Market上，� �本� 法� 广告收益养活开发团队。而且，App Store的成功� 的都是成千上万的小开发团队，� �本就不是像EA、Gameloft这些大玩家上� 的游戏。对于EA之类的游戏大玩家，他们有充足的预算，有人力物力支持多个平台开发，也有尝试、允许犯错的机会。而对于小开发团队来说，他们没有太多的预算，往往只能允许集中一个平台开发，� �本就不允许犯错误。小的创业开发团队，要想推出一款游戏，成功的运作，最后流行起来形成品牌，少则3年，多则5年，而又有多少团队能撑过3年、5年，相比App Store，Android的盈利性依然渺茫，小的创业团队为何要花时间和精力为Android开发游戏，而最终的结果就是给Android增添了一款新应用，挣得还是广告费，而不是开发者最喜欢的直接下载付费。移动开发者们请保持冷静，。 被开发者忽视的Symbian
科技公司之间的战争，Google与facebook之争，Android与iOS之争，Symbian与iOS之争，是科技媒体最喜欢的话题，这些话题也最能吸引科技界观众的眼球。所以很多科技媒体为了吸引眼球，很少顾及开发者的利益，制� 噱头，失去了媒体应有的客观、独立的报道功能。
在移动领域，受害最深的首当其冲就是诺基亚和它的Symbian。 所谓的科技界的媒体，美国� 据了主导地位，鲜有听说欧洲有著名的科技媒体，当然这和欧洲在创新领域的落后有关。Google和苹果都是美国的公司，而Android和iOS也都是美国公司旗下的产品，Symbian隶属诺基亚旗下，是欧洲的公司，自然，美国的科技媒体会偏袒美国的公司及产品，例如，如果� 浏览TechCrunch和ReadWriteWeb等知名的科技媒体就会发现，他们多数的文� 都是在报道美国的产品，在移动领域更是如此，� 会频繁的看到Android和iPhone，很少能看到关于Symbian的报道，即使偶尔看到一篇，也是Symbian的负面消息，难道这么多年来诺基亚就没有创新，Symbian就没有进步吗？显然不是。2010年9月，《纽约时报》采访了很多诺基亚的前高管，以《诺基亚的官僚体制阻碍了创新》为题，叙述了诺基亚的官僚体制阻碍创新的实例，悉数Symbian的不思进取。从� 普，IBM，微软这些老牌的公司，到Google，Facebook,Twitter这些新兴的公司，试问，哪一家公司避免了官僚体制，官僚体制和创新之间� �本就没有必然的联系。 但如果� 看著名的英国杂志《经济学人》就会发现其对欧美科技公司的报道的客观之处。2010年1月，《经济学人》以《诺基亚的自我救赎》为题客观分析诺基亚的问题，从芬兰民族品质sisu鼓励诺基亚，而诺基亚在面对群熊围攻的情况下做出了很多创新的措施。2010年9月《经济学人》又以《Skyhook起诉Google指控Android虚伪的开放》为题揭露Google Android Market虚伪的开放，拒绝比Google更具竞争力的SkyHook全球定位系统应用程序，文中强调：Android是一个开放性手机平台。只要这句话重复的次数足够多，人们也就信了。Android的开放只是口头上的开放，那是� 为Google不厌其烦地用开放这个词来描述Android给人留下的印象。他还强调，Android是免费的，但免费不等于没有约束。。 回到国内，国内的科技博客都争相翻译美国的博客，很少关注欧洲的科技媒体，使得中文互联网中充满了Android和iPhone，而不见诺基亚和Symbian的身影。不知有多少开发者就是� 为看了这些博客，而投身到Android开发大军中去，忽视了诺基亚在中国取得的成就以及Symbian的改进。Garther集团在2010年9月的一份报告中表示Symbian和Android将会在2014年� 主导地位。Garther表示，二者将会� 全球移动操作系统� 乎60%的市场份额。IDC在其同期的移动操作系统� �究报告中也表示，Symbian和Android将会� 据前两名。笔者在和微软亚洲� �究院的一个负责人谈论此事时，他为中国大陆的开发者感到惋惜，表示中国大批的开发者被Android忽� 了，失去了判断能力，而� 视诺基亚在中国的进步。 另外，一提到Symbian，开发者们就会自然想到用户体验不佳的Ovi商店。其实只要开发者能开发出好的游戏，就不用愁没有� 道发布销售。GetJar、当乐网等第三方移动游戏商店的成功，很大程度上要归功于Symbian和Java游戏，而这些发布� 道，都可以给开发者带来真金白银。 在我了解的移动应用和游戏开发公司中，台湾和香港有一些公司很值得大陆的开发团队学� ，他们对待Android非常冷静，比如台湾的口袋移动（Pocketnet），香港的跳跃工作室（MBounce），昇科（Zensis），摩摩网(MMMOOO)，他们使用Symbian系统开发了很多流行的手机游戏，通过与以Symbian系统开发的手机厂商的紧密合作，实现了� 自身推广难以达到的品牌声誉。 诺基亚在移动应用领域取得的成绩
诺基亚在这两年移动应用发展趋势下，做出了很多的革新。Ovi音乐，Ovi商店的推出，Symbian的升级，新开发工具QT的问世，都显示了诺基亚在移动应用服务领域的决心。 在中国严� �的政策管制下，Ovi商店硬生生地在中国做了起来，低调成功推出，比中国移动应用商店，沃商店等运营商的商店都要成熟。这时，苹果App Store只是雷声大，雨点小，看不到任何推出的迹象，众多的粉丝只能通过越狱下载流行的游戏。Android Market就更不用提了，在Google退出中国大陆市场，转移到香港之后，Android Market未来就再也没有进军中国大陆市场的可能，使得第三方Android应用商店有机可乘，开始抢� 大陆的山寨市场。 细心的诺米们也许会发现，在Ovi商店中可以看到很多如EA，Gameloft的Symbian大牌手机游戏可以下载，也可以看到很多迪斯尼的动画片形象壁纸和主题等个性化应用。诺基亚既然能把这些大牌吸引过来，说明诺基亚拥有强大的资源优势，很多国内的开发者都担心为Ovi商店开发游戏赚不到钱，如果真是这� �，EA、Gameloft为何要投入人力物力给Ovi商店开发呢？难道是他们的战略失误？
Ovi Appwizard应用程序向导的推出，更是四两拨千斤的战略。Appwizard与国内门户的合作必将助推Ovi商店，诺基亚对中国广大手机用户的了解令Android和苹果望尘莫及。在中国，诺基亚之于移动互联网，就好比是腾讯之于互联网。诺基亚对中国手机用户的了解，就好比是腾讯对中国互联网用户的了解。51. com通过模仿腾讯在互联网领域取得了成功，在移动互联网领域，模仿诺基亚未来取得成功的又将会是谁？

description.hltext_display: Empieza el sorteo más esperado del año
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Son 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: 暴雪追� 诉讼EA 寻求4亿美元赔偿
description.content:
北京时间12月22日下午消息，暴雪周二将EA拖入了一场诉讼，使得这两家游戏巨头之间的大战愈演愈烈。
暴雪的诉讼始于今年4月，最初的两名被告是该公司前游戏开发人员詹森�维斯特(Jason West)和文森特�赞培拉(Vincent Zampella)，他们二人今年3月刚刚离职。维斯特和赞培拉此前担任游戏工作室Infinity Ward的负责人，并为暴雪开发了著名的《使命召唤》系列游戏。Infinity Ward是2003年被暴雪收购的。
在修订诉讼中，暴雪又将EA列为被告，指控该公司通过秘密手段扰乱和� �坏Infinity Ward的稳定。暴雪认为，EA通过猎头公司Creative Artists Agency从Infinity Ward挖走了维斯特和赞培拉。 EA发言人杰夫�布朗(Jeff Brown)周二晚间回应道：这是一种卑鄙且经过深思熟虑的误导性公关策略。事实上，暴雪违反了此前对这两名艺术家的承诺。他们二人被开除后，现在只是希望获得应有的赔偿。而暴雪却隐瞒了这一事实。 暴雪在解雇维斯特和赞培拉后一个月起诉他们二人违反合同。他们二人此后成立了Respawn Entertianment，并且开始开发一款游戏，而EA也已经同意发行该游戏。维斯特和赞培拉也已经向暴雪提起诉讼，指控前东家以不当方式扣留了《使命召唤：现代战争2》的数百万美元授权费。
在修订诉讼中，暴雪希望EA、维斯特和赞培拉向其支付4亿美元赔偿金和罚金。
暴雪未立刻对此置评。

description.hltext_display: 17 Wildschweine wurden erlegt
description.content:
Drückjagd in Gündlingen. BREISACH-GÜNDLINGEN (wec). Bei sonnigem Winterwetter fand die alljährliche Drückjagd statt, zu der die 4 Gündlinger Jagdpächter an die Sechshöfler-Hütte eingeladen hatten. Vor allem ortsansässige Landwirte nahmen die Gelegenheit wahr, als Treiber mitzuhelfen, den wachsenden Wildbestand zu reduzieren. Am Lagerfeuer und unter den Klängen der Jagdhörner wurde am Schluss die im wahrsten Sinne "fette Beute" ausgelegt: 17 Wildschweine, 14 Rehe und ein Fuchs. "Mit der erneuten Teilnahme an der diesjährigen Treibjagd wollen wir unser Interesse an der Arbeit der Jagdpächter bekunden und uns für die gute Zusammenarbeit das Jahr hindurch bedanken", sagte Markus Gräbling, Landwirt aus Gündlingen und stellvertretender Kreisvorsitzender des BLHV. Der Maisanbau und die damit einhergehende Vermehrung der Wildschweine sei bereits seit Mitte des 19. Jahrhunderts in Gündlingen ein Thema. Die Welschkorneber, wie sie im süddeutschen Raum auch genannt werden, machen ganze Felder platt, pflügen Grünflächen um und ernähren sich mit Vorliebe von "Sauengold", wie der Maiskolben in Fachkreisen scherzhaft bezeichnet wird. Werbung
Die Zunahme des Reh- und Wildschweinbestandes und die dadurch verursachten ökologischen und wirtschaftlichen Schäden in Wald, Feld und Flur würden zunehmend zum Problem für die Land- und Forstwirtschaft. So forderten das Bundesamt für Naturschutz, der deutsche Forstwirtschaftsrat sowie die Arbeitsgemeinschaft naturgemäße Waldwirtschaft bereits im Mai dieses Jahres "eine deutliche Verminderung der genannten Tierbestände". Sie plädieren für effektive Jagdmethoden.

description.hltext_display: Boeing will Dreamliner wieder in der Luft sehen
description.content:
Ihre Email *
Empfänger Email *
Geben Sie hier die E-Mail-Adresse des Empfängers ein (z.B. m.mustermann@wb.com). Mehrere Empfänger werden durch Komma getrennt.
Der US-Flugzeugbauer will die 787-Testflüge so bald als möglich wieder aufnehmen. Boeing ist mit dem Dreamliner Jahre im Lieferverzug, es gibt bereits erste Abbestellungen und hohe Vertragsstrafen.
Boeing will in Kürze die Wiederaufnahme der Testflüge für seine 787 "Dreamliner"-Flugzeuge ankündigen. Zum Zeitplan für die Auslieferung machte das Unternehmen keine Angaben.
Boeing hatte die Testflüge der 787 gestoppt, nachdem Anfang November eine der Maschinen notlanden musste. Das Flugzeug soll besonders wenig Treibstoff verbrauchen. Der Airbus-Konkurrent liegt mit der neuen 787 fast drei Jahre hinter dem Zeitplan zurück.

description.hltext_display: Win7系统存在内� �0day漏洞
description.content:
本周共截获了309，218个钓鱼网站，共有813万网民遭遇钓鱼网站攻击。近期发现 Windows系统的内� �函数存在0day漏洞，病毒利用恶意构� 的数据写入注册表，当设置系统时间时，则会触发漏洞，导致运行病毒。由于该漏洞影响 Windowsxp和Win7系统，所以感染病毒用户数量可能会大量增长。截获的最新机器狗木马就是利
用该漏洞感染用户电脑，从而导致大量杀毒软件被关闭，下载病毒，盗取用户账号密� �。 这是一个可以结束大量杀毒软件的恶性木马病毒，值得一提的是，该变种通过微软一个0day漏洞来� 载驱动程序，该漏洞是内� �的函数发生� �溢出导致，使得R3程序可以在0环执行任意代� �，驱动� 载后结束反病毒软件，并通过向Atapi发送IRP
感染userinit。exe实现自启动，下载并执行其他恶意程序。

description.hltext_display: Sino Clean Energy, Inc. Announces Pricing of $28.7 Million Public Offering of Common Stock
description.content:
From Our Money Partners
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Sino Clean Energy Inc.
XI'AN, China, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-Asia-FirstCall/ -- Sino Clean Energy, Inc. (Nasdaq: SCEI) ("Sino Clean Energy" or the "Company"), a leading producer and distributor of coal-water slurry fuel ("CWSF") in the People's Republic of China ("China"), today announced the pricing of a public offering of 5,465,000 shares of its common stock at a price of $5.25 per share. The Company has granted the underwriters a 45-day option to purchase up to an additional 819,750 shares to cover over-allotments, if any. The offering is expected to close on December 28, 2010, subject to customary closing conditions.
The Company will receive aggregate net proceeds of approximately $25.6 million after deducting underwriting discounts and commissions and estimated offering expenses payable by the Company, not including the over-allotment option. The Company expects to use the net proceeds from this offering to expand its CWSF production capacity at new and existing facilities throughout China, to pay the remainder of the purchase price under an agreement to purchase land use rights and a production factory in Dongguan, Guangdong Province and for working capital and general corporate purposes.
Rodman & Renshaw, LLC, a subsidiary of Rodman & Renshaw Capital Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: RODM), and Axiom Capital Management, Inc. acted as joint book-running managers for the offering.
The offering of these securities will be made only by means of a prospectus. A registration statement relating to these securities has been declared effective by the Securities and Exchange Commission. Copies of the final prospectus relating to the offering, when available, may be obtained for free by visiting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission website at http://www.sec.gov. Alternatively, a copy of the prospectus related to this offering may be obtained from Rodman & Renshaw, LLC, Prospectus Department, 1251 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, 10020, telephone: 212-430-1710 or email: prospectus@rodm.com, or from Axiom Capital Management Inc., Prospectus Department, 780 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10017, telephone: 212.521.3800 or email: prospectus@axiomcapital.com.
This press release shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy any of the securities, nor shall there be any sale of these securities in any state or jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such state or jurisdiction.
About Sino Clean Energy, Inc.
Sino Clean Energy is a U.S. publicly traded company and a China-based producer and distributor of coal-water slurry fuel ("CWSF"). With locations in Shaanxi Province and Liaoning Province, Sino Clean Energy is one of the leading CWSF producers in China. For more information about Sino Clean Energy, please visit http://www.sinocei.net/ .

description.hltext_display: 外国で夫のリストラ生活 - 慌てたってしょうがない
description.content:
欧州生活、幼児一人、賃貸生活、40代半ばの外国人夫が約1年前にリストラにあい、現在無職。
仕事を探しているもの、まだ先立つものなし。
日本人で在る妻私（40代前半）も、仕事探しをしていますが、中々決まらず。
年齢もあり、まれに仕事が決まったとはいえ正社員になるには夢の世界。
切羽詰ってきた現状。
何を考えても、何を信じて・・・何が好いか悪いかも分からなくなって来ています。
ユーザーID：3942857359
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：2本
タイトル
投稿者
どっこらしょっと
2010年12月22日 11:09
何でも良いんです。何時間でも良いんです。取りあえずパートを探しましょう。
ユーザーID：8668893756
馬耳東風
2010年12月22日 14:45
その状況で、いろいろ焦って、いろいろ考えて夜も眠れなくなったとしても、財布からお金は沸いてきません。考えるだけ損です。でき得る事というのは、実は限られているので、何ができるかリストを作ってみましょう。
正社員〜なんて、一段抜かしに考えるから物事がさらに難しくなる。採用されること、1ユーロでも2ユーロでも現金を得ることが優先なんですから皿洗いでもなんでもやればいいですよ。
部屋でもやもやしてると収入ゼロ。ゼロよりは皿洗ったほうが有意義でしょう。
自分を幸せにするのは、夫ではなくて自分だ、と腹を括ると楽ですよ。相手に期待するとイライラしますから。
善戦を祈ります！

description.hltext_display: LOC Siapkan 5 Lokasi Penjualan Tiket
description.content:
Panitia Piala AFF sudah merilis jadwal penjualan tiket laga kedua final di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno. Tiket akan dijual secara menyebar mulai tanggal 23-27 Desember 2010 di lima titik yang ditentukan.
Lima titik penjualan berada di loket Masjid Aldina, pintu depan KONI, juga Pintu Barat, Pintu Timur, dan Pintu Utara depan TVRI. Di masing-masing titik bakal ada empat loket antrean.
Tanggal 23 Desember akan dijual tiket kategori I, lalu besoknya tiket kategori II baru dijual. Khusus untuk tanggal 25 Desember penjualan tiket diliburkan dan baru akan dibuka kembali pada tanggal 26 Desember untuk kategori III.
Pembelian di tanggal tersebut, fans hanya akan mendapatkan voucher.
"Penjualan mulai pukul 10.00 WIB sampai dengan antrean habis dan atau tiket habis. Kuota pembelian adalah lima tiket per orang," ujar Ketua Panitia Lokal (LOC) Joko Driyono, Selasa (21/12).
Tiket yang akan dijual panitia berjumlah 76.871 lembar. Untuk tiket VVIP 671 tiket, VIP Barat 2.700 tiket, VIP Timur 3.500, kategori I 24.000, kategori II 16.000, dan kategori III 30.000 tiket. "Tanggal 29 tidak ada penukaran sama sekali," tutup Joko. (B.98/net)**

description.hltext_display: 「ウエディングベストドレッサー賞授賞式」でマリエ、南明奈、板野友美がそれぞれ結婚観を語る!!
description.content:
2010年12月22日 ザテレビジョン
「ウエディングベストドレッサー賞」を受賞した板野友美、マリエ、南明奈（写真左から）
東京ブライダルフェスタ実行委員会が、各種ブライダル企業を集めた、一般向け日本最大のブライダルイベント「東京ブライダルフェスタ2010」を、12月19日、都内で開催。最もウエディングドレスの似合う有名人を選出した「第1回日本ウエディングベストドレッサー賞授賞式」が行われ、モデル部門にマリエ、タレント部門に南明奈、アイドル部門にAKB48の板野友美が受賞し、それぞれウエディングドレス姿で登場した。
同イベントは、結婚を予定しているカップルを対象に、結婚にまつわるサービスを提供するブライダル関連企業計130社以上を集め、ウエディングの最新情報を発信する展示会で、ことしが第1回目の開催となる。各企業のブース出展のほか、ステージではモデルやタレントが、ウエディングドレスを着てウエディングファッションショーなどが行われた。
「ウエディングドレスは仕事でたくさん着ることがあったので、きょうは着物を着ることができてうれしいです」（マリエ）、「ウエディングドレスっていうのは、何度着ても気持ちも上がりますし、お嫁さんっていうのは永遠の女の子の夢なので、こういった賞をもらえるのはとてもれしいです」（南）、「わたしはいつもミニスカートを着ることが多いので、ウエディングドレスを着てお仕事が出来るのはなかなかないので、こうして女の子があこがれる衣装を着て、第1回目の賞をいただけてすごくうれしいです」（板野）とそれぞれ受賞した感想を。
授賞式後の会見でマリエは「第1回目の受賞で日本でということなので、着物を着てみました。引き振袖は初めて着たので感動してます。普通の着物より着やすくて軽いので、身が引き締まるというか、ちゃんと着物を着させていただくとやっぱりビシっとしなきゃなって思います」とコメントし、南は「学生時代のころから、結婚願望がすごく強かったし、ずっと花嫁にあこがれていて、中学のころから20歳で結婚するって言ってました。毎回、その時に付き合っていた彼と結婚すると思っていましたよね。でももう20歳を過ぎてしまったので。いま相手を頑張って探し中です。24〜25歳に結婚できたらいいなって思ってます」と明かした。
また、マリエは「わたしはいま、23歳なんですけど、結婚なんてまだ遠い話だと思ってました。いま結婚される芸能人が多いじゃないですか。だから『あれ? マリエは?』って聞かれることが多くて、もうそんな歳になっちゃったんですね〜。結婚はしたいなとは思ってますけど、ゆっくり相手を探していこうかな」と結婚についての思いを語った。
理想の結婚式について聞かれると「海で結婚式を挙げるのが夢ですね」（マリエ）、「わたしはディズニーが好きなので、ディズニーランドで挙げたいんです。でも、優樹菜さんたちが挙げたので、真似したって言われると気まずいので悩んでますけど。フジモンさんからいろいろ結婚式の話を聞いて、やっぱりいいなと思っていま考え中です」（南）、「ハワイで挙げたいです。撮影でハワイの結婚式場に行ったことがあるので、そこでいつか挙げたいですね」（板野）とそれぞれ答えた。
授賞式の後には「東京ブライダルフェスタ内 スマ婚ステージ」が行われた。土屋アンナが登場し、アコースティックライブを披露。「Brave vibration」や「Believe in Love」など4曲を熱唱した。土屋は「あまり気を重くしないで、本当に自分の人生の中で楽しめる、自分の中のフェスティバルみたいな感じで、エンジョイするのが1番だと思うんですよ。お金をかけて大変な思いをするよりも、自由に自分の好きなように、式をやって1日が疲れた〜じゃなくて楽しかったね〜っていう結婚式が1番だと思う。わたしはバーベキューしたい!ってかんじだから、楽しい1日が1番だよね」と結婚式についてアドバイスを。また「ドレス着たいですね〜。仕事で3回着てるんですけどね。ラインがきれいでシンプルなドレスが着たい。前、旦那と話してて、子供がいるからディズニーランドでやりたいねって話してました。仲間にサプライズとかやってもらいたい。仲間も子持ちが多いから子供が楽しめる式にして、面白おかしくやりたい」と理想の結婚式を語った。

description.hltext_display: COD smashes record sales
description.content:
San Francisco - Call Of Duty: Black Ops, the new videogame from Activision Blizzard, has crossed the one-billion-dollar mark in worldwide sales, the company said on Tuesday.
Activision, citing internal estimates, said Call Of Duty: Black Ops reaped more than $650-million worldwide in the first five days after it went on sale in November and has gone on to earn more than one billion dollars. ?In all of entertainment, only Call Of Duty and Avatar have ever achieved the billion dollar revenue milestone this quickly,? Activision Blizzard chief executive Bobby Kotick said in a statement.
Activision said more than 600 million hours have been logged playing Call Of Duty: Black Ops since the launch of the game on November 9.
Activision said that according to Microsoft, the average player logs on more than once a day and plays for more than one hour each time. ?Even more remarkable than the number of units sold is the number of hours people are playing the game together online which are unprecedented,? said Eric Hirshberg, chief executive of Activision Publishing.
Call Of Duty: Black Ops is the seventh title in a franchise that has won a devoted following since the first version was released in 2003.
The latest installment takes gamers on a series of Cold War-era military adventures.
Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 was last year's biggest grossing console game with more than 20 million units sold around the world. - AFP

event_or_fact.property: Even more remarkable than the number of units sold is the number of hours people are playing the game together online which are unprecedented,?

description.hltext_display: 3M sagt Danke - Winterthur stößt mit sattem Gewinn zum US-Konzern
description.content:
3M sagt Danke - Winterthur stößt mit sattem Gewinn zum Konzern
11,2 Millionen € Gewinn, 5,3 Millionen allein im dritten Quartal: Der Schweizer Schleifmittel-Hersteller mit österreichischen Wurzeln, der vor der Übernahme durch den US-Riesen 3M steht, konnte seinen Gewinn deutlich steigern.
Post it-Erfinder 3M übernimmt Winterthur
Mehr zum Thema
Links zum Thema
Der Schleifmittel-Hersteller Winterthur Technologie, der vom US-Konzern 3M übernommen werden soll, verdiente in den ersten neun Monaten des laufenden Geschäftsjahrs 11,2 Mio. Euro, wie er am Mittwoch mitteilte. Allein im dritten Quartal habe der Gewinn 5,3 Mio. Euro (Vorjahresverlust: 0,7 Mio. Euro) betragen. Winterthur Technologie (WTG) verzeichnet damit nach dem positiven Halbjahr erneut schwarze Zahlen. Ende September 2009 hatte WTG noch einen Verlust von 2,2 Mio. Euro ausgewiesen. Im Gesamtjahr war dann ein Gewinn von 1,5 Millionen € erzielt worden (siehe Link).
Der Umsatz stieg zwischen Jänner und Ende September kräftig an. Er betrug in den neun Monaten 133,6 Mio. Euro. In China sei die Steigerung am höchsten ausgefallen, hieß es im Communiqué.
Der Trend zeigt weiter nach oben. Die Auftragseingänge per Ende September lagen um 81,4 Prozent höher als nach drei Quartalen im 2009. Auch der Auftragsbestand verbesserte sich per Ende September um 41 Prozent gegenüber dem Vorjahr. Aufgrund dieser Zahlen rechnet WTG mit einem "sehr guten" Ergebnis für das gesamte 2010 und auch für das erste Quartal 2011.
WTG steht vor einer Übernahme: Der US-Technologiekonzern 3M will sich das Schweizer Unternehmen für insgesamt 448 Mio. Dollar (341 Mio. Euro) einverleiben. Das öffentliche Übernahmeangebot wurde am Mittwoch wie angekündigt veröffentlicht. Voraussichtlich vom 10. Jänner bis zum 7. Februar wird die Angebotsfrist laufen.
Der Verwaltungsrat von WTG stimmte der Übernahme durch den US-Konzern zu. WTG-Verwaltungsratspräsident Edgar Rappold, der 14,4 Prozent an WTG hält, kündigte an, er werde seine Aktien 3M andienen. Die Übernahme kommt zustande, wenn 3M mindestens zwei Drittel der WTG-Aktien angedient werden. Fernziel ist eine Vollübernahme.

description.hltext_display: US internet rules spark outcry
description.author: Jasmin Melvin
description.content:
Washington - A divided US Federal Communications Commission banned Internet service providers like Comcast from blocking traffic on their networks, provoking warnings the rules would be rejected in the courts and threats from Republican lawmakers to overturn them.
The 3-2 decision on Tuesday highlighted a huge divide between those who say the Internet should flourish without regulation and those who say the power of high-speed Internet providers to discriminate against competitors needs to be restrained.
But the FCC did allow Internet providers like Comcast, AT&T and Verizon Communications to ?reasonably? manage their networks and to charge consumers based on levels of Internet usage.
Wireless carriers like Sprint Nextel, and Deutsche Telekom AG T-Mobile would get slightly more discretion to manage their networks but could not block access to websites, nor access to competing voice and video applications.
The FCC is also requiring broadband Internet providers to publicly disclose their network management policies.
The rules are expected to go into effect early next year but FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski said consumers should expect few changes. ?In many respects, this is about preserving the freedom and openness of the Internet that has worked for many years,? he told reporters after the FCC met in an open meeting.
Experts say legal challenges could tie the rules up for years. ?A definitive judicial resolution is still 3-5 years down the road,? predicted Michael Botein, professor of law and director of the media law center at New York Law School.
Nomura Equity Research analyst Michael McCormack said there was a high probability the rules would be softened or nullified by either the courts or Congress.
Approved by Genachowski and fellow Democrats Michael Copps and Mignon Clyburn, the rules were quickly condemned by Republicans and many companies as excessive and unnecessary. ?Litigation will supplant innovation. Instead of investing in tomorrow's technologies, precious capital will be diverted to pay lawyers' fees,? FCC Commissioner Robert McDowell warned.
McDowell and Republican colleague Meredith Attwell Baker voted against the rules, and predicted they would be overturned in court.
But Copps said he wished the FCC had taken stronger action, saying previous communications technologies had fallen victim to consolidated control, a reference to the AT&T telephone monopoly, later broken up in an antitrust lawsuit. ?In years to come, I hope we can look back on this day as an important turning point in the struggle to ensure the continued openness of the Internet against powerful gatekeeper control,? said Copps. Craig Aaron, managing director of public interest group Free Press, said the rules failed to do enough to stop the phone and cable companies from dividing the Internet into fast and slow lanes.
The FCC's ability to regulate the Internet has been in doubt since an appeals court in April said the agency lacked the authority to stop Comcast from blocking bandwidth-hogging applications.
Several Republicans lawmakers, who will control the US House of Representatives come January and be more numerous in the Senate, vowed legislation to reverse the FCC. ?We plan to look at all legislative options for reversing the decision,? said Representative Greg Walden, the incoming chairman of the House subcommittee on communications.
But any legislation would need to get support from Senate Democrats and even then could face a veto from President Barack Obama who welcomed the FCC action and said his administration would see that ?the democratic spirit of the Internet remains intact.? Verizon, which along with Google had proposed Web traffic rules in August, was highly critical of the plan.
Verizon said the rules' assertion of authority without solid legal underpinnings would lead to continued uncertainty for industry, innovators, and investors. ?In the long run, that is harmful to consumers and the nation.? Cable companies Comcast and Time Warner Cable were among the few companies to describe the FCC rules as striking a ?balance? between competing interests.
Comcast is waiting for regulatory approval of its purchase of a controlling stake in NBC Universal, a deal that would create the largest US media company with TV networks, a movie studio and theme parks.
The rules could help cable companies in competition with plans by Microsoft Corp, Google and Amazon.com to deliver competing video content over the same Internet lines the cable companies run to customers' homes.
Charging consumers more for data-intensive tasks like downloading videos could tip the economics of Internet-delivered television back toward cable. The FCC has said it will monitor usage-based pricing for abuses.
Level 3 Communications, a company that helps Netflix stream videos online, has accused Comcast of charging it unfair fees to deliver content to Comcast subscribers. - Reuters
